translation.en: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation.zu: NgoMsombuluko, usosayensi wase-Stanford University School of Medicine umemezele ithuluzi Elisha elikwazi ukuhlukanisa amagqamuzane ngezinhlobo zawo: ucezwana oluncane olunyathelisekayo olungakhandwa ngokusebenzisa imishini evamile yokunyathelisa ngokusesilinganisweni ngesenti elilodwa laseMelika.

translation.en: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation.zu: Abacwaningi abahola phambili bathi lokhu kungaholela ekushesheni kutholeke umhlavuza, isifo sofuba, igciwane lesandulela ngculazi kanye nomalaleveva eziguliniezisemazweni ampofu, lapho amazinga okusinda ezifweni ezinjengomdlavuza webele angaba nguhhafuwamazwe acebile.

translation.en: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation.zu: I-JAS 39C Gripen yashayeka emgwaqweni okugijima kuwo indiza cishe ngawo- 9: 30 ekuseni ngekhathi sendawo (0230 UTC) yaqhuma, okwavala izindiza zabantu bonke esikhumulweni sezindiza.

translation.en: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation.zu: Umshayeli wabhanoyi wahlonzwa njengoMholi we-Squadron u-Dilokrit Pattavee.

translation.en: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation.zu: Abezindaba bendawo babika ukuthi imoto yomlilo yasesikhumulweni sezindiza yaginqikangenkathi iphuthuma.

translation.en: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation.zu: UVidal oneminyaka engu-28 wayejoyine i-Barça kumasizini amathathu adlule, esuka e-Sevilla.

translation.en: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation.zu: Kusukela ngenkathi ethuthele enhlokodolobha yase-Catalan, uVidal udlalele iqembu imidlalo engu-49.

translation.en: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation.zu: Ukubhikisha kulaqe cishe ngo-11:00 isikhathi sendawo (UTC+1) eWhitehall ebhekene nendawo yokungena eDowning Street egadwe amaphoyisa, indawo engokomthetho kaNdunankulu.

translation.en: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation.zu: Ngemuva nje kuka-11:00, ababhikishi bavimbe izimoto ngezithuthi e-Whitehall.

translation.en: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation.zu: Ngo-11:20, amaphoyisa acele ababhikishi ukuthi bahlehlele endaweni yabahamba ngezinyawo, bethi kudingeka balinganisele phakathi kwelungelo lokubhikisha kanye nesiminyaminya esakhekayo.

translation.en: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation.zu: Ngawo-11:29 ababhikishi baya Odongeni Olumhlophe, badlula Isikwele saseTrafalgar, ngaseStrand, badlula ngase-Aldwych futhi phezulu ngaseHolborn lapho Iqembu Lesikhwama Sezwe lalibambe Umhlangano walo waseNtwasahlobo, eMagumbini wehhotela i-Connaught Enkulu.

translation.en: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation.zu: Umlando wokuncintisana phakathi kukaNadal nomuntu waseKhanada u-7–2.

translation.en: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation.zu: Usanda kwehluleka muva nje ebhekene no-Raonic eBrisbane Open.

translation.en: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation.zu: UNadal uthole amaphuzu angu-88% ahlangene emaphuzwini angu-76 okuwina umdlalo engxenyeni yokuqala.

translation.en: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation.zu: Ngemva komdlalo, iNkosi Yesihlabathi ithe, "Ngijabulele nje ukubuya emizuliswaneni yokugcina yezenzakalo ezibaluleke kakhulu. Ngilapha ukuzozama ukuwina lokhu."

translation.en: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation.zu: "Amaphepha wasePanama" igama elihlanganisa cishe amadokhumenti ayizigidi eziyishumi avela enkampanini yezomthetho yasePanama i-Mossack Fonseca, akhishwa kwabezindaba kungakabi yisikhathi ngentwasahlobo ka-2016.

translation.en: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation.zu: Amadokhumenti aveze amabhangi ayishumi nane asize amakhasimende acebile ukuba afihle izigidigidi zama-dollar wase-Melika zengcebo ukugwema intela kanye neminye imithetho.

translation.en: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation.zu: Iphephandaba laseBhrithani iThe Guardian lisikisele ukuthi iDeutsche Bank yayilawula cishe ingxenye yesithathu yezinkampani eziseceleni ezingu-1200 ezisetshenziselwe ukufeza lokhu.

translation.en: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation.zu: Bekunokubhikisha emhlabeni jikelele, ukumangalelwa kobugebengu okuningana, futhi abaholi bemibuso yase-Zwenileqhwa nasePakistan basula ezikhundleni bobabili.

translation.en: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation.zu: Ezalelwe eHong Kong, u-Ma wafunda eNyuvesi yaseNew York naseSikoleni soMthetho sase-Havard futhi wabuye waba “nomazisi” waseMelika wokuba umhlali wasikhathi sonke.

translation.en: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation.zu: UHsieh wasikisela phakathi nokhetho ukuthi uMa angabaleka ezweni phakathi nenkathi yenhlekelele.

translation.en: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation.zu: U-Hsieh uphinde waphikisa ukuthi uMa othandekayo ezithombeni wayesizwa yisitayela kunengqikithi.

translation.en: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation.zu: Naphezu kwezinsolo, uMa waphumelela enkundleni yokukhankasela ubudlelwane obuseduze nezwekazi laseShayina.

translation.en: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation.zu: Umdlali Wosuku wanamuhla ngu-Alex Ovechkin weWashington Capitals.

translation.en: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation.zu: Ube namagoli angu-2 wasiza kwamanye angu-2 lapho iWashington inqoba i-Atlanta Thrashers ngo-5-3.

translation.en: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation.zu: Usizo luka-Ovechkin lokuqala lobusuku bekuyigoli elinqoba umqhudelwano ngosanda kuqala u-Nicklas backstrom;

translation.en: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation.zu: Igoli lakhe lobusuku bekungelama-60 lesizini, eba ngumdlali wokuqala wokushaya amagoli angu-60 noma ngaphezulu ngesizini kusukela ngo-1995-96, lapho uJaromir Jagr noMario Lemieux befinyelela leyonqophamlando ngamunye.

translation.en: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation.zu: UBatten walinganiswa ngokuthi usesikhundleni sama-190 ohlwini luka-2008 Lwabantu baseMelika Abacebe Kunabo Bonke abangu-400, elunengcebo elinganiselwa ku-$2.3 bhiliyoni.

translation.en: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation.zu: Uthole iziqu kuyiCollege of Arts & Sciences yaseNyuvesi yaseVirginia ngo-1950 futhi wayengumuphi oqhamile kuleyo nhlangano.

translation.en: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation.zu: Ijele lase-Abu Ghraib yase-Iraq selishisiwe ngesikhathi somubhikisho.

translation.en: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation.zu: Ijele laba nodumo emuva kokuthi kutholakale ukuhlukumezwa kweziboshwa ngemuva kokuthi amasosha ase-US athatha izintambo.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation.zu: U-Piquet Jr. washayisa kwi- Singapore Grand Prix yango-2008ngemuva nje kokumela kancane ngokushesha u-Fernando Alonso, ekhipha imoto yokuphepha.

translation.en: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation.zu: Njengoba izimoto ezaziphambi kuka-Alonso ziyothela amafutha ziqondiswa imoto yokuphepha, waya phambili enkundleni futhi wathatha isicoco.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.zu: UPiquet Jr. waxoshwa ngemva kwe-Grand Prix yase-Hungary ka-2009.

translation.en: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation.zu: Ngo-8:46 ekuseni kwathuleka cwaka kulo lonke idolobha, okwenza ngaso leso sikhathi indiza yokuqala yenze umsebenzi wayo.

translation.en: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation.zu: Imisebe yokukhanya emibili yanyuka ukuze ibheke emkhathini phakathi nobusuku.

translation.en: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation.zu: Umsebenzi wokwakha amabhilidi amahlanu amade uyaqhubeka endaweni yesakhiwo, kanye nendawo yokuthutha kanye nendawo yesikhumbuzo phakathi nendawo.

translation.en: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation.zu: Umboniso we-PBS lunemiklomelo ye-Emmy engaphezu kwamashumi amabili nane futhi iboniswa isikhathi esifushane kune-Sesame Street neMister Rogers’s Neighborhood kuphela.

translation.en: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation.zu: Isiqephu ngasinye sohlelo sizogxila esihlokweni sencwadi ethile bese sihlola leso sihloko ngezindaba eziningana.

translation.en: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation.zu: Uhlelo ngalunye luzotusa izincwadi lezo izingane okumelwe zizibheke lapho ziye elabhulali yazo.

translation.en: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation.zu: UJohn Grant, osuka kuyi-WNED Buffalo (isiteshi sasekhaya seReading Rainbow) uthe "iReading Rainbow ifundise izingane ukuthi kungani kufanele zifunde,… uthando lokufunda — [uhlelo] lukhuthaze izingane ukuba zithathe incwadi zifunde."

translation.en: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation.zu: Kukholelwa abanye, kuhlanganise noJohn Grant, ukuthi ukusweleka okukhulu kwemali kanye nokushintsha kwefilosofi yezinhlelo zemfundo zethelevishini kube nomthelela ekupheleni kwezinhlelo ezilandelanayo.

translation.en: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation.zu: Isiphepho, esisendaweni ecishe ibe amamayela angu-645 (1040 km) entshonalanga yeziqhingi zaseCape Verde, cishe sizophela ngaphambi kokusongela noma iziphi izindawo ezisezweni, kusho ababikezeli.

translation.en: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation.zu: IFred njengamanje inemimoya yamamayela angama-105 ngehora (u-165 km/h) futhi ibheke ngasenyakatho-ntshonalanga.

translation.en: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation.zu: UFred isikhwishikhwishi sasezindaweni ezishisayo esinamandla kunazo zonke ezike zarekhodwa le eningizimu nasempumalanga kuyi-Atlantic kusukela ekusungulweni kwezithombe zesiphuphutheki, futhi yiso sodwa kuphela isiphepho esikhulu sesithathu emlandweni empumalanga kwe-35°W.

translation.en: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation.zu: NgoSeptemba 24, 1759, u-Arthur Guinness wasayina isivumelwano sokuqashisa sika-9,000 ngonyaka seSt James' Gate Brewery eDublin, e-Ireland.

translation.en: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation.zu: Eminyakeni engama-250 kamuva, i-Guinness ikhule yaba ibhizinisi lembulunga yonke elenza ama-euro angamabhiliyoni angu-10 (u-$14.7 wamabhiliyoni waseMelika ) njalo ngonyaka.

translation.en: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation.zu: UJonny Reid, umshayeli obambisene A1GP yeqembu laseNyuzilandi, namuhla wenze umlando ngokushayela ngesivinini esikhulu kakhulu ngaphesheya kwe-Auckland Harbour Bridge eneminyaka engu-48 ubudala, eNyuzilandi, ngokomthetho.

translation.en: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation.zu: UMnu Reid ukwaze ukushayela imoto ye-A1GP yaseNyuzilandi, iBlack Beauty ngesivinini esingaphezu kuka-160km/h izikhathi eziyisikhombisa ngaphesheya kwebhuloho.

translation.en: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation.zu: Amaphoyisa aseNyuzilandi abenenkinga yokusebenzisa izibhamu zawo zokubona isivinini ukubona ukuthi uMnu Reid wayeshesha kangakanani ngenxa yendlela i-Black Beauty ephansi ngayo, futhi okuwukuphela kwesikhathi lapho amaphoyisa ekwaze ukubona isivinini sikaMnu Reid bekuyilapho enciphisa isivinini eya ku-160km/h.

translation.en: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation.zu: Ezinyangeni ezingu-3 ezedlule, kukhululwe iziboshwa ezingaphezu kuka-80 esikhungweni Esikhulu Sokubhuka ngaphandle kokuthweshwa amacala ngokusemthethweni.

translation.en: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation.zu: Ngo-April kulonyaka, incwadi evimbelayo yesikhashana yakhishwa yiJaji u-Glyn ngokumelene nesakhiwo ukuphoqelela ukukhululwa kwalabo ababanjwe amahora angaphezu kuka-24 ngemva kokubanjwa kwabo ukhomishinali wenkantolo angakaze aqule icala labo.

translation.en: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation.zu: Ukhomishinali ubeka ibheyili, uma inikezwa, futhi wenza ukubekwa kwecala okwenziwe yiphoyisa elibophe isiboshwa kube ngokomthetho. Amacala ngemva kwalokho afakwa ohlelweni lwekhompyutha lombuso lapho icala lilandelelwa khona.

translation.en: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation.zu: Ukuthethwa kwecala kubuye kuphawule usuku lwelungelo lomsolwa lokuthotha ukuthethwa kwecala okusheshayo.

translation.en: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation.zu: U-Peter Cotello, umphathizimali wase-Australia kanye nendoda evame ukuphumelela uNdunankulu u-John Howard njengomholi weqembu i-Liberal ubonise ukweseka kwakhe inkampani kagesi esebenzisa i-nuclear e-Australia.

translation.en: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation.zu: UMnu Costello ukusho lokho lapho kuzalwa amandla enuzi iba namandla kwezomnotho, i-Australia kufanele iphishekele ukusetshenziswa kwayo.

translation.en: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation.zu: "Uma ethengiswa, kumelwe sibe nawo. Okungukuthi, akukho ukwenqaba okuyisimiso amandla wenuzi" kwasho uMnu Khostello.

translation.en: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation.zu: Ngokusho kuka-Ansa, "amaphoyisa ayekhathazekile ngokudubula okuningana okusezingeni eliphezulu ayesaba ukuthi kungasusa impi enkulu yokubanga izikhundla.

translation.en: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation.zu: Amaphoyisa athe uLo Piccolo uyaphumelela ngoba abe yisithenjwa sikaProvenzano ePalermo futhi ulwazi lwakhe olukhulu lwamenza wahlonishwa isizukulwane esidala sezingqongqo njengoba siphishekela isimiso sikaProvenzano sokungazidaluli sibe siqinisa ubuhlobo baso nabantu abanamandla.

translation.en: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation.zu: Lezi zingqongqo zazilinganiselwe amandla nguProvenzano uma eqeda impi eyayiholwa uRiina ngokumelene nombuso owabulala amaMafia ayelwela inkolo uGiovanni Falcone kanye noPaolo Borsellino ngo-1992.”

translation.en: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation.zu: Umphathi Omkhulu (CEO) we-Apple uSteve Jobs ubonise lomshini ngokuhamba aye esiteji akhiphe i-iPhone ephaketheni lojini wakhe.

translation.en: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi senkulumo yakhe eyathatha amahora angu-2 wathi: "Namuhla i-Apple izokwakha ngenye indlela ifoni, Sizokwenza umlando namuhla".

translation.en: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation.zu: IBrazil yizwe elikhulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni lamaRoma Katolika, futhi iSonto lamaRoma Katolika belilokhu limelene nokumiswa ngokomthetho kwemishado yobulili obufanayo ezweni.

translation.en: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation.zu: UKhongolose Wezwe waseBrazil ube nenkulumo-mpikiswano yokushadiswa imantshi iminyaka eyishumi, futhi ukushadiswa imantshi okunjalo kungokomthetho kuphela e-Rio Grande do Sul.

translation.en: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation.zu: Umthetho ovivinywayo wasekuqaleni walotshwa imeya yangaphambili yaseSão Paulo, uMarta Suplicy. Umthetho ohlongozwayo, ngemva kokuba ulungiswe, manje usezandleni zikaRoberto Jefferson.

translation.en: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation.zu: Ababhikishi banethemba lokuthi bazothola abantu abazosayina isicelo abayizigidi ezingu-1.2 ukusethula kuKhongolose Wezwe ngoNovemba.

translation.en: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokuba kubonakale ukuthi imindeni eminingi yayidinga usizo olungokomthetho lokulwisana nokuxoshwa, umhlangano wabanjwa ngoMashi 20 e-East Bay Community Law Center wezisulu zokukhwabanisa kwezindlu.

translation.en: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation.zu: Lapho abaqashi beqala ukukhuluma ngalokho okwenzeke kubo, iningi lemindeni ehilelekile laqaphela ngokushesha ukuthi uCarolyn Wilson we-OHA webe imali yabo yesibambiso, futhi wabaleka edolobheni.

translation.en: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation.zu: Abantu abahlala ezivandeni zaseL Lockwood bakholelwa ukuthi imindeni engama 40 kungenzeka ibhekene nokuxoshwa. njengoba befunde ukuthi amaphoyisa eOHA aphenya nezinye izakhiwo zomphakathi eOakland ezingase zibanjwe odabeni lwezindlu.

translation.en: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation.zu: Iqembu likhansele umbukiso eMaui's War Memorial Stadium, okwakumelwe uhanjelwe abantu abangu-9,000, futhi laxolisa kubathandi balo.

translation.en: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation.zu: Inkampani yokuphatha amabhendi, iHK Ubuphathi Inc., ayinikanga isizathu sasekuqaleni sokukhansela ngoSeptemba 20, kodwa yasola izizathu ezingokomsebenzi ngosuku olulandelayo.

translation.en: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation.zu: Abameli bamaGreki abadumile, uSakis Kechagioglou kanye noGeorge Nikolakopoulos baboshiwe ejele lase-Athene laseKorydallus, njengoba batholwe banecala lokukhwabanisa nokukhohlakala.

translation.en: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yalokhu, isihlamba esikhulu emphakathini ongokomthetho wamaGriki saphakama ngokuvezwa kwezenzo ezingekho emthethweni zabahluleli, izazi zomthetho, abasizi babameli kanye nabameli abazenzile ngonyaka wangaphambili.

translation.en: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation.zu: Emavikini ambalwa adlule, ngemva kokuba ukwaziswa okusakazwe intatheli uMakis Triantafylopoulos ohlelweni lwakhe okuthandwayo lweThelevishini “iZoungla” ku-Alfa TV, ilungu lePhalamende nommeli, uPetros Mantouvalos wayekiswa isikhundla njengoba amalungu wehhovisi lakhe ayethintekile ekuthatheni imali ngokungemthetho nasenkohlakalweni.

translation.en: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ijaji eliphezulu u-Evangelos Kalousus ligwetshiwe njengoba litholakale linecala lokukhwabanisa kanye nokuziphatha okungafanele.

translation.en: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation.zu: URoberts wenqaba ngokuphelele ukusho ukuthi ukholelwa ukuthi impilo iqala nini, umbuzo obalulekile uma ucabanga ngezimiso zokuziphatha, ethi kuyoba ukuziphatha okungamukeleki ukuphawula ngezici ezithile zezimo ezingenzeka.

translation.en: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation.zu: Uye waphinda, nokho, amazwi akhe angaphambili okuthi icala likaRoe ngokumelene noWade “kwakuwumthetho wezwe omisiwe”, egcizelela ukubaluleka kokuba Inkatholo Ephakame ikhiphe izinqumo ezifanayo njalo.

translation.en: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation.zu: Ubuye waqinisekisa ukuthi wayekholelwa elungelweni elisikiselwe lokuba nemfihlo lelo isinqumo saseRoe esasixhomeke kulo.

translation.en: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation.zu: I-Maroochydore yayiqede phezulu kwesitebhisi, yaqoqa amaphuzu ayisithupha kune-Noosa eyayingeyesibili.

translation.en: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translation.zu: Amaqembu amabili ayezohlangana emdlalweni omkhulu owandulela owamanqamu lapho iNoosa iwine ngamaphuzu angu-11.

translation.en: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation.zu: I-Maroochydore inqobe i-Caboonlture kuma-Preliminary Final.

translation.en: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation.zu: IHesperonychus elizabethae uhlobo lomndeni weDromaesauridae futhi umzala weVelociraptor.

translation.en: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation.zu: Lenyoni esinezimpaphe ngokugcwele, ethanda ukudliwa izinyoni ezidla ezinye kukholelwa ukuthi ibihamba ngezinyawo ezimbili ezinezinzipho njenge-Velociraptor.

translation.en: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation.zu: Izipho layo lesibili belilikhudlwana, okwenza yabizwa ngokuthi yi-Hesperonychus okusho ukuthi “izipho lasentshonalanga.”

translation.en: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kweqhwa eliphahlazayo, isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu sasiphazamisa imizamo yokuhlenga.

translation.en: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translation.zu: UPittman usikisele ukuthi isimo angeke sibe ngcono kuze kube iviki elizayo.

translation.en: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translation.zu: Isilinganiso kanye nokuba ugqinsi luka-ayisi, ngokusho kuka Pittman, lokhu kubanzima kulaba abavalayo kusukela eminyakeni engu-15 edlule.

translation.en: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation.zu: Izindaba zisakazekile emphakathini waseRed Lake namuhla njengoba izinkonzo zemingcwabo kaJeff Weise kanye nezisulu ezintathu kweziyisishiyagalolunye zaziqhubeka omunye umfundi ubanjiwe ngokuhlobene nokudubula kwasesikoleni ngoMashi 21.

translation.en: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translation.zu: Iziphathimandla zisho okuncane okungokomthetho ngaphezu kokuqinisekisa ukuboshwa kwanamuhla.

translation.en: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, umthombo onolwazi lokuphenya utshele i-Minneapolis Star Tribunr ukuthi bekungu-Louis Jourdain, indodana eneminyaka engu-16 ubudala kaSihlalo Wesizwe se-Red Lake uFloyd Jourdain.

translation.en: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translation.zu: Akukaziwa njengamanje ukuthi kuzobekwa maphi amacala noma yini eholele iziphathimandla kulomfana kodwa amacala entsha aseqalile enkantolo .

translation.en: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation.zu: ULodin ubuye wathi iziphathimandla zinqume ukumisa ukhetho oluqhubekayo ukuze zilondolozele abantu base-Afghanistan izindleko kanye nezingozi zokuphepha zolunye ukhetho.

translation.en: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation.zu: Amanxusa athe athole ukungacaci okwanele emthethweni-sisekelo wase-Afghanistan ukunquma ukuthi ukhetho oluqhubekayo aludingeki.

translation.en: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuphikisana nemibiko yangaphambili, ethe ukumisa umkhankaso kwakuzoba okumelene nomthetho-sisekelo.

translation.en: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translation.zu: Indiza yayilibangise e-Irkutsk futhi yayiqondiswa amabutho angaphakathi.

translation.en: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation.zu: Isikhalazo sesifakiwe ukuze sicwaningwe.

translation.en: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation.zu: I-Il-76 ibe isici esikhulu kokubili sebutho laseRashiya kanye naseSoviet Union kusukela ngawo-1970, futhi isibone ingozi enkulu eRashiya ngenyanga edlule.

translation.en: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation.zu: Ngo-October 7 injini yaphuma lapho indiza isuka, kwangabi nolimalayo. IRashiya imise ama-ll-76 okwesikhashana ngemva kwaleyo ngozi.

translation.en: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation.zu: Amamayela angu-800 weTrans-Alaska Pipeline System ayevaliwe ukulandela ukuvuza kwemiphongolo eyizinkulungwane kawoyela ongahluziwe eningizimu yeFairbanks, e-Alaska.

translation.en: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation.zu: Ukungabi khona kukagesi ngemva kokuhlolwa okuvamile kohlelo lwezicima-mlilo lubangele umgudu wokufutha ukuba uvuleke futhi uwoyela ongahluziwe wachitheka eduza nesiteshi sokumpompa 9.

translation.en: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translation.zu: Ukuvuleka kwamavalvu kuvumela ukuphuma komoya ohlelweni bese uwoyela wehlela ethangini elingaphatha imiphongolo engu-55,000 (amagaloni ayizigidi ezingu-2.3).

translation.en: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translation.zu: Kusukela ngoLwesithathu emini, ama-tank vent ayesavuza cishe ngenxa yokwanda kwamanzi okubangelwa ukushisa phakathi kwethangi.

translation.en: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translation.zu: Enye indawo yesibili yokugcina ngaphansi kwamathangi ekwazi ukugcina imiphongolo engu-104,500 yayingagcwele ngokuphelele.

translation.en: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translation.zu: Ukuphawula, okwenzeka ngaleso sikhathi kuthelevishini, bekungokokuqala lapho imithombo emikhulu yase-Iran ivume ukuthi ukujezisa kunethonya elithile.

translation.en: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translation.zu: Kuhlanganisa ukukhawulisa ngokwezimali kanye nokuvimbela kweNyunyoni yaseYurophu ukuthunyelwa kowoyela ongahluziwe kwamanye amazwe, lapho umnotho wase-Iran uthola khona u-80% wemali evela kwamanye amazwe.

translation.en: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translation.zu: Embikweni wabo wamuva wanyanga zonke, i-OPEC ithi ukuthunyelwa kukawoyela ongahluziwe kwehle kwafinyelela ezingeni lako eliphansi izikhathi ezingamashumi amabili ngemiphongolo eyizigidi ezingu-2.8 ngosuku.

translation.en: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translation.zu: Umbusi ophakeme wezwe, u-Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, uchaze ukuncika kuwoyela "njengesicupho" esibe khona kusukela ngaphambi kokuvukela kwamaSulumane wase-Iran ngo-1979 futhi lokho izwe okumelwe lizikhulule kukho.

translation.en: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translation.zu: Lapho umkhumbi-mkhathi ufika eMhlabeni futhi ungena emkhathini, cishe ngo-5 ekuseni (ngokwesikhathi sasempumalanga) kulindeleke ukuba wenze umbukwane wokukhanya wabantu baseNyakatho California, e-Oregon, eNavada, kanye nase-Utah.

translation.en: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translation.zu: I-capsule ibukeka lifana kakhulu njengenkanyezi eshwibeka inqamula esibhakabhakeni.

translation.en: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation.zu: Umkhumbi-mkhathi uzobe uhamba cishe ngo-12.8 km noma amamayela angu-8 ngomzuzwana, ushesha ngokwanele ukuthi ungasuka e-San Francisco uye e-Los Angeles ngomzuzu owodwa.

translation.en: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translation.zu: I-Stardust uzobeka irekhodi elisha elizohlala-njalo ngokuba indizamshini esheshayo ukubuya emhlabeni, iphule irekhodi eledlule elabekwa ngo-May 1969 phakathi nokubuya kuka-Apollo X.

translation.en: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translation.zu: "Izohamba ngaphezu kogu olusentshonalanga yasenyakatho California idlule maphakathi ne-Oregon, futhi iqhubekele eNevada nase-Idaho bese iya e-Utah," u-Tom Duxbury, umphathi wephrojekthi yeStardust washo.

translation.en: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translation.zu: Isinqumo sikaMnu. Rudd sokusayina isivumelwano sase-Kyoto sesimo sezulu sivalela ngaphandle iMelika, manje osekuzoba ukuphela kwezwe elithuthukile elingasisayinile lesi sivumelwano.

translation.en: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translation.zu: Uhulumeni wase-Australia odla ngoludala wenqabe ukuvumela iKyoto, uthi izolimaza umnotho ngokuxhomeka kwayo kakhulu ekuthunyelweni kwamalahle kwamanye amazwe, kuyilapho amazwe anjengeNdiya neShayina ayengaboshwe imigomo yentuthu ephumayo.

translation.en: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translation.zu: Inzuzo enkulu kunazo zonke emlandweni we-eBay.

translation.en: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translation.zu: Inkampani yethemba ukusabalalisa ibhizinisi layo futhi ithandwe ezindaweni lapho i-Skype inamandla khona, njengaseShayina, eMpumalanga Yurophu, kanye naseBrazil.

translation.en: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translation.zu: Ososayensi basola i-Enceladus njengeqhubeka nokwakheka futhi njengaba umthombo wendandatho yeqhwa yeSaturn.

translation.en: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translation.zu: I-Enceladus ingelinye iplanethi elibonakalisayo kakhulu ohlelweni lomkhathi. Ibonakalisa ukukhanya kwelanga okuhlaba kulo okungamaphesenti angu-90.

translation.en: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translation.zu: Umenzi wamageyimu iKonami isho namuhla ephephandabeni laseJapani ukuthi ngeke ikhulule igeyimu leziNsuku Eziyisithupha eFallujah.

translation.en: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translation.zu: Umdlalo usekelwe Empini Yesibili yaseFalluja, impi yesihluku phakathi kwamabutho aseMelika kanye ne-Iraq.

translation.en: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translation.zu: I-ACMA iphinde yathola ukuthi ngaphezu kokuboniswa kwevidiyo kuyi-inthanethi, i-Big Brother ayiphulanga imithetho yokubonisa izinto kuyi-inthanethi njengoba okwakuboniswa bekungagcinwanga ewebhusayithini ye-Big Brother.

translation.en: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translation.zu: IBroadcasting Services Act inikeza iziqondiso zokuqukethwe kwe-inthanethi, nokho ukuze kuthathwe njengokuqukethwe kwe-inthanethi, kumelwe kuhlale kuyi-server ngokoqobo.

translation.en: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translation.zu: Indlu yamanxusa yaseMelika ese-Nairobi, eKenya ikhipe isixwayiso sokuthi "abeqisi base-Somalia” bahlela ukuhlasela ngokuziqhumisa ngebhomu eKenya naseTopiya.

translation.en: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translation.zu: IMelika ithi ithole ukwaziswa emthonjweni ongadalulwanga lowo okhuluma ngokukhethekile ngokusetshenziswa kwabantu abazibulala ngokuziqhumisa ukuqhumisa "izindawo ezivelele" eTopiya kanye naseKenya.

translation.en: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translation.zu: Kudala ngaphambi koHlelo lwaNsukuzonke noMbiko kaKholbhethi, uHeck noJohnson bacabanga ukushicilela okwakuzolingisa ngokubhuqa izindaba—kanye nokubika izindaba—lapho besengabafundi e-UW, ngo-1988.

translation.en: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translation.zu: Kusukela ekusungulweni kwayo, iThe Onion ibe uhlelo olulingisa izindaba olukhulu olunokwethenjelwa, olunezindaba ezishicilelwayo, iwebhusayithi edonse izivakashi ezihlukile ezi-5,000,000 enyangeni ka-Okthoba, izikhangiso zomuntu siqu, inethiwekhi yezindaba yamahora angu-24, ama-podcast, kanye nencwadi yamabalazwe esanda kumiswa ebizwa ngokuthi Our Dumb World.

translation.en: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translation.zu: U-Al Gore noJenene u-Tommy Franks bazixoxela ngezindaba zabo ezisematheni abazithandayo (Eyayithandwa u-Gore bekuyilapho u-The Onion ebika ukuthi yena no-Tipper babejabulela ezocansi ezimnandi kakhulu ekuphleni kwabo ngemva kokunqotshwa kwakhe Okhethweni lweKholeji luka-2000) .

translation.en: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translation.zu: Iningi lababhali libe nethonya elikhulu ezinhlelweni zamahlaya zokulingisa izindaba zikaJon Stewart noStephen Colbert.

translation.en: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translation.zu: Isenzakalo sobuciko siyingxenye futhi yomkhankaso weHhlolo leDolobha laseBucharest ofuna ukuqalisa kabusha umcabango wesiqongo saseRomaniya njengedolobha elikhulu lokusungula nelinempilo.

translation.en: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translation.zu: Idolobha lizoba elokuqala eYurophu eseningizimu mpumalanga lokubungaza iCowParade, isehlakalo esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni zezobuciko, phakathi kukaJuni no-Agasti kulonyaka.

translation.en: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
translation.zu: Isaziso sanamuhla sinwebe ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni okwenziwe ngoMashi walonyaka sokuxhasa izinkalishi.

translation.en: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
translation.zu: Ezingu-300 ezengeziwe zenza ingqikithi ibe ngu-1,300 wezinkalishi okumelwe zitholwe ukuze kuncishiswe ukubutheleka.

translation.en: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
translation.zu: UChristopher Garcia, umkhulumeli woMnyango wamaPhoyisa waseLos Angeles, uthe indoda eyisiboshwa esingumsolwa iphenyelwa ukweqa kunokuhuluza.

translation.en: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
translation.zu: Isibonakaliso besingalimanga ngokoqobo; ukulingiswa kwenziwa kusetshenziswa oseyili abamnyama abahlotshiswe ngezimpawu zokuthula nenhliziyo ukuguqula “u-O” afundeke njengohlamvu oluncane “u-e”.

translation.en: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
translation.zu: Ukuhlehla nokubuya kolwandle okubomvu kubangelwa ukugcwala okungaphezu kokuvamile kwe-Kareniya brevis, isidalwa sasolwandle sengqamuzana elilodwa esiba khona ngokwemvelo.

translation.en: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
translation.zu: Izici ezingokwemvelo zingahlangana ukuze zenze izimo ezikahle, ezivumela ulwelwe ukuba lukhule kakhulu ngenani.

translation.en: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
translation.zu: Ulwele lwenza ubuthi obungaxhwalisa izinzwa kokubili ebantwini nasezinhlanzini.

translation.en: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
translation.zu: Esikhathini esiningi izinhlanzi zibulawa ubuthi obuningi obusemanzini.

translation.en: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
translation.zu: Abantu bangathinteka ngokuphefumula amanzi athintekile ayiswa emoyeni umoya namagagasi.

translation.en: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
translation.zu: Lapho sinamandla khona, Isiphepho i-Gonu, esibizwe ngegama lesikhwama samahlamvu esundu ngolimi lwesi-Maldives, saba nemimoya engamakhilomitha angu-240 ngehora (amamayela ayi-149 ngehora).

translation.en: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
translation.zu: Ngasekuseni namuhla, imimoya cishe beyiku-83 km/h, futhi bekulindeleke ukuthi iqhubeke iphelelwa amandla.

translation.en: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
translation.zu: NgoLwesithathu, iNhlangano yeZwe ye-Basketball yaseMelika (NBA) imise yonke imidlalo ye-basketball yeprofeshinali yalesizini ngenxa yokukhathazeka nge-COVID 19.

translation.en: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
translation.zu: Isinqumo se-NBA silandele lapho umdlali we-Utah Jazz etholakale ukuthi unegciwane le-COVID-19.

translation.en: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
translation.zu: "Ngokusekelwe kulomvubukulo, lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuhlukana okwangaphambili kakhulu kunalokho okwakusikiselwa ubufakazi bamangqamuzana.

translation.en: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
translation.zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi yonke into kumelwe ibuyiselwe emuva," kwasho umcwaningi kuyiRift Valley Research Service eTopiya kanye nomlobi obambisene wocwaningo, uBerhane Asfaw.

translation.en: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
translation.zu: Kuze kube manje, i-AOL ikwazile ukuhambisa nokuthuthukisa imakethe ye-IM ngesivinini sayo, ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kabanzi kwayo phakathi neMelika.

translation.en: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
translation.zu: Ngokusebenza kwaleli lungiselelo, inkululeko ingaphela.

translation.en: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
translation.zu: Isibalo sabasebenzisa izinkonzo ze-Yahoo! kanye ne-Microsoft sihlangene sizodlula isibalo samakhasimende we-AOL.

translation.en: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
translation.zu: Ibhange laseNyakatho Rock lenziwe elezwe lonke ngo-2008 ngemva kokuvezwa ukuthi inkampani ithole usizo oluphuthumayo oluvela kuHulumeni wase-UK.

translation.en: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
translation.zu: INorthern Rock icele ukusekelwa ngenxa yokuchayeka kwayo phakathi nenhlekelele yesikweletu esibi sezindlu ngo-2007.

translation.en: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
translation.zu: I-Virgin Group kaMnumzane - Richard Branson yayinebhidi yebhange eyanqatshelwa ngaphambili kokuba leli bhange libe elezwe.

translation.en: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
translation.zu: Ngo-2010, nakuba lenziwe elezwe, ibhange eliphezulu lamanje i-Northern Rock plc lahlukaniswa ‘ebhange elibi‘, i-Northern Rock (Ukuphatha Impahla)

translation.en: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
translation.zu: I-Virgin ithenge ‘ibhange elihle’ lase-Roch eseNyakatho kuphela, hhayi inkampani yokuphatha impahla.

translation.en: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
translation.zu: Lokhu kukholelwa ukuthi isikhathi sesihlanu emlandweni lapho abantu bebone okuqinisekiswe ngokwamakhemikhali ngokuthi izinto eziwele eMhlabeni zivela eMars.

translation.en: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
translation.zu: Phakathi kwamatshe acishe abe ngu-24,000 awaziwayo awele eMhlabeni, cishe angu-34 kuphela aqinisekiswe ukuthi avela e-Mars.

translation.en: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
translation.zu: Amadwala ayishumi nanhlanu kulawa kuthiwa enziwe amatshe awa emkhathini ngoJulayi odlule.

translation.en: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
translation.zu: Amanye wamatshe, anqabe kakhulu eMhlabeni, athengiswa kusukela ku-US$11,000 kuya ku-US$22,500 i-awunsi ngalinye, okucishe kube yizikhathi eziyishumi ngaphezu kwenani legolide.

translation.en: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
translation.zu: Ukulandela umjaho, uKeselowski usengumholi weDrivers' Championship ngamaphuzu angu-2250,

translation.en: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
translation.zu: Ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa emuva, uJohnson ungowesibili ngo-2,243,

translation.en: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
translation.zu: Okwesithathu, i-Hamlin isele emuva ngamaphuzu ayishumi nambili, kodwa amahlanu ngaphambi kuka-Bowyer. I-Kahne kanye ne-Truex, i-Jr. ingeyesihlanu kanye nesithupha ngokulandelana ngamaphuzu angu-2,220 nangu-2,207.

translation.en: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
translation.zu: USteward, uGordon, uKenseth, kanye noHarvick baqedela uhlu lwezikhundla eziyishumi eziphezulu zoBungqwele babaShayeli njengoba kusele imijaho emine kuyisizini.

translation.en: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
translation.zu: IButho leMikhumbi laseMelika nalo lithe belisaphenya loludaba.

translation.en: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
translation.zu: Babuye bathi kusitatimende, “Iqembu liyasebenza manje ukuthola indlela enhle kakhulu yokukhipha umkhumbi”.

translation.en: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
translation.zu: Umkhumbi woMphindiseli wohlobo lwemayini wokuzivikela, umkhumbi bowusendleleni eya e e-Puerto Princesa ePalawan.

translation.en: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
translation.zu: Inikezwe i-U.S. Navy Seventh Fleet futhi izinze e-Sasebo, e-Nagasaki e-Japan.

translation.en: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
translation.zu: Abahlaseli baseMumbai bafika ngesikebhe ngoNovemba 26, 2008, beza namabhomu ajikijelwayo, izikhali ezizishintshayo futhi bahlasela izindawo eziningana kuhlanganise nesiteshi sezitimela sase- Chhatrapati ShivaJi Terminus esinabantu abaningi kanye neHotela elidumile iTaj Mahal.

translation.en: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
translation.zu: Ukuhlola nokuqongelela ukwaziswa kukaDavid Headley kwasiza ekuvumeleni umsebenzi wamasosha anezibhamu angu-10 asuka eqenjini lebutho lasePakistan iLaskhar-e-Taiba.

translation.en: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
translation.zu: Ukuhlasela kwenza kube nobunzima phakathi kobudlelwane baseNdiya nePakistan.

translation.en: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.

translation.en: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
translation.zu: U-Perry uthe ngokukhethekile, "Kunezindawo ezimbalwa emhlabeni ezilungele kangcono ukuhlangabezana nenselele ekhona kulesi simo."

translation.en: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
translation.zu: Umbusi futhi uthe, “Namhlanje, sifunde ukuthi ezinye izingane zeminyaka yezingane zesikole ziphawulwe ngokuthi zibeseduze nesiguli.”

translation.en: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
translation.zu: Waqhubeka ngokuthi, “Lolu daba lubucayi. Qinisekani ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lusebenza kahle ngendlela okumelwe lusebenze ngayo.”

translation.en: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
translation.zu: Uma kungaqinisekiswa, okutholakele kuqeda iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili yokuhlola kuka-Allen iMusashi.

translation.en: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
translation.zu: Ukulandela imephu yesihlabathi solwandle ukuphahlazeka kwatholwa ngokusebenzisa i-ROV.

translation.en: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
translation.zu: Omunye wabantu abacebe kakhulu basemhlabeni, u-Allen kubikwa ukuthi utshale ingcebo yakhe eningi ekuhloleni okwenzeka olwandle futhi waqala ukucinga iMusashi ngemva kwesithakazelo sempilo yonke empini.

translation.en: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
translation.zu: Waduma ngokugxekwabucayi ngesikhathi sakhe e-Atlanta futhi wahlonishwa ngemfundo yesimanje yasemadolobheni.

translation.en: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
translation.zu: Ngo-2009 wanikwa isiqu sikaNsumpa weZwe lonke Wonyaka.

translation.en: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
translation.zu: Ngenkathi yomklomelo, izikole zase-Atlanta zazibone intuthuko enkulu kumamaki okuhlolwa.

translation.en: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
translation.zu: Ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, iThe Atlanta Journal-Constitution ishicilele umbiko oveza izinkinga ngemiphumela yokuhlolwa.

translation.en: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
translation.zu: Umbiko ukhombise ukuthi imiphumela yezivivinyo ikhuphuke ngokushesha, kanti futhi usola ukuthi lesi sikole sathole izinkinga ngaphakathi kodwa asenzanga lutho ngalokhu okutholakele.

translation.en: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

translation.en: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
translation.zu: Uhulumeni wase-Ireland ugcizelela ukwenza umthetho wasephalamende ngokushesha ukulungisa isimo.

translation.en: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.
translation.zu: "Manje kubalulekile kukho kokubili impilo yomphakathi kanye nobulungisa ebugebengwini ukuthi umthetho udlale indima ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka," kusho okhulumela uhulumeni.

translation.en: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
translation.zu: UNgqongqoshe weZempilo wazwakalisa ukukhathazeka kokubili ngenhlalakashe yabantu ngabanye abasizakala ngokumiswa ngokomthetho kwesikhashana kwezidakamizwa ezihilelekile, kanye nangokuboshwa okuhlobene nezidakamizwa okwenziwe kusukela ushinsho manje olusemthethweni-sisekelo luqale ukusebenza.

translation.zu: Kusukela ngobusuku buka-Agasti 9, iso lesiphepho iMorakot besicishe sibe amakhilomitha angamashumi ayisikhombisakude nesifundazwe saseShayina saseFujiana.

translation.en: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

translation.en: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
translation.zu: Abagibeli banikwa amanzi njengoba belinde ekushiseni okungama-90(F)-digiliyi.

translation.en: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
translation.zu: Ukaputeni wezomlilo uScott Kouns uthe, "Bekuwusuku olushisayo eSanta Clara ngamazinga okushiwa ako-90.

translation.en: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
translation.zu: Awuna kukhululeka ukuhlala esitimeleni esithusayo sasendaweni yokuzijabulisa noma isikhathi eside kangakanani , ukusho nje, futhi kuthathe okungenani ihora ukususa umuntu wokuqala esitimeleni."

translation.en: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
translation.zu: UShumacher othathe umhlalaphansi ngo-2006 ngomva kokuwina umncintiswano weFormula 1 izikhathi eziyisikhombisa, kwakumelwe athathele indawo uFelipe Massa olimele.

translation.en: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.zu: Lo muntu waseBrazili walimala kakhulu ekhanda ngemva kokungqubuzana phakathi noMjaho Wezimoto waseHangari, ngo-2009.

translation.zu: UMassa angeke atholakale okungenani isizini ka-2009 yonke.

translation.en: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
translation.zu: Imiphumela yokuhlola iveze ukuthi u-Arias uphethwe igciwane elingelibi kakhulu, kusho uNgqongqoshe kaMongameli uRodrigo Arias.

translation.en: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
translation.zu: Isimo sikamongameli sizinzile, nakuba ezohlukaniswa abe yedwa ekhaya izinsukwana.

translation.en: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
translation.zu: "Ngaphandle kwemfiva nomminzo obuhlungu, ngizizwa ngikahle futhi ngikulungele ukwenza umsebenzi wami ngokuxhumana ngocingo.

translation.en: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
translation.zu: Ngilindele ukubuyela emisebenzini yami yonke ngoMsombuluko," kwasho u-Arias esitatimendeni.

translation.en: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
translation.zu: I-Felicia, okwakuyisiphepho seSigaba 4 eSikalini seZiphepho sikaSaffir-Simpson, yaphelelwa amandla ngenxa yokucindezela okushisayo ngaphambi kokunyamalala ngoLwesibili.

translation.en: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
translation.zu: Izinsalela zayo zakhiqiza imifafazo eziqhingini eziningi, nakuba njengamanje, ayikho imibiko yomonakalo noma izikhukhula ebekhona.

translation.en: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
translation.zu: Imvula, eyafinyelela amayintshi angu-6.34 esilinganisweni kuyi -Oahu, yachazwa ngokuthi "inenzuzo".

translation.en: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
translation.zu: Enye yemvula beyihambisana nokuduma kwezulu kanye nemibani eminingi.

translation.en: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
translation.zu: ITwin Otter beyizama ukuhlika eKokoda izolo njenge-Arlines PNG Flight CG4684, kodwa iyekile kanye kakade.

translation.en: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
translation.zu: Cishe imizuzu eyishumi ngaphambi kwesikhathi okwakulindelwe ukuthi ifike ngaso kusuka ekusondeleni kwayo kwesibili yanyamalala.

translation.en: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
translation.zu: Indawo yokuphahlazeka itholwe namuhla futhi akufinyeleleki kuyo kangangokuthi amaphoyisa amabili esilisa abekwa ehlathini ukuze ahambe ngezinyawo aye andaweni yesehlakalo futhi afune abasindile.

translation.en: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
translation.zu: Ukuthungatha kuthikamezwe isimo sezulu esibi esifanayo leso esibangele ukuhlika kwendiza okunqandiwe.

translation.en: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
translation.zu: Ngokwemibiko, ifulethi eMacbeth Street liqhumile ngenxa yokuvuza kwegesi.

translation.en: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
translation.zu: Isiphathimandla senkapani yegesi saya endaweni yesigameko ngemva kokuba umakhelwane ebike ukuvuza kwegesi.

translation.en: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
translation.zu: Lapho kufika izikhulu, ifulethi yaqhuma.

translation.en: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
translation.zu: Akukho ukulimala okutheni okubikiwe, kodwa okungenani abantu abahlanu abakade bese ndaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi sokuqhuma balashelwe izimpawu zokuthuka.

translation.en: No one was inside the apartment.
translation.zu: Akukho muntu owayephakathi kwefulethi.

translation.en: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
translation.zu: Ngaleso sikhathi, zibalelwa cishe ku-100 izakhamuzi ezakhishwa endawe$ni.

translation.en: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
translation.zu: Igalufu kanye nerugbhi kokubili kulungele ukubuyela Emidlalweni ye-Olimpiki.

translation.en: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
translation.zu: I-International Olympic Committee ivotele ukuhlanganisa imidlalo emhlanganweni webhodi yabaphathi eBerlin namuhla. I-rugby, ngokukhethekhile inyunyoni ye-rugby, kanye negalufu zikhethiwe emidlalweni emihlanu eminye ukucatshangalwe ukuthi ihlanganyele kuma-Olimpiki.

translation.en: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
translation.zu: I-squash, i-karate, kanye nemidlalo ye-roller izame ukungena ohlelweni lwama-Olimpiki kanye ne-baseball ne-softball, ezivotelwe ukuba ziphume Emidlalweni yama-Olimpiki ngo-2005.

translation.en: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
translation.zu: Ukhetho kusamelwe luvunyelwe yi-IOC engcwele emhlanganweni wayo wango-Okthoba eCopenhagen.

translation.en: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
translation.zu: Akusiyibo bonke ababesekela ukuvunyelwa kwabesifazane emaqenjini.

translation.en: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."
translation.zu: Othole imedali yesiliva emdlalweni wama-Olimpiki ngo-2004 u-Amir Khan uthe, "Ekujuleni ngaphakathi ngicabanga ukuthi abantu besifazane akumelwe ukuthi balwe. Umbono wami lowo."

translation.en: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kokuphawula kwakhe uthe uzosekela abaqophisana nabase-British emidlalweni yama-Olempikhi ayebanjelwa e-London ngo-2012.

translation.en: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
translation.zu: Icala liqulwe e-Birmingham Crown Court futhi liphele ngomhlaka-3 Agasti.

translation.en: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.

translation.en: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
translation.zu: UBlake usolwe nangokuzama ukuvimbela ubulungisa ukuba benzeke.

translation.en: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.

translation.en: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
translation.zu: Amandla amnyama ngamandla angabonakali angayeki ukuhlukumeza umhlaba.

translation.en: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
translation.zu: Ukuba khona kwayo kwaziwa kuphela ngomphumela wayo ekunwebekeni kwembulunga yonke.

translation.en: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
translation.zu: Ososayensi bathole ukuma kwezwe okugcwele enyangeni okubizwa ngokuthi ama-lobate scarp okubonakala sengathi avele ekuncipheni kwenyanga kancane kancane.

translation.en: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
translation.zu: Lezi zigeqe zitholakale yonke indawo enyangeni futhi zibonakala zonakele kancane, okubonisa ukuthi izenzakalo zejiyoloji ezizenzile ezakamuva.

translation.en: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
translation.zu: Lenkumbulo iphikisana nokusho ukuthi inyanga ayinawo umsebenzi wokwakhekha ngokuphelele.

translation.en: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
translation.zu: Indoda isolwa ngoshayela imoto enamasondo amathathu eneziqhumane iyiqondise esixukwini.

translation.en: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.

translation.en: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

translation.en: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.

translation.en: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.

translation.en: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

translation.en: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
translation.zu: Kusukela ekuzimeleni kwePakistan kusuka embusweni wamaNgisi ngo-1947, uMongameli wasePakistan umise "Abaphatheli Bombusazwe" ukuba babuse iFATA, abanokulawula okucishe kuphelele kulezi zindawo.

translation.en: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translation.zu: Laba baphatheli banomthwalo wokunikeza izinkonzo zikahulumeni kanye nezokwahlulela ngaphansi koMthetho 247 woMthetho-sisekelo wasePakistan.

translation.en: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translation.zu: Ihostela libhidlikile eMecca, idolobha elingcwele lobuSulumane cishe ngehora lika-10 namuhla ekuseni ngesikhathi sendawo.

translation.en: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translation.zu: Isakhiwo besihlalisa abahambeli ababezovakasha edolobheni elingcwele ngosuku olwandulela i-hajj pilgrimage.

translation.en: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translation.zu: Iningi lezivakashi zehostela bekuyizakhamuzi zase-United Arab Emirates.

translation.en: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translation.zu: Isibalo sabashonile okungenani singu-15, isibalo okulindelwe ukuba sinyuke.

translation.en: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translation.zu: ULeonov, obuye aziwe ngokuthi "i-cosmonaut No, 11", wayeyingxenye yeqembu lezisebenzi zasemkhathini lasekuqaleni laseSoviet Union.

translation.en: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translation.zu: NgoMashi-18, 1965, wenze umsebenzi wokuqala wangaphandle kwenqola-mkhathi (i-EVA), noma "ukuhamba emkhathini", ehlala yedwa ngaphandle kwenqola-mkhathi isikhathi esicishe sibe ngaphezu kwemizuzu eyishumi nambili

translation.en: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translation.zu: Wamukele "Iqhawe laseSoviet Union", isiqholiso esikhulu kunazo zonke zaseSoviet Union, ngenxa yomsebenzi wakhe.

translation.en: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translation.zu: Ngemva kweminyaka eyishumi, wahola ingxenye yomkhankaso we-Apollo-Soyuz Soviet ebonisa ukuthi Umshudiliswano Wasemkhathini wase uphelile.

translation.en: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translation.zu: Wathi, "Ayikho imibiko esikisela ukuthi ukuhlaselwa kumelwe kulindelwe maduzane.

translation.en: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translation.zu: Nokho, ukuncishiswa kwezinga losongo ukuthi libe libi akusho ukuthi usongo oluphelele alusekho."

translation.en: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translation.zu: Nakuba iziphathimandla zingaqiniseki ngobuqiniso bosongo, iMaryland Transportation Authority yenze ukuvala ngoba icelwe yiFBI.

translation.en: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translation.zu: Amaloli athutha imfucumfucu ayesetshenziselwa ukuvimba izindawo zokungena ojantshini ohamba ngaphansi komhlaba futhi usizo lwamaphoyisa angu-80 belukhona ukuqondisa abashayeli bezimoto kwezinye izindlela.

translation.en: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translation.zu: Bekungekho ukulibaziseka ngenxa yezimoto eziningi okubikiwe emgwaqweni omkhulu, enye indlela yokungena edolobheni.

translation.en: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translation.zu: INigeria esikhathini esidlule imemezele ukuthi ihlela ukujoyina i-AfCFTA ngeviki lomhlangano.

translation.en: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translation.zu: Inxusa lokuhweba nezimboni lase-AU u-Albert Muchanga umemezele ukuthi i-Benin ijoyinile.

translation.en: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translation.zu: Ukhomishana uthe, "Asikavumelani ngokuthi izothini imithetho yesiqalo nokuncishiswa kwamanani wezimpahla ezilethwa ezweni, kodwa isimiso esinaso sanele ukuqala ukuhweba ngomhlaka-1 July, 2020".

translation.en: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translation.zu: Isiteshi sagcina isimo saso sengqondo, nangaphezu kokulahlekelwa yi-gyroscope ekuqaleni kwemishani yesiteshi sasemkhathini, kuze kube sekugcineni kokuhamba emkhathini.

translation.en: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translation.zu: U-Chiao kanye no-Sharipov kubikwa ukuthi abahlobene nesimo sengqondo esilungisiwe sababhikishi.

translation.en: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translation.zu: Abalawula okwenzeka phansi eRashiya baqalise izindiza zempi futhi isimo esijwayelekile sesiteshi satholakala futhi.

translation.en: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translation.zu: Icala lathethwa e-Virginia ngoba iyindawo eyinhloko yomhlinzeki we-inthanethi i-AOL, okuyinkampani eyavula icala.

translation.en: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translation.zu: Lokhu okokuqala ukulahlwa icala kutholakale ngokusebenzisa umthetho oshwaywe ngo-2003 wokunqanda ama-imeyili aya ebantwini abaningi, abuye aziwe ngokuthi i-spam, avela kubantu angacelwanga kubo kuya kumabhokisi we-imeyili wabasebenzisi.

translation.en: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation.zu: UJesu oneminyaka engu-21 ubudala wajoyina i-Manchester City ngonyaka odlule ngo-Januwari 2017 esuka eqembini lase-Brazil i-Palmeira ngemali eyizigidi ezingu-£27.

translation.en: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation.zu: Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi, umdlali waseBrazil wadlala emidlalweni engu-53 emincintiswaneni yonke futhi washaya amagoli angu-24.

translation.en: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation.zu: UDkt. Lee ubuye waveza ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngemibiko yokuthi izingane eTheki zingenwe yigciwane lemfuluwenza A(H5N1) esuka ezinyonini ngaphandle kokugula.

translation.en: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation.zu: Olunye ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi lesi sifo kumelwe sibe nengozi yokubangela ukufa encane ngaphambi kokuthi sidale ubhubhane lomhlaba, waphawula.

translation.en: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation.zu: Kunokukhathazeka kokuthi iziguli zingathelela abantu abaningi ngokuqhubeka nokuphila kwazo kwansuku zonke uma izimpawu zomkhuhlane zihlala zingezimbi.

translation.en: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation.zu: ULeslie Aun, umkhulumeli weNhlangano ye-Komen, uthe inhlangano yamukela umthetho omusha ongvumeli ukuxhasa noma ukunika imali izinhlangano ezingaphansi kophenyo olungokomthetho.

translation.en: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translation.zu: Inqubomgomo ka-Komen ukuyekise Ubuzali Obuhleliwe ngenxa yophenyo olusalindiwe oluqhutshwa Abameli be-Cliff Stearns mayelana nokuthi Ubuzali Obuhleliwe buyisebenzisa kanjani imali.

translation.en: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translation.zu: UStearns uphenya ukuthi ingabe intela isetshenziselwa ukuxhasa ukukhishwa kwezisu ngohlelo Lokuhlelela Ukuba Umzali njengomthwalo wakhe wemfanelo njengosihlalo weKomiti Lokuhola kanye Nokuphenya, okungaphansi kwesivikelo seNdlu Yamandla kanye Nekomiti Lezomnotho.

translation.en: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translation.zu: Owayengumbusi waseMassachusetts uMitt Romney uwina ukhetho oluyinhloko lozoba umongameli weRepublican Party eFlorida ngoLwesibili ngevoti elidlula amaphesenti angu-46.

translation.en: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translation.zu: Owayengumkhulumeli Wendlu i-Newt Gingrich e-U.S. ube ngowesibili ngamaphesenti angu-32.

translation.en: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translation.zu: Njengoba owina lesi sifunda ethatha konke, iFlorida inklomelise uRomney ngazo zonke izihambeli zayo ezingu-50, emqhubekisele phambili njengenhloko kwabaqokiwe kuyi-Republican Party.

translation.en: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translation.zu: Abahleli balombhikisho bathi babalelwa ku- 100 000 abantu abangena emadolobheni ase-Germanynjenge-Berlin, i-Cologne, i-Hamburg, ne-Hanover.

translation.en: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
translation.zu: Eberlin, amaphoyisa alinganisela u-6,500 wababhikishi.

translation.en: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
translation.zu: Iziteleka zenzeke ePherisi, e-Sofia e-Bulgaria,e-Vilnius e-Lithuania, e-Valetta eMalta, eTallinn ese-Estonia nase-Edinburgh kanye nase-Glasgow ese-Scotland.

translation.en: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
