translation.zu: ELandani, abantu abangaba u-200 babhikisha ngaphandle kwamahhovisi wezinye zezinkampani ezinkulu ezinamalungelo okushicilela.

translation.en: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
translation.zu: Ngenyanga edlule, bekunokubhikisha okukhulu e-Poland lapho lelozwe lisayina i-ACTA, okwaholela ekubeni uhulumeni wase-Poland unqume ukungamukeli isivumelwano, okwamanje.

translation.en: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
translation.zu: ILatvia neSlovakia zombili zilibazise inqubo yokujoyina i-ACTA.

translation.en: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
translation.zu: Ukukhululwa kweZilwane kanye Nomphakathi waseBukhosini wokuGwema Isihluku Ezilwaneni (RSPCA) kusacela ukufakwa kwamakhamera we-CCTV okuyimpoqo emadeleni wonke wase-Australia.

translation.en: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
translation.zu: Umhloli omkhulu weRSPCA yaseNyakatho Wales Entsha uDavide O’Shannessy utshele i-ABC ukuthi ukugadwa nokuhlolwa kwamadela kumelwe kube yinto evamile e-Australia.

translation.en: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
translation.zu: "I-CCTV nakanjani izothumela isibonakaliso esinamandla kulabo bantu abasebenza ngezilwane sokuthi inhlalakahle yabo iyinto eza kuqala kunazo zonke."

translation.en: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
translation.zu: Ibalazwe lamazwe onke lokuzamazama komhlaba le-United States Geological Survey alibonisanga ukuzamazama komhlaba e-Iceland ngeviki elandulele.

translation.en: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
translation.zu: I-Icelandic Meteorological Office nayo ibike ukungabi khona kokuzamazama komhlaba endaweni yaseHekla emahoreni angu-48 adlule.

translation.en: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
translation.zu: Ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu kuye kwaholela kwinguquko yesigaba esenzeka mhlaka-10 kuNdasa ohlangothini olusenyakatho-mpumalanga yesifunda sentaba-mlilo.

translation.en: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
translation.zu: Amafu amnyama angahlobene nokuqhuma kwentabamlilo abikiwe esiqwini sentaba.

translation.en: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
translation.zu: Amafu enze kwaba nokudideka kokuthi ukuqubuka kube khona yini.

translation.en: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
translation.zu: I-Luno ibinamamitha aphindwe kathathu kaphethiloli angu-120-160 ngesikhathi iwa futhi imimoya enamandla yayiphushela emanzini.

translation.en: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
translation.zu: Izindiza ezinophephela emhlane zisindise amalungu ayishumi nambili eqembu futhi okuwukuphela kokulimala bekuwukuphuka kwekhala.

translation.en: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
translation.zu: Umkhumbi ongamamitha angu-100 wawusendleleni yokulanda impahla yawo evamile engumquba futhi ekuqaleni iziphathimandla zazesaba ukuthi umkhumbi ungachitha umthwalo.

translation.en: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
translation.zu: Ukulungiswa okuhlongoziwe kugunyaziwe amaqembu womabili ngo-2011.

translation.en: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
translation.zu: Ushintsho lwenziwe kulengxenye yomthetho lapho imusho wesibili wasuswa okokuqala yi-House of Representatives futhi wadluliswa ngendlela efanayo yi-Senate Monday.

translation.en: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
translation.zu: Ukwehluleka kwesigwebo sesibili, esifaka isiphakamiso ukwenqabeli umshado wokuhlalisana okusemthethweni kwabantu bobulili obufanayo, kungavulela umnyango ukuhlalisana okusemthethweni esikhathini esizayo.

translation.en: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
translation.zu: Ukulandela inqubo, i-HJR-3 izohlolwa futhi abashayi-mthetho abakhethiwe ngo-2015 noma ngo-2016 ukuze iqhubeke isebenza.

translation.en: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
translation.zu: Okwafezwa uVautier ngaphandle kokuqondisa kuhlanganisa ukuzincisha ukudla ngo-1973 ebhikisha ngokumelene nalokho ayekubheka njengokuvalwa kwezinto ngenxa yezombusazwe.

translation.en: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
translation.zu: Umthetho waseFulansi ushintshile. Uqale ubushoshovu lapho eneminyaka engu-15 lapho ejoyina iqembu Lokumelana laseFulansi phakathi neMpi Yezwe II.

translation.en: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
translation.zu: Wabhala ngaye encwadini ka-1998.

translation.en: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
translation.zu: Ngeminyaka yawo-1960 wabuyela e-Algeria entsha ezimele ukuyofundisa ukuqondisa amafilimu

translation.en: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
translation.zu: Umdlali we-judo waseJapani uHitoshi Saito, owine amamedali egolide kuma-Olimpiki, ushone eneminyaka engu-54.

translation.en: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
translation.zu: Imbangela yokufa imenyezelwe ngokuthi umdlavuza wokusha kwesibindi kwangaphakathi kwamapayipi enyongo.

translation.en: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
translation.zu: Ushonele e-Osaka ngoLwesibili.

translation.en: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
translation.zu: Ngokufanayo nowadla umhlanganiso emidlalweni yama -Olempikhi kanye neyoMhlaba, u-Saito wayengusihlalo wekomiti lokuqeqeshwa le-All Japan Judo Federation ngesikhathi efa.

translation.en: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
translation.zu: Okungenani abantu abawu-100 babekhona emcimbini, ukuze kugujwe isikhumbuzo somshado sokuqala sombhanqwana omshado wawo wawungonyaka odlule.

translation.en: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
translation.zu: Umcimbi wesikhumbuzo uhlelelwe usuku lwakamuva, kusho iziphathimandla.

translation.en: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
translation.zu: Izithandani zashadela e-Texas ngonyaka odlule zabe seziza e-Buffalo ukuzobungaza kanye nabangane nezihlobo.

translation.en: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
translation.zu: Umyeni oneminyaka engu-30, owazalelwa eNyathi, wayengomunye wabane oshonile ngenkathi kudutshulwa, kodwa umkakhe akalimalanga.

translation.en: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
translation.zu: u-Karno ungumfundisi weSingisi odumile kodwa onempikiswano i owafundisa ngaphansi Kwemfundo Yesimanje Kanye ne-Kind’s Glory owayethi unabafundi abangu-9,000 ekukhuleni komsebenzi wakhe.

translation.en: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
translation.zu: Emazwini akhe abhaliwe usebenzise amagama lawo abanye abazali abawathatha njengalumelayo, futhi kubikwa ukuthi usebenzise inhlamba ekilasini.

translation.en: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
translation.zu: Imfundo Yanamuhla imsole ngokuphrinta izikhangiso ezinkulu emabhasini ngaphandle kwemvume nangokukhuluma amanga ngokuthi bekunguthisha omkhulu wesiNgisi.

translation.en: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
translation.zu: Ubuye wasolwa ngokuphula amalungelo emithetho yokushicilela, kodwa akabekwanga icala.

translation.en: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
translation.zu: Owayengumfundi wathi ‘wayesebenzisa isitsotsi ekilasini, afundise indlela yokuthandana ngezincwadi, futhi wayefana nomngane wabafundi’.

translation.en: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
translation.zu: Phakathi neminyaka engamashumi amathathu edlule, ngisho noma ihleli iyizwe lobukhomanisi, iShayina yakhe umnotho wokuhweba ngokukhululekile.

translation.en: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
translation.zu: Izinguquko zokuqala ezingokomnotho zenziwa ngaphansi kobuholi bukaDeng Xiaoping.

translation.en: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
translation.zu: Kusukela lapho, ubukhulu bomnotho waseShayina buye bakhula izikhathi eziphindwe ngo-90.

translation.en: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
translation.zu: Okokuqala, ngonyaka odlule iShayina ithumele izimoto eziningi kwamanye amazwe kuneJalimane futhi yadlula iMelika njengemakethe enkulu kunazo zonke yalemboni.

translation.en: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
translation.zu: I-GDP yaseShayina ingaba nkulu kuneyaseMelika emashumini amabili eminyaka.

translation.en: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
translation.zu: Isiphepho Sasendaweni Efudumele uDanielle, isiphepho sesine esinikwe igama sangenkathi yezishingishane zase-Atlantic ngo-2010, sakhekile ngasempumalanga yoLwandlekazi i-Atlantic.

translation.en: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
translation.zu: Isiphepho, esikhonjwe cishe amamayela angu-3,000 kusuka eMiami, eFlorida, sinemimoya eqhubekayo yesivinini esingu-40 mph (64 kph).

translation.en: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
translation.zu: Usosayensi weNational Hurricane Center uhlongoza ukuthi u-Danielle uzoqina abe isivunguvungu ngoLwesithathu.

translation.en: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
translation.zu: Isiphepho sikude nogu, kusenzima ukubona ithuba lokuthi sigadle eMelika noma e-Caribbean.

translation.en: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
translation.zu: UBobek, owazalelwa enhlokodolobha yaseKhroweshiya, wathola udumo lapho esadlalela i-Partizan Belgrade.

translation.en: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
translation.zu: Ubajoyine ngo-1945 futhi wahlala kwaze kwaba u-1958.

translation.en: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi edlalela iqembu, washaya amagoli angama-403 emidlalweni engu-468.

translation.en: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
translation.zu: Akekho omunye owadlala izikhathi eziningi noma owashaya amagoli amaningi eqenjini ukwedlula u-Bobek.

translation.en: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
translation.zu: Ngo-1995 wavotelwa njengomdlali ohamba phambili kunabo bonke emlandweni wasePartizan.

translation.en: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
translation.zu: Imikhosi yaqala ngohlelo olukhethekile ngeqembu elidume emhlabeni wonke iCirque du Soleil.

translation.en: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
translation.zu: Yalandelwa i-Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, iqembu lamaSosha aseTheki, kanye nabaculi uFatih Erkoç kanye noMüslüm Gürses.

translation.en: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
translation.zu: Emva kwalokhuu-Whirling Dervishes waya esteji.

translation.en: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
translation.zu: Isihlabani somculo saseTheki uSezen Aksu ucule nomculi wetena u-Alessandro Safina nomculi womGriki uHaris Alexiou.

translation.en: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
translation.zu: Ukuqedela, iqembu labadansi laseTheki uMlilo ka-Anatolia lenza umboniso we-“Troy”.

translation.en: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
translation.zu: UPeter Lenz, oneminyaka ewu-13 ongumjahi wezithuthuthu, uye washona ngemva kokuthinteka enhlekeleleni eyenzeke e-Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

translation.en: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
translation.zu: Njengoba esemjikelezweni wakhe wokuthambisa imisipha, uLenz wawa esithuthuthwini sakhe, futhi washayiswa umncintisani okanye naye uXavier Zayat.

translation.en: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
translation.zu: Wahlolwa abezokwelapha abasemgaqweni womjaho ngokushesha futhi wahanjiswa esibhedlela sendawo lapho ashona khona.

translation.en: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
translation.zu: U-Zayat akazange alimale engozini.

translation.en: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
translation.zu: Mayelana nesimo sezezimali somhlaba wonke, uZapatero waqhubeka ngokuthi “uhlelo lwezezimali ingxenye yomnotho, ingxenye ebaluleke kakhulu.

translation.en: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
translation.zu: Sinenhlekelele yezimali yonyaka wonke, ebe yibi kakhulu ezinyangeni ezimbili ezidlule, futhi ngicabanga ukuthi manje ezomnotho ziqala ukusimama.”

translation.en: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
translation.zu: Ngesonto eledlule, i-Naked News ikhiphe isimemezelo sokuthi izokwandisa kakhulu izilimi ebika ngazo izindaba zakwamanye amazwe, ngezinhlelo ezintathu ezintsha.

translation.en: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
translation.zu: Ibika ngesiNgisi kanye nesiJapani kakade, inhlangano yomhlaba jikelele iqalise izinhlelo zezilimi zesiSpeyini, isiNtaliyane, kanye nesiKoreya, zikamabonakude, i-inthanethi kanye nezisetshenziswa eziphathwayo.

translation.en: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
translation.zu: "Ngenhlanhla akukho okwenzeke kimi, kodwa ngibone isenzakalo esisabisayo, njengoba abantu bezama ukuphula amafasitela ukuze baphume.

translation.en: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
translation.zu: Abantu babeshaya izingilazi ngezihlalo, kodwa amafasitela abengaphuki.

translation.en: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
translation.zu: Elilodwa lamafasitela laphuka ekugcineni, futhi baqala ukuphuma ngamafasitela,” kusho owasinda uFranciszek Kowal.

translation.en: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
translation.zu: Izinkanyezi zikhipha ukukhanya nokushisa ngenxa yamandla enzekayo lapho ama-athomu e-hydrogen ahlangana (noma axubana) ndawonye ukwakha izakhi ezisinda kakhudlwana.

translation.en: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
translation.zu: Ososayensi bazama ukwenza isiphehli esingenza amandla ngendlela efanayo.

translation.en: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
translation.zu: Lokhu, nokho, inkinga okunkimbinkimbi ukuyixazulula futhi kuzothatha iminyaka eminingi ngaphambi kokuba sebone isiphehli esihlanganisayo sakhiwa.

translation.en: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
translation.zu: Inalithi yensimbi intanta ngaphezu kwamanzi ngenxa yokulumbana kwama-athomu.

translation.en: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
translation.zu: Ukulumbana kwenzeka ngenxa yokuthi ama-athomu wamanzi phezu kwamanzi ayadonsana kakhulu kunendlela enza ngayo kwawomoya phezu kwawo.

translation.en: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
translation.zu: Izakhi zamanzi zakha isikhumba esingabonakali emanzini okwenza izinto ezinjengenalithi zishwibilike phezulu emanzini.

translation.en: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
translation.zu: Insimbi yesicathulo sokushushuluza eqhweni sanamuhla inezinhlangothi ezimbili negobongo eligumbekile maphakathi kwazo. Imiphetho emibili ivumela ukubamba okungcono kweqhwa, ngisho noma ziketukile.

translation.en: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokuthi ingaphansi locezu lugobile kancane, njengoba ucezu lutshekela ohlangothini olulodwa noma kolunye, unqanqama oluthintene neqhwa nalo luyatsheka.

translation.en: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translation.zu: Lokhu kubangela ukuthi abashushuluzi baphenduke. Uma izishushuluziziphenukela ngakwesokudla, umshushuluzi uphendukela ngakwesokudla, uma izishushuluzi ziphendukela ngakwesobunxele, umshushuluzi uphenukela ngakwesobunxele.

translation.en: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translation.zu: Ukuze zibuyele emazingeni wazo wangaphambili wamandla, kumelwe ziqede amandla engeziwe eziwathole ekukhanyeni.

translation.en: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translation.zu: Zenza lokhu ngokukhipha inhlayiyana yokukhanya ebizwa "nge-photon".

translation.en: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translation.zu: Ososayenzi babiza lenqubo ngokuthi “ukukhishwa kwemisebe okushukumisiwe” ngoba ama-athomu ashukunyiswa ukukhanya okukhanyayo, okubangela ukukhishwa kokukhanya kwefothoni, futhi ukukhanya uhlobo lwemisebe.

translation.en: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translation.zu: Isithombe esilandelayo sibonisa ama-athomu akhipha ama-photon. Eqinisweni ama-photon mancane kakhulu kunalawa asesithombeni.

translation.en: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translation.zu: Ama-phothon mancane kakhulu kunezinto ezenza ama-athomu!

translation.en: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translation.zu: Ngemuva kokusebenza amahora amakhulu umucu wasibani ugcina ushile bese isibani singasasebenzi.

translation.en: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translation.zu: Isibani sesidinga ukushintshwa. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela mawushintsha isibani sokukhanya.

translation.en: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translation.zu: Okokuqala, isiqhebeza sesibani kumelwe sicinywe noma ikhebula ingaxhunywa.

translation.en: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
translation.zu: Lokhu kungenxa yokuba ugesi ungena kuyisokhethi lapho ingxenye yenzimbi yebhalubhu ingakubamba kabuhlungu ngogesi uma uthinta ingaphakathi lesokhethi noma ingaphansi lensimbi lapho isengaphakathi kwesokhethi ngokwengxenye.

translation.en: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
translation.zu: Isitho esikhulu esimisweni sokujikeleza kwegazi inhliziyo, empompa igazi.

translation.en: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
translation.zu: Igazi liphuma enhliziyweni ngamapayipi abizwa ngeminqonqo futhi lingene enhliziyweni ngamapayipi abizwa ngemithambo. Amapayipi amancane kunawo wonke abizwa ngemithanjana.

translation.en: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
translation.zu: Izinyo le-triceratops lalingakwazi ukuhlafuna hhayi kuphela amacembe kodwa namagatsha aqine kakhulu kanye nezimpande.

translation.en: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
translation.zu: Abanye ososayensi bacabanga ukuthi ama-Ticeratop ayedla ama-cycad, okuwuhlobo lwezitshalo olwaluvamile e-Cretaceous.

translation.en: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
translation.zu: Lezi zitshalo sibukeka njengesihlala sesundu namaqabunga acijile, ahlabayo.

translation.en: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
translation.zu: ITriceratops yayingasebenzisa umlomo wayo oqinile ukuhluba amaqabunga ngaphambi kokudla isiqu.

translation.en: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
translation.zu: Abanye ososayensi bathi lezi zitshalo zinobuthi ngakho akunakwenzeka ukuthi ikhona i-dinosaur ezidlile, ngisho noma namuhla ibheja kanye nezinye izilwane ezinjengopholi (inzalo yama-dinosaur) zingadla amagatsha noma izithelo ezinobuthi.

translation.en: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
translation.zu: Amandla wokudonsa we-Io angasebenza kanjani kimi? Uma uma emhlabeni we-lo, uzoba nesisindo esincane kunaleso oba naso Emhlabeni.

translation.en: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
translation.zu: Umuntu onesisindo esingamaphawundi angu-200 (90kg) eMhlabeni angaba nesisindo esicishe sibe amaphawundi angu-36 (16kg) e-Io. Ngakho amandla okudonsa, empeleni, akudonsa kancane.

translation.en: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
translation.zu: ILanga alinawo ungqimba njengoMhlaba lelo ongema kulo. ILanga lonke lenziwe ngamagesi, umlilo, kanye ne-plasma.

translation.en: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
translation.zu: Igesi iba yincane njengoba uhamba uqhela enkabeni yeLanga.

translation.en: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
translation.zu: Ingxenye engaphandle esiyibonayo lapho sibuka iLanga ibizwa ngokuthi yi-photosphere, okusho ukuthi “indilinga yokukhanya”.

translation.en: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
translation.zu: Cishe eminyakeni eyizinkulungwane ezintathu kamuva, ngo-1610, isazi sezinkanyezi somNtaliyane uGalileo Galilei wasebenzisa i-telescope ukubuka ukuthi iVenus inezigaba, njengoba nenyanga inazo.

translation.en: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translation.zu: Izigaba zenzeka kuphela ngoba uhlangothi lweVenus (noma iNyanga) olubhekene nelanga luyakhanya. Izigaba zeVenus zisekela inkolelo-mbono kaCopenicus yokuthi amapulanethi azungeza ilanga.

translation.en: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translation.zu: Kwathi, emva kweminyaka embalwa ngo-1639. Isazi sezinkanyezi somNgisi esibizwa ngo-Jeremiya Horrocks sabheka umzila we-Venus.

translation.en: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translation.zu: INgilandi yayibe nenkathi ende yokuthula ngemva kokunqoba kabusha iDanelaw.

translation.en: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translation.zu: Nokho ngo-991 i-Ethelred yayibhekene nemikhumbi yamabutho wamaViking emikhulu kunanoma imiphi kusukela kweyeGuthrum ikhulu leminyaka ngaphambili.

translation.en: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translation.zu: Le mikhumbi eminingi beyiholwa u-Olaf Trygvasson, umuntu waseNorway owayenentshisekelo yokukhulula izwe lakhe ekuphathweni yi-Denmark.

translation.en: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translation.zu: Ngemva kwezinkinga zempi zasekuqaleni, u-Ethelred wakwazi ukuvumelana no-Olaf, owabuyela e-Norway eyozama ukuthola umbuso wakhe ngempumelelo exubene.

translation.en: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translation.zu: I-Hangeul ukuphela kohlamvu olusungulwe ngenhloso ekusebenziseni kwansuku zonke okuthandwayo. Lolu hlamvu lwasungulwa ngo-1444 ngesikhathi sokubusa kweNkosi uSejong (1418 – 1450).

translation.en: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translation.zu: INkosi u-Sejong wayeyinkosi yesine yoBukhosi buka-Joseon futhi ungomunye wabathathelwa phezulu kakhulu.

translation.en: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translation.zu: Ekuqaleni unike igama i-alfabhethi yeHangeul ngokuthi iHunmin Jeongeum, okusho ukuthi "imisindo efanele yokufundisa abantu".

translation.en: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translation.zu: Kunezinkolelo-mbono eziningi zendlela iSanskrit ebekhona ngayo. Enye yazo imayelana nokuthutha kwama-Aryan esuka entshonalanga aya eNdiya abaze nolimi lwabo.

translation.en: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translation.zu: ISanskrit ulimi lwamandulo futhi lungaqhathaniswa nolimi lwesiLatin olukhulunywa eYurophu.

translation.en: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translation.zu: Incwadi yakuqala kunazo zonke emhlabeni eyaziwayo yayibhalwe ngeSanskrit. Ngemva kokubhalwa kwama-Upanishad, iSanskrit yamane yanyamalala ngenxa yezigaba zokubaluleka.

translation.en: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translation.zu: I-Sanskrit iwulimi oluyinkimbinkimbi nolucebile, luye lwaba oluyinhloko ezilimini eziningi zanamuhla zaseNdiya, njengesi-Lathini luwulimi oluyinhloko ezilimini zaseYurophu njengesiFulentshi kanye nesiPanishi.

translation.en: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translation.zu: Ngokuphela kwempi ye-France , i-Germany yaqala ukuzilungiselela ukuhlasela isiqhingi sase-Britain.

translation.en: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translation.zu: IJalimane libize ukuhlasela ngegama eliyisifekethiso elithi "Operation Sealion". Iningi lezikhali ezisindayo zeButho laseBrithani kanye nempahla zilahlekile lapho lithutha eDunkirk, ngakho ibutho lalibuthakathaka kakhudlwana.

translation.en: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translation.zu: Kodwa iRoyal Navy yayisanamandla kuneGerman Navy ("Kriegsmarine") futhi yayingabhubhisa noma imiphi imikhumbi ehlaselayo phesheya kwe-English Channel.

translation.en: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translation.zu: Nokho, iMikhumbi Yempi yaseBukhosini embalwa kakhulu eyayiseduze nemizila yokuhlasela njengoba izindunankulu zemikhubi yempi zazesaba ukuthi zizocwiliswa ukuhlasela kwamaJalimane okuvela emoyeni.

translation.en: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translation.zu: Ake siqale ngencazelo emayelana nezinhlelo zeNtaliyane. INtaliyane ngokuyinhloko “bekuwumfowabo omncane” weJalimane neJapani.

translation.en: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translation.zu: Banamabutho angenamandla kanye nemikhumbi yempi engenamandla, ngisho noma bakhe imikhumbi emisha emine ngaphambi nje kokuqala kwempi

translation.en: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translation.zu: Izinhloso eziphambili zase-Italy kwakungamazwe ase-Afrika. Ukuze bathumbe lawo mazwe, babezodinga indawo yokuthumela amasosha, ukuze kuthi njengoba amasosha ewela uLwandle iMedithera ngemikhumbi ahlasele i-Afrika.

translation.en: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translation.zu: Ngalesosizathu, bekufanele ukuthi banyamalalise izintu zempi zaseBrithani kanye nemikhumpi eGibhithe. Ngaphandle kwalezozinyathelo, imikhumbi yempi yaseNtaliyane bekungafanele yenze okunye okuthile .

translation.en: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translation.zu: Manje eJapani. IJapani bekuyisiqhingi esiyizwe, njengeBhrithani.

translation.en: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translation.zu: Imikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi imikhumbi eklanyelwe ukuhamba ngaphansi kwamanzi, futhi ihlale lapho isikhathi eside kakhulu.

translation.en: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translation.zu: Imikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi yayisetshenziswa eMpini Yezwe I kanye naseMpini Yezwe II. Ngaleso sikhathi yayihamba kancane kakhulu futhi beyikwazi ukudubula ibanga elifishane.

translation.en: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translation.zu: Ekuqaleni kwempi yahamba kakhulu ngaphezu kolwandle, kodwa njengoba ireda yaqala ukukhula nokucacisa okwengeziwe, imikhumbi yangaphansi komhlaba yaphoqelelwa ukuba ihambe ngaphansi kwamanzi ukuze ingabonwa.

translation.en: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translation.zu: Imikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi yaseJalimane yayibizwa ngokuthi Izikebhe ze-U. AmaJalimane ayenekhono lokuqondisa nokusebenzisa imikhumbi yabo yangaphansi kwamanzi.

translation.en: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokuphumelela kwawo emikhumbini yangaphansi kwamanzi, ngemva kwempi akuthenjwa ukuthi amaJalimane anayo eminingi.

translation.en: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translation.zu: Yebo! INkosi uTutankhamun, kwesinye isikhathi ebizwa "ngeNkosi uTut" noma "INkosi enguMfana", ingenye yamakhosi aziwa kakhulu waseGibhithe yamandulo ezikhathini zanamuhla.

translation.en: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translation.zu: Ngokuthakazelisayo, wayengathathwa njengobaluleke kakhulu ezikhathini zamandulo futhi wayengabhaliwe ezinhlwini eziningi zamakhosi zakudala.

translation.en: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translation.zu: Nokho, ukutholwa kwethuna lakhe ngo-1922 kwamenza usowaziwayo. Nakuba amathuna amaningi wangezikhathi ezidlule egcekeziwe, leli thuna lalishiywe cishe lingaphazanyiswanga.

translation.en: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translation.zu: Izinto eziningi ezingcwatshwe noTutankhamun zilondolozwwe kahle, kuhlanganise nezinkulungwane zezimpahla ezenziwe ngezinsimbi eziyigugu kanye namatshe anqabile.

translation.en: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translation.zu: Ukusungulwa kwamasondo kwenza izinqola zase-Asiriya ukuba zingasindi kakhulu, zisheshe, futhi zikulungele kangcono ukushiya amasosha nezinye izinqola.

translation.en: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translation.zu: Imicibisholo evela eminsalweni yayo ebulalayo yayingabhoboza izembatho zempi zamasosha ezimbangi. Cishe ngo-1000 B.C., abase-Asiriya basebenzisa amasosha agibeleyo okuqala.

translation.en: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translation.zu: Amasosha agibeleyo ibutho elilwa ligibele amahhashi. Izihlalo zamahhashi bezingakasungulwa, ngakho ibutho lamahhashi lama-Asiriya belilwa ngaphezu kwamahhashi angenazihlalo.

translation.en: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translation.zu: Siyabazi abezombangazwe abaningi bamaGriki, ososayensi, kanye namaciko. Kungenzeka ukuthi umuntu owaziwa kakhulu waleli siko u-Homer, imbongi eyimpumputhe edumile, obhale izincwadi ezimbili zesiGriki zobungcweti: izinkondo ze-Iliad kanye ne-Odyssey.

translation.en: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translation.zu: USophocles kanye no-Aristophanes basasengababhali bemidlalo abathandwayo futhi imidlalo yabo ithathwa njengemisebenzi emikhulu kakhulu yezincwadi zezwe.

translation.en: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translation.zu: Omunye umGreki odumile usozibalo uPythagoras, owaziwa kakhulu ngomqondo wakhe oqinisekiswa ngokuchasiselwa odumile omayelana nokuhlangana phakathi kwezinhlangothi zonxantathu abanezinhlangothi ezimbili eziqondene ngqo.

translation.en: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translation.zu: Kunokulinganisela okuhlukile kwenani labantu abakhuluma isiHindi. Kulinganiselwa ukuthi siphakathi kolimi oluvame kakhulu emhlabeni lwesibili kanye nolwesine.

translation.en: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translation.zu: Inani lezikhulumi zendawo liyahluka kuye ngokuthi ulimi lwesigodi oluhlobene kakhulu luyabalwa yini noma cha.

translation.en: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translation.zu: Ukulinganisela kusuka ezigidini ezingu-340 kuya ezigidini ezingu-500 zezikhulumi, futhi abantu abangangezigidi ezingu-800 bayaluqonda ulimi.

translation.en: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translation.zu: IsiHindi nesi-Urdu ziyafana ngohlelo lwamagama kodwa ziyahluka ngokubhala; ekukhulumeni kwansuku zonke, izikhulumi zezilimi zombili ngokuvamile ziyakwazi ukuzwisisana.

translation.en: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translation.zu: Cishe ngekhulu lama-15 leminyaka, inyakatho Estonia beyingaphansi kwethonya elikhulu lesiko laseJalimane.

translation.en: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translation.zu: Ezinye izindela zamaJalimane bezifuna ukusondeza uNkulunkulu ebantwini bomdabu, ngakho zasungula ulimi lokubhala lwase-Estonia.

translation.en: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translation.zu: Belusekelwe kuma-alfabhethi wesiJalimane futhi uhlamvu olulodwa "u-Õ/õ" lwanezelwa.

translation.en: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translation.zu: Njengoba isikhathi sihamba, amagama amaningi ayebolekwe kwelaseJalimane ahlanganiswa. Lokhu kwakuyisiqalo sokukhanya.

translation.en: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translation.zu: Ngokwesiko, indlalifa yobukhosi izoya ngokuqondile emabuthweni empi ngemva kokuqeda isikole.

translation.en: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, uChales waya enyuvesi eKolishi LikaZiqu Zintathu, e-Cambridge lapho afundela khona i-Anthropology kanye ne-Archaeology, futhi kamuza eZomlando, ethola u-2:2 (idigiliyi engaphansi yezinga lesibili).

translation.en: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translation.zu: UCharles wayeyilungu lokuqala loMkhaya wamaNgisi waseBukhosini lokunikwa idigiliyi.

translation.en: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translation.zu: ITheki yaseYurophu (i-Thrace esempumalanga noma i-Rumelia esenhlonhlweni ye-Balkan) ihlanganisa u-3% wezwe.

translation.en: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translation.zu: Indawo yaseTheki ingaphezu kwamakhilomitha angu-1,600 (1,000 mi) ubude kanye no-800 km (500 mi) ububanzi, nesibumbeko esicishe sibe ama-angela ayisikwele onke.

translation.en: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translation.zu: Indawo yaseTheki, kuhlanganise namachibi, ingamakhilomitha skwele angu-783,562 (300,948 sq mi), lapho amakhilomitha skwele angu-755,688 (291,773 sq mi) ase-Asia eseningizimu ntshonalanga futhi amakhilomitha skwele angu-23,764 (9,174 sq mi) aseYurophu.

translation.en: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translation.zu: Indawo yaseTheki iyenza izwe elikhulu kakhulu lama-37 emhlabeni, futhi ingalingana neDolobha Elikhulu laseFulansi noMbuso Ohlangene kuhlangene.

translation.en: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translation.zu: ITheki izungezwe izilwandle ezinhlangothini ezintathu: uLwandle i-Aegean ngasentshonalanga, uLwandle Olumnyama ngasenyakatho kanye noLwandle iMedithera ngaseningizimu.

translation.en: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translation.zu: I-Luxembourg inomlando omude wokuzimela kusukela ngo-1839.

translation.en: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translation.zu: Izingxenye zeBheljiyamu yanamuhla beziyingxenye ye-Luxembourg esikhathini esidlule kodwa zaba yingxenye yeBheljiyamu ngemva koShintsho lwaseBheljiyamu lwangawo-1830.

translation.en: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translation.zu: ILuxembourg ibihlale iyizwe elizama ukungathathi uhlangothi kodwa beyihilelekile kokubili eMpini Yezwe I kanye neMpi Yezwe II neJalimane.

translation.en: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translation.zu: Ngo-1957 i-Luxembourg yaba yilungu elisungulayo lenhlangano namuhla eyaziwa ngokuthi iNyunyoni yaseYurophu.

translation.en: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translation.zu: I-Drukgyal Dzong inqaba enkulu echithakele nemonasteli yamaBhuda engxenyeni engenhla yeSigodi saseParo (eMzaneni wasePhondey)

translation.en: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translation.zu: Kuthiwa ngo-1649, uZhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel wenza inqaba ukuze akhumbule ukunqoba kwakhe amabutho aseTibet yaseMongol.

translation.en: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translation.zu: Ngo-1951, umlilo ubangele ukuba ezinye nje zezinto ezasala zaseDrukgyal Dzong ukuba zisale, njengomfanekiso kaZhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.

translation.en: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translation.zu: Ngemva komlilo, inqaba yasindiswa yaphinde yavikelwa, yasala ingenye yezinto ezihehayo ngokuthinta inhliziyo zase-Bhutan.

translation.en: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translation.zu: Phakathi nekhulu lama-18 leminyaka iKhambhodiya yazithola iminyene phakathi komakhelwne ababili abanamandla, i-Thailand kanye neVietnam.

translation.en: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translation.zu: AbaseThailand bahlasele i-Cambodia izikhathi eziningana ngekhulu lama-18 leminyaka kanti ngo-1772 babhubhisa i-Phnom Phen.

translation.en: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translation.zu: Eminyakeni yokugcina yekhulu lama-18 leminyaka abantu baseVietnam babuye bahlasela iKhambodiya.

translation.en: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translation.zu: Amaphesenti ayishumi nesishiyagalombili abantu baseVenezuela awasebenzi, futhi iningi lalabo abasebenzayo libambe amatoho.

translation.en: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translation.zu: Ingxenye yesithathu kwezimbili yabantu baseVenezuela abasebenzayo basebenza emkhakheni wokukhonza, cishe ingxenye yesine isebenza ezimbonini futhi ingxenye yesithathu isebenza kwezokulima.

translation.en: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translation.zu: Imboni ebalulekile yabantu baseVenezuela u-oyela, lapho izwe lithengisa kakhulu kunokuthenga, nakuba iphesenti ililodwa kuphela lisebenza embonini kawoyela.

translation.en: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translation.zu: Ekuqaleni kokuzimela kwesizwe, ubungoti be-Singapore Botanic Gardens basiza ekuguquleni isiqhingi ukuthi sibe Idolobha leNgadi lasendaweni eshisayo.

translation.en: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translation.zu: Ngo-1981, uVanda wakhumbula uJoaquim, iorchid hybrid, yakhethwa njengendaba yezwe

translation.en: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translation.zu: Minyaka yonke ngabo-Okthoba izilwane ezidla imifino ezicishe zibe yizigidi ezingu-1,5 ziyahamba zibheke emathafeni aseningizimu, ziwela uMfula i-Mara, zisuka emagqumeni asenyakatho ukuze zitole imvula.

translation.en: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
translation.zu: Futhi emuva enyakatho ngasentshonalanga, ukweqa umfula iMara futhi, ngemva kwezimvula cishe zango April.

translation.en: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
translation.zu: Indawo yaseSerengeti ineSerengeti National Park, iNgorongoro Conservation Area kanye neMaswa Game Reserve eTanzania kanye neMaasai Mara National Reserve eKenya.

translation.en: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
translation.zu: Ukufunda ukwenza ezezindaba ezihilelanayo kudinga amakhono avamile nangokwesikho, kanye namathuluzi afundwe kahle emakilasini ahilelanayo (indaba edwetshwe eshadini, ukuhlela umsindo nevidiyo, ukuxoxa izindaba, njll.)

translation.en: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
translation.zu: Imiklamo ehlanganisiwe idinga uphinde uhlole ukucabangela kwakho mayelana nokukhishwa kwezindaba futhi ufunde ukucabanga ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene.

translation.en: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
translation.zu: Imiklamo yekhompyutha idinga izici zephrojekthi zihlangane ndawonye, kodwa futhi zenze ingqondo uma zizimele.

translation.en: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
translation.zu: Isici esilahlekelisayo sezibuko zokukhulisa ukuthi ukuphica kwefokasi kanye nesibalo sezici zezibuko ezidingekayo ukufinyelela ububanzi bobude befokasi bukhulu kakhulu kunezibuko ezisemqoka.

translation.en: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuya ngokuba inkinga elungisekayo njengoba abenza izibuko befinyelela amazinga aphakeme okwenza izibuko.

translation.en: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuvumele ukwakhiwa kwezibuko ezibonisa eduze ukuthi kuphinde kukhiqizwe olunye uhlobo lwezinga eliphezulu uma kuqhathaniswa nalezi ezinye.

translation.en: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
translation.zu: Okunye ukungathandeki kwamalensi okukhulisa iznto ukuthi ubukhulu bemboniso engenisa ukukhaya (isivinini) belensi buphansi ngokuvamile.

translation.en: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
translation.zu: Lokhu kwenza amalensi angabizi kakhulu ka-zoom angasebenziseki kalula endaweni enokukhanya okuncane ngaphandle kwesibani.

translation.en: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
translation.zu: Inkinga evamile lapho uzama ukuguqula ifilimu ibe uhlobo lwe-DVD ukuthi isithombe siba sikhulu ngokweqile.

translation.en: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
translation.zu: Amathelevishini amaningi enziwe ngendlela yokuthokozisa umphakathi ovamile.

translation.en: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yalesosizathu, konke okubona kuTV kusikwe imingcele yakho, phezulu, ezansi kanye nasezinhlangothini.

translation.en: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
translation.zu: Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isithombe semboza isikrini sonke. Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi i-overscan.

translation.en: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
translation.zu: Ngeshwa, uma wenza iDVD, imingcele yayo cishe izosikeka nayo, futhi uma ividiyo ibinamazwi abhalwayo eduze nasezansi, angeke avezwe ngokugcwele.

translation.en: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
translation.zu: Izinqaba zakudala ezingokwesiko zishukumise umcabango isikhathi eside, zenza izithombe zemiqhudelwano yokulwa ngemikhonto phezu kwamahhashi, imicimbi kanye nemithetho yamaqhawe yenkathi ka-Arthur.

translation.en: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
translation.zu: Ngisho nokuma phakathi kwamanxiwa ayinkulungwane yeminyaka ubudala kulula ukukhumbula imisindo nephunga lezimpi ezidlule kudala, ukucishe uzwe ukukhenceza kwezinselo ezindaweni ezigandayiwe kanye nokuhogela ukwesaba okuphuma ematilongweni angumgodi.

translation.en: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
translation.zu: Kodwa ingabe imicabango yethu isekelwe ngokoqobo? Kungani kwakhiwa izinqaba nje kwasekuqaleni? Zaqanjwa kanjani futhi zakhiwa kanjani?

translation.en: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile enkathini, iKirby Muxloe Castle iyindlu eqinile kakhulu kunokuba inqaba yangempela.

translation.en: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
translation.zu: Amafasitela wayo wengilazi amakhulu nezindonga ezilula bezingeke zikwazi ukumelana nokuhlaselwa kwangempela isikhathi eside.

translation.en: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
translation.zu: Ngawo-1480, lapho ukwakhiwa kwayo kuqalwa iNkosi uHastings, izwe belinokuthula kakhudlwana futhi ukuzivikela bekudingeka emaviyweni amancane kuphela wabaphangi.

translation.en: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
translation.zu: Ukulinganiselwa kwamandla inqubo amazwe aseYurophu ayefuna ukugcina ubukhosi bezwe ngayo kuzo zonke izifunda zaseYurophu.

translation.en: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
translation.zu: Umbono bekuwukuthi zonke izizwe zaseYurophu kwakumelwe zifune ukuvimbela isizwe esisodwa ukuthi sibe namandla, futhi ngenxa yalokho ohulumeni bezwe babeshintsha imifelandawonye yabo kaningi ukuze kube nokulinganisela.

translation.en: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
translation.zu: IMpi Yokulandelana Kobukhosi baseSpeyini yaphawula impi yokuqala leyo impikiswano yayo enkulu kwakungukulinganiselwa kwamandla.

translation.en: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
translation.zu: Lokhu kube ushintsho olubalulekile, njengoba imibuso yaseYurophi beyingeke isakwazi ukuqasha ngezimpi ezingokwenkolo. Ngakho, iMpi yeMinyaka engaMashumi amaThathu bekuzoba yimpi yokugcina ebizwa ngokuthi yimpi engokwenkolo.

translation.en: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
translation.zu: Ithempeli lika-Athemisi e-Efesu labhujiswa ngoJulayi 21, 356, BCE esenzweni sokuthungela ngomlilo esenzwe u-Herostratus.

translation.en: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
translation.zu: Ngokwendaba, okwakumshukumisa kwakuwukuthola udumo kumnyama kubomvu. Abase-Efesu, bethukuthele begane unwabu, bamemezela ukuthi igama likaHerostratus lingagcinwa ngokubhalwa.

translation.en: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
translation.zu: Isazi-mlando somGreki uStrabo kamuva wabhala igama, okuyindlela esazi ngayo namuhla. Ithempeli labhujiswa ngobusuku obufanayo lobo u-Alexander Omkhulu azalwa ngabo.

translation.en: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
translation.zu: U-Alexander, njengenkosi, wacela ukukhokhelela ukwakhiwa kabusha kwethempeli, kodwa isicelo sakhe asivunyelwanga. Kamuva, ngemva kokuba u-Alexander efile, ithempeli lakhiwa kabusha ngo-323 BCE.

translation.en: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
translation.zu: Qinisekisa ukuthi isandla sakho sixhekethile ngangokunokwenzeka njengoba usacindezela amanothi afanele – futhi zama ukunganyakazisi iminwe yakho ngokungadingekile.

translation.en: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
translation.zu: Ngalendlela, uzozikhathalisa kancane ngangokunokwenzeka. Khumbula ukuthi asikho isidingo sokucindezela izinkinobho ngamandla amakhulu ukuze kube nomsindo owengeziwe njenge-piano.

translation.en: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
translation.zu: Ukuze uthole umsindo owengeziwe, ensimbini yomculo ingositini, usebenzisa lokhu okungezansi okunamandla kanye nejubane eliphezulu.

translation.en: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
translation.zu: UbuMistiki ukufuna ukuhlanganyela, ukuzibonakalisa, noma ukuzazi kahle nokungokoqobo okuphakeme, ubunkulunkulu, iqiniso elingokomoya, noma uNkulunkulu.

translation.en: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
translation.zu: Lo okholelwayo ufuna okwenzekayo okuqondile, noma ukuqonda izinto ezingokoqobo zaphezulu/zikankulunkulu noma onkulunkulu.

translation.en: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
translation.zu: Abalandeli balandela indlela ezithile zokuphila, noma imikhuba ehloselwe ukukhulisa lezo zinto ezenzekayo.

translation.en: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
translation.zu: Ubumistiki bungahlukaniswa nezinye izinhlobo zezinkolelo ezingokwenkolo nokukhulekela ngokugxila kokwenzekeni kuwe uqobo esimweni sokuba khona esihlukile, ikakhulukazi leso sokuthula, ukuqonda, ukuthokoza, ngisho nokujabula ngokwedlulele.

translation.en: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
translation.zu: UbuSikh inkolo yaphakathi ezwekazini laseNdiya. Buqale endaweni yasePunjab phakathi nekhulu lama-15 leminyaka kusuka ekuhlukaneni kwamahlelo phakathi nesiko lobuHindu.

translation.en: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
translation.zu: AmaSikh athatha ukholo lwawo njengenkolo ehlukile kubuHindu nakuba evuma umsuka wabo wobuHindu namasiko.

translation.en: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
translation.zu: Ama-Sikh abiza inkolo yawo ngokuthi yiGurmat, okusho ukuthi “indlela yomfundisi”. NgesiPunjabi umfundisi isici esisemqoka sazo zonke izinkolo zobuNdiya kodwa enkolweni yobuSikh unokubaluleka okwakha umnyombo wezinkolelo zobuSikh.

translation.en: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.
translation.zu: Le nkolo yasungulwa ekhulwini leminyaka lama-15 uMfundisi uNanak (1469–1539). Kwalandela abanye abefundisi abayisishiyagalolunye ngokulandelana.

translation.en: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.
translation.zu: Nokho, NgoJuni 1956, izithembiso zavivinywa lapho iziteleka e-Poland, lapho izisebenzi bezibhikishela ukusweleka kokudla nokuncishiselwa iholo, zishintsha ziba ukubhikisha okuvamile ngokumelene nobuKhomanisi.

translation.en: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.
translation.zu: Nakuba ekugcineni, uKrushchev ethumele izinqola zempi ukuzodambisa isimo, uye wavumela ezinye izicelo zezomnotho futhi wavuma ukumisa uWladyslaw Gomulka othandwayo njengendunankulu entsha.

translation.en: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.
translation.zu: Umphakathi wesiGodi sase-Indus kwakuwumphakathi Wenkathi yeBhulonze ezweni laseNdiya elisentshonalanga nyakatho elihlanganisa ubuningi bePakistan yanamuhla kanye nezinye izinkolo entshonalanga nyakatho Ndiya nasempumalanga nyakatho Afghanistan.

translation.en: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.
translation.zu: Impucuko ichume ezweni elithuthelela amanzi emfuleni laseMfuleni i-Indus lapho ithole igama layo khona.

translation.en: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
translation.zu: Nakuba ezinye izazi zicabangela ukuthi njengoba umphakathi ube khona ezigodini zoMfula iSarasvati owomile manje, kufanele ubizwe ngokufanele ngokuthi i-Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, njengoba abanye bewubiza iHarappan Civilization ngemva kweHarappa, eyokuqala yezindawo zayo zokuvubukulwa ngawo-1920,

translation.en: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
translation.zu: Isimo sokulwa sombusa waseRoma sisizile ekuthuthukisweni kwentuthuko yezokwelapha.

translation.en: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
translation.zu: Odokotela baqala ukubizwa uMbusi u-Augustus futhi waze wenza neButho Lezokwelapha laseRoma lokuqala lokusetshenziswa ngemva kwezimpi.

translation.en: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
translation.zu: Odokotela banolwazi lwezindlela ezihlukahlukene zokulalisa okuhlanganisa i-morphine ephuma ezinhlavini ze-poppy kanye ne-scopolamine ephuma ezinhlavini ze-herbane.

translation.en: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
translation.zu: Baye baba nekhono ekunqumeni izitho zomzimba ukuze basindise izguli kwi-gangrene nakwi-tourniquet kanye nakuma-arterila clampsukuze kuhambe igazikwehle ukuhamba kwegazi.

translation.en: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
translation.zu: Emakhulwini eminyaka amaningana, umbuso waseRoma wathola izinzuzo eziningi emkhakheni wezokwelapha futhi wenza ulwazi oluningi esinalo namuhla.

translation.en: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
translation.zu: I-Pureland origami i-origami onokukhawulelwa kokuthi ukusonga okukodwa kuphela kungenziwa ngesikhathi, okunye ukusonga okuyinkimbinkimbi njengokusongela emuva akuvunyelwe, futhi konke ukusonga kunezindawo eziqondile.

translation.en: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
translation.zu: Yakhiwe uJohn Smith ngawo-1970 ukusiza abagoqi abangenalwazi noma labo abanamakhono okunyakazisa umzimba alinganiselwe.

translation.en: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
translation.zu: Izingane zikwazi ukubona ubuhlanga nezinkolelo ezinganembile zobuhlanga zisencane kakhulu futhi lezi zinkolelo ezinganembile zobuhlanga zithinta indlela eziziphatha ngayo.

translation.en: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo, izingane zohlanga oluncane ezijwayezwe ukuthi azisebenzi kahle esikoleni zivame ukungasebenzi kahle esikoleni lapho zifunda ngomqondo ojwayezwayo ohlotshaniswa nohlanga lwazo.

translation.en: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.
translation.zu: I-MySpace yiwebusayithi yesithathu ethandwa kakhulu eMelika futhi inamaphrofayela ayizigidi ezingu-54 okwamanje.

translation.en: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.
translation.zu: Lawa mawebhusayithi atholwe ukunaka okukhulu, ikakhulukazi esimweni semfundo.

translation.en: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.
translation.zu: Lezi izici ezinhle kulawa mawebhusayithi, ahlanganisa, ukukwazi ukumisa ikhasi lekilasi elingahlanganisa amabhulogi, amavidiyo, izithombe, kanye nezinye izici.

translation.en: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.
translation.zu: Kungafinyelelwa kalula kuleli khasi ngokunikeza ikheli elilodwa vo lewebhu, okwenza kube lula ukulikhumbula futhi kube lula nokulibhala kubafundi okungenzeka babe nenkinga yokusebenzisa ikhibhodi noma yesipelingi.

translation.en: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.
translation.zu: Ingahlelwa ngokuqokwa ukuyenza ifundeke kalula futhi ngemibala iminingi noma emincane njengoba umuntu ethanda.

translation.en: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".
translation.zu: Isifo Sokuthanda Ukunakwa "yisifo se-neurological syndrome esivame ukubonakalangezimpawu ezihlanganisa ukwenza izinto ngokunganaki, ukuphazamiseka, kanye nokuba nomdlandla ngokweqile noma amandla ngokweqile".

translation.en: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".
translation.zu: Akukhona ukukhubazeka kokufunda, inkinga yokufunda; ithinta "amaphesenti angu-3-5 wazo zonke izingane, cishe izingane zaseMelika ezingaba izigidi ezingu-2".

translation.en: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.
translation.zu: Izingane ezine-ADD zibhekana nobunzima uma kufanele ukuthi zibhekane nemisebenzi yazo yesikole, kodwa ziyakwazi ukugxila ezintweni ezithanda ukuzenza njengokudlala imidlalo noma ukubukela opopayi noma ukubhala imisho engenazo izimpawo zokubhala.

translation.en: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.
translation.zu: Lezi zingane zizithola zisobishini ngenxa ”yokuzigaxa ekuziphatheni okuyingozi, ziyalwa, zilwisana nabasegunyeni” ukuze nje zishukumise izingqondo zazo, njengoba izingqondo zazo zingashukunyiswa ngezindlela ezivamile.

translation.en: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.
translation.zu: I-ADD ithinta ubudlelwane nabanye ontanga ngoba ezinye izingane azikwazi ukuqonda ukuthi ziziphatha ngendlela ezenza ngayo noma ukuthi kungani zipela ngendlela ezenza ngayo noma ukuthi izinga lazo lokukhula lihlukile.

translation.en: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.
translation.zu: Njengoba ikhono lokuthola ulwazi kanye nelokufunda lishintshe ngendlela echazwe ngenhla izinga eliyisisekelo lelo ulwazi olwalutholwa ngalo lashintshwa.

translation.en: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.
translation.zu: Indlela yokuthola ukwaziswa yayihlukile. Ukucindezeleka kwakungasahlali enkumbulweni yomuntu, kodwa kwagxilwa ekhonweni lokukhumbula umbhalo kakhudlwana.

translation.en: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
translation.zu: Ngempela, iNguquko yenze ushintsho olukhulu endleni yokufunda nasekusabalaliseni ulwazi.

translation.en: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.
translation.zu: Ngokungafani nezinye izilwane ezicishe zifane nomuntu, izimfene azisazisebenzisi izandla zazo ukuze zihambe noma ukuthwala izinto noma ukushwiba ezihlahleni.

translation.en: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.
translation.zu: Isandla se-chimpanzee kanye nonyawo ziyafana ngobukhulu kanye nobude, okubonisa ukusetshenziswa kwesandla ekuthwaleni isisindo ekuhambeni ngamaqupha.

translation.en: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.
translation.zu: Isandla somuntu sifushane kunonyawo, ngama-phalange athe ukuqonda kakhudlwana.

translation.en: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
translation.zu: Amathambo esandla okwembiwa eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili kuya kwezintathu ubudala aveza lokhu kuguquka kwesandla kokusetshenziswa kwesandla kusuka ekusinyakaziseni kuya ekusisebenziseni.

translation.en: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.
translation.zu: Abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ukuba namaphupho amaningi lapho uzibona khona ukuthi uyaphupha okuzenzela kungakhathalisa kakhulu kaningi.

translation.en: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.
translation.zu: Isizathu esiyinhloko salombono umphumela wamaphupho lapho uzibona khona ukuthi uyaphupha anweba ubude besikhathi phakathi kwezimo ze-REM.

translation.en: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.
translation.zu: Ngama-REM ambalwa ebusuku, kulesi simo kulapho uthola khona ukulala kwangempela lapho umzimba wakho uzivuselela ngokwanele ukuthi ubhekane nezinkinga.

translation.en: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuyakhathalisa ngempela kwangathi bowuzovuka njalo ngemizuzu engamashumi amabili noma imizuzu engamashumi amathathu futhi ubukele i-TV.

translation.en: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
translation.zu: Umphumela uxhomeke ekutheni ingqondo yakho izama kangakanani ukuphupha izwa ubusuku ngabunye.

translation.en: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.
translation.zu: Izinto aziwahambeli kahle amaNtaliyane eNyakatho Afrika cishe kusuka ekuqaleni. Phakathi neviki lokumemezela kweNtaliyane impi ngoJuni 10, 1940, amaBritish 11th Hussar ayethumbe iFort Capuzzo eLibya.

translation.en: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.
translation.zu: Ekuqamekeleni kwasempumalanga yeBardia, abaseBhrithani bathumba uNjiniyela Oyinhloko weButho Leshumi womNtaliyane, uJenene Lastucci.

translation.en: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
translation.zu: Ngomhlaka 28 kuNhlangulana 28, u-Marshal Italo Balbo, uMbusi-Jikelele wase-Libya futhi obonakala eyindlalifa ka-Musolini, wabulawa ngephutha ngozakwabongenkathi efika e-Tobruk ngendiza.

translation.en: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.
translation.zu: Umdlalo wanamuhla we-fencing udlalwa emazingeni amaningi, kusukela ebafundini abafunda enyuvesi kuya kochwepheshe kanye nasekuncintisaneni kuma-Olimpiki.

translation.en: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
translation.zu: Umdlalo ngokuyisisekelo udlalwa ngohlelo lomqhudelwano wokulwa ngezikhali, omunye eshaya omunye.

translation.en: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.
translation.zu: Igalufu umdlalo lapho abahlali besebenzisa izimuhluza ukushaya amabhola angene emigodini.

translation.en: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.
translation.zu: Imigodi eyishumi nesishiyagalombili idlalwa engxenyeni evamile, nabadlali ngokuvamile beqala emgodini wokuqala enkundleni futhi baqede koweshumi nesishiyagalombili.

translation.en: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.
translation.zu: Umdlali oshaya izikhathi ezincane kunabo bonke, noma ukushwiba kwesimuhluza, ukuze aqede umdlalo enkundleni uyawina.

translation.en: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
translation.zu: Umdlalo udlalelwa otshanini, futhi utshani olungasemigodini busikwa bube bufishane futhi bubizwa nge-green.

translation.en: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.
translation.zu: Mhlawumbe uhlobo lokuvakasha oluvame kakhulu ilolo abantu abaningi abaluhlobanisa nokuthatha uhambo: Ukuvakasha Kokuzijabulisa.

translation.en: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.
translation.zu: Lapha yilapho abantu beya endaweni ehluke kakhulu kulokho abakwenza nsukuzonke ngokuvamile ukuze bayoncebeleka futhi bazijabulise.

translation.en: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.
translation.zu: Ambhishi, amapaki kanye namakhempu ayizindawo ngokuvamile ezivakashelwa izivakashi.

translation.en: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.
translation.zu: Uma inhloso yokuhambela komuntu endaweni ethile ukwazi umlando wawo namasiko ke lolu hlobo lwezokuvakasha luyaziwa njengokuvakasha ukuthi uyofunda amasiko.

translation.en: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
translation.zu: Izivakashi zingavakashela izindawo zezwe elithize ezinkulu eziphawula izwe ezihlukahlukene noma zingakhetha ukugxila endaweni eyodwa.

translation.en: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.
translation.zu: Ama-Colonist, ebona lomsebenzi, nawo abiza ukuthi kuqiniswe.

translation.en: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).
translation.zu: Amasosha wokuqinisa izikhundla zangaphambili ayehlanganisa ibutho lokuqala nelesithathu lase-New Hampshire lamadoda angama-200, ngaphansi koKonela John Stark no-James Reed (bobabili kamuva baba ngojenene).

translation.en: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.
translation.zu: Abantu bakaStark baya endaweni esocingweni olusenyakatho kwendawo yabenzi bamaKoloni.

translation.en: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.
translation.zu: Uma ukuncipha kwamanzi kuvula isikhala ngaseMfuleni iMistiki ngasempumalanga nyakatho yenhlonhlo, banweba ngokushesha uthango ngodonga olumfishane lwamatshe ngasenyakatho oluphelela ngasekuqaleni kwamanzi ogwini oluncane.

translation.en: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
translation.zu: UGridley noma uStark wabeka isigxobo esingamafidi angu-100 (30 m) phambi kocingo futhi wayala ukuthi kungabi nodubulayo kuze kube yilapho abantu abavamile besidlula.

translation.en: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions.
translation.zu: Isu laseMelika lixhomeke ekuhlaseleni okuqondiswayo okusuka ezinhlangothini ezintathu ezihlukahlukene.

translation.en: General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements.
translation.zu: UJenene John Cadwalder wayezokwenza ukuhlasela kokulibazisa ngokumelene nebutho lamaBhrithani eBordentown, ukuze avimbe noma ikuphi ukuqinisa.

translation.en: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping.
translation.zu: UJenene James Ewing ebengathatha amasosha angu-700 ngaphesheya komfula eTrenton Ferry, athathe ibhuloho eMfudlaneni i-Assunpink futhi avimbele amabutho wesitha ukuba abaleke.

translation.en: The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
translation.zu: Ibutho elihlaselayo eliyinhloko lamadoda angu-2,400 belizowela umfula amamayela ayisishiyagalolunye enyakatho neTrenton, bese alihlukanise libe amaqembu amabili, elinye ngaphansi kukaGreene futhi elinye ngaphansi kukaSullivan, ukuze ahlasele ngaphambi kwentathakusa.

translation.en: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity.
translation.zu: Ngoshintsho kusuka engxenyeni yesine kuye engxenyeni yokusubatha kwemayela, isivinini siba esingabalulekile kakhulu futhi ukukhuthazela kuba isidingo ngokuphelele.

translation.en: Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards.
translation.zu: Yiqiniso umsubathi wengxenye yemayela osezingeni eliphezulu, indoda engasubatha ngemizuzu emibili, kumelwe ibe nejubane elihle, kodwa ukukhuthazela kumelwe kuhlakulelwe nakanjani.
