translation.en: Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
translation.zu: Okunye ukugijima ezindaweni ezingavamile phakathi nobusika, kuhlanganiswe nokuzivivinya kokuqinisa imisipha namathambo engxenye engaphezulu yomzimba, ukuzilungiselela okuhle kwenkathi yokugijima.

translation.en: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness.
translation.zu: Ukudla okunomsoco kukodwa angeke kukwenze wenze kahle, kodwa kungathinta inhlalakahle yabasubathi abasebasha kakhulu.

translation.en: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
translation.zu: Ukunakekela ukulingana kwamandla empilo, ukuzijwayeza imikhuba emihle yokuphuza amanzi, kanye nokuqonda izici ezihlukahlukene zamaphilisi wamandla kungasiza abasubathi bathuthukise indlela abadlala ngayo futhi ithuthukise nenjabulo yabo emidlalweni.

translation.en: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate.
translation.zu: Ukusubatha kwebanga eliphakathi umdlalo ongabizi kakhulu; nokho, kunemibono eyiphutha eminingi mayelana namathuzuli adingekayo ukuze uhlanganyele ekuncintisaneni.

translation.en: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance.
translation.zu: Imikhiqizo ingathengwa ngokwesidingo sakho, kodwa eminingi izoba nokumbalwa noma ingabi namthelela otheni ekusebenzeni.

translation.en: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
translation.zu: Abasubathi bangazizwa sengathi bathanda umkhiqizo ngisho noma ungenazo izinzuzo zangempela.

translation.en: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter.
translation.zu: Ama-athomu mancane kakhulu ngendlela emangazayo kangangokuba ama-trillion awo angangena ku ngqi ekugcineni kwalomusho.

translation.en: Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1.
translation.zu: Yinto ekhona eyinkimbinkimbi ehlanganisa, ngokwesifanekiso sikaBohr esenziwe saba lula, i-nucleus emaphakathi ezungezwa ama-electron, okufana ngandlelathile nokuzungeza kwamapulanethi ilunga - bona Umfanekiso 1.1.

translation.en: The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons.
translation.zu: I-nucleus yenziwe ngezinhlayiyana ezimbili - ama-neutron kanye nama-proton.

translation.en: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
translation.zu: Ama-phrothoni anamandla kagesi kuyilapho ama-nyuthroni engenawo amandla kagesi. Ama elekthroni anamandla kagesi angaphansi kweqanda ngenani.

translation.en: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety.
translation.zu: Ukuhlola umuntu ohlukunyeziwe, a kufanele kuqalauhlole indawo yesehlakalo ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwakho.

translation.en: You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags.
translation.zu: Udinga ukubona indawo yesisulu njengoba usondela kuye nanoma yiziphi izimpawu eziyisixwayiso.

translation.en: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
translation.zu: Uma ulimala uzama ukusiza, ungenza izinto zibe zibi nakakhulu nje kuphela.

translation.en: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers.
translation.zu: Ucwaningo lubonise ukuthi ukucindezeleka, ukwesaba kanye nokubuka izinto njengenhlekelele kuqondisa ubuhlobo phakathi kobuhlungu nokukhubazeka kubantu abahlushwa ubuhlungo beqolo obusezansi.

translation.en: Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions.
translation.zu: Ukuphela komphumela wokubuka izinto zizimbi kunangendlela eziyiyo, hhayi ukucindezeleka futhi ukwasaba bekunombandela wemihlangano ye-PA yamaviki onke ehleliwe.

translation.en: Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.
translation.zu: Labo abazibandakanya emisebenzini evamile badinga ukusekelwa okwengeziwe mayelana nokuzwa ubuhlungu, ubona umehluko phakathi kobuhlungu obungapheli kanye nokungaphatheki kahle okuvela ekunyakazeni komzimba.

translation.en: Vision, or the ability to see depends on visual system sensory organs or eyes.
translation.zu: Ukubona, noma ukukwazi ukubona kuncike ohlelweni lwezinzwa zokubona noma amehlo.

translation.en: There are many different constructions of eyes, ranging in complexity depending on the requirements of the organism.
translation.zu: Kunokwakheka okuningi okuhlukile kwamehlo, okuhlukayo ngokuba inkimbinkimbi kuye ngezimfuneko zento ephilayo.

translation.en: The different constructions have different capabilities, are sensitive to different wave-lengths and have differing degrees of acuity, also they require different processing to make sense of the input and different numbers to work optimally.
translation.zu: Izakhiwo ezingefani zinamakhono angefani, ziyezwela ezinhlobeni ezingefani zomoya futhi zinokukhalipha okungefani, futhi zidinga izindlela ezingefani zokusetshenziswa ukuze kuphumelele kanye nenani elingefani lomsebenzi.

translation.en: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area.
translation.zu: Ubuningi iqoqo lezinto eziphilayo zohlobo oluthile phakathi nendawo ethile.

translation.en: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic.
translation.zu: Lapho umuntu ngamunye efana nomunye ngesici esithile se-phenotype, baziwa ngokuthi ba-monomorphic.

translation.en: When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
translation.zu: Uma abantu ngabanye beveza izimfanelo ezihlukahlukene eziningana zesici esithile banezimo eziningi.

translation.en: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well.
translation.zu: Ibutho lequlo lezintuthwane lihamba futhi lizalele ngezigaba ezahlukahlukene.

translation.en: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day.
translation.zu: Esigabeni sokufuduka, amabutho ezintuthwane amasha ebusuku bese amise inkampu phakathi nosuku.

translation.en: The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday.
translation.zu: Ikoloni liqala isigaba sokuzulazula lapho ukudla okukhona kunciphile. Phakathi nalesi sigaba, ikoloni lenza izidleke zesikhashana ezishintshwa zinsuku zonke.

translation.en: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuvukela kwabazulazulayo ngakunye noma ukubhikisha kuthathe cishe izinsuku ezingu-17.

translation.en: What is a cell? The word cell comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning "small room", and it was first coined by a microscopist observing the structure of cork.
translation.zu: Liyini ingqamuzane? Igama elithi ingqamuzane liqhamuka kwelesi-Latin elithi “cella”, okusho “igumbi elincane”, futhi lasetshenziswa okokuqala uchwepheshe wokusebenzisa isibonakhulu ehlola indlela ukhokho owakheke ngayo.

translation.en: The cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all organisms are composed of one or more cells.
translation.zu: Ingqamuzana isakhi esiyisekelo sazo zonke izinto eziphilayo, futhi zonke izinto eziphilayo zenziwe ngengqamuzana elilodwa noma amaningi.

translation.en: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life".
translation.zu: Amangqamuzane ayisisekelo futhi abucayi ocwaningweni lwempilo, empeleni, kaningi kubhekiselwa kuwo njengokuthi "izakhi zokuphila".

translation.en: The Nervous System maintains homeostasis by sending nerve impulses through out the body to keep the flow of blood going as well as undisturbed.
translation.zu: Isimiso Sezinzwa sakha uzinzo ngokuthumela umuzwa wokufisa emzimbeni wonke ukuze ugcine umjikelezo wegazi uqhubeka ungaphazamiseki.

translation.en: These nerve impulses can be sent so quickly throughout the body which helps keep the body safe from any potential threat.
translation.zu: Le miyalezo yezinzwa engathunyelwa ngokushesha emzimbeni wonke esiza ekugcineni umzimba uphephile kunoma yini engaba usongo.

translation.en: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path.
translation.zu: Izishingishane zigadla endaweni encane uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye iziphepho ezinamandla, kodwa zingabhubhisa yonke into esendleleni yazo.

translation.en: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours.
translation.zu: Izishingishane zisiphula izihlahla, zidabule amabhodi ezindlini, ziphonse izimoto phezulu. Amaphesenti amabili wezishingishane ezibucayi kakhulu athatha ngaphezu kwamahora amathathu.

translation.en: These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
translation.zu: Isiphepho esikhulu esingakwayelekile besigijima ngesivinini sika-480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).

translation.en: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years.
translation.zu: Abantu babenza futhi basebenzisa izingilazi ukuze bakhulise izinto ezibukwayo izinkulungwane zezinkulungwane zeminyaka.

translation.en: However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century.
translation.zu: Nokho, ama-telescope okuqala angempela enziwa eYurophu ekupheleni kwekhulu lama-16 leminyaka.

translation.en: These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.
translation.zu: Lawa matheleskobhu asebenzisa inhlanganisela yamalensi amabili ukwenza izinto ezikude zibonakale kokubili zisiduze futhi zizinkulu.

translation.en: Greed and selfishness will always be with us and it is the nature of cooperation that when the majority benefit there will always be more to gain in the short term by acting selfishly
translation.zu: Ubugovu kanye nomhawu kuzohlala nathi ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi kuba khona lapho sifuna ukusebenzisana, lapho kuzuza khona abaningi kuzohlale kunokuningi ongakuzuza ngesikhathi esifushane ngokuba nomhawu

translation.en: Hopefully, most people will realise that their long term best option is to work together with others.
translation.zu: Ngokuthembisayo, abantu abaningi bazoqaphela ukuthi abangakukhetha okuhle kakhulu kwesikhathi eside ukusebenzisana nabanye.

translation.en: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant.
translation.zu: Abantu abaningi baphupha ngosuku lapho beyokwazi ukuvakashela izinkanyezi baphinde babone neminye imihlaba, abanye bayazibuza ukuthi kunani lapha phezulu abanye bakholelwa ukuthi abantu bakwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila zingaphila kwelinye ipulanethi.

translation.en: But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are "neighbors".
translation.zu: Kodwa, uma lokhu kuke kwenzeke cishe angeke kwenzeke isikhathi eside kakhulu. Izinkanyezi zisakazeke kakhulu kangangokuthi kunezigidigidikazi zamamayela bakwathi kwezinkanyezi "ezingomakhelwane".

translation.en: Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?
translation.zu: Mhlawumbe ngolunye usuku, izizukulwane zakho zizobe zimi phezu kwezwe lwezidalwa ezivela komunye umhlaba zizibuza ngokhokho bazo bakudala?

translation.en: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.
translation.zu: Izilwane zenziwa amangqamuzana amaningi. Zidla izinto futhi zizigaye ngaphakathi. Izilwane ezingi ziyakwazi ukunyakaza.

translation.en: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).
translation.zu: Izilwane kuphela ezinobuchopho (nakuba kungezona zonke izilwane ezinabo; ama-jellyfish, ngokwesibonelo, awanabo ubuchopho).

translation.en: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
translation.zu: Izilwane zitholakala yonke indawo emhlabeni. Zemba phansi, zibhukude ezilwandle, futhi zindize esibhakabhakeni.

translation.en: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.
translation.zu: Ingqamuzana ingxenye encane kunazo zonke engokwesakhiwo nesebenzayo yento ephilayo (izinto).

translation.en: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.
translation.zu: I-cell ivela egameni lesiLatin elithi cella elisho igumbi elincane.

translation.en: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.
translation.zu: Uma ubheka izinto eziphilayo ngesibona khulu, uzobona ukuthi zenziwe ngokusazikwele okuncane noma amabhola.

translation.en: Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope.
translation.zu: URobert Hooke, usobhayoloji waseNgilandi, wabona izikwele ezincane okhokhweni ngesibonakhulu.

translation.en: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
translation.zu: Ayebukeka njengamakamelo. Wayengumuntu wokuqala wokuhlola amangqamuzana afile.

translation.en: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.
translation.zu: Ama-elementi kanye namakhompawundi angasuswa kwenye indawo ayiswe kwenye kodwa angashintshi.

translation.en: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.
translation.zu: I-nitrogen njengegesi isenezici ezifanayo ne-nitrogen ewuketshezi. Isimo soketshezi siyasinda kodwa amangqamuzana asafana.

translation.en: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
translation.zu: Amanzi esinye isibonelo. Ingxube yamanzi yenziwe ama-athomu amabili we-hydrogen kanye ne-athomu elilodwa le-oxygen.

translation.en: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.
translation.zu: Anokwakhekwa kwengqamuzana okufanayo kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ayigesi, uketshezi, noma aqinile.

translation.en: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
translation.zu: Nakuba isimo sawo esingokoqobo singashintsha, isimo sawo samakhemikhali asiguquki.

translation.en: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.
translation.zu: Isikhathi into esizungezile sonke, futhi sithinta yonke into esiyenzayo, nokho kunzima ukusiqonda.

translation.en: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.
translation.zu: Isikhathi sitadishwe izazi zenkolo, zefilosofi, kanye nezesayensi izinkulungwane zeminyaka.

translation.en: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.
translation.zu: Sibona isikhathi njengezenzakalo eziwuchungechunge ezidlulayo zisuka esikhathini esizayo kuya kwesamanje kuya kwesedlule.

translation.en: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.
translation.zu: Isikhathi futhi siyindlela esiqhathanisa ngayo isikhathi (ubude) sezenzakalo.

translation.en: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
translation.zu: Ungaphawula ukudlula kwesikhathi ngokwakho ngokubheka impinda yesenzakalo somjikelozo. Isenzakalo somjikelezo yinto eyenzeka ngokuphindaphindiwe ngokuvamile.

translation.en: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.
translation.zu: Amakhompyutha namuhla asetshenziselwa ukusebenza ngezithombe namavidiyo.

translation.en: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.
translation.zu: Opopayi abayinkimbinkimbi bangenziwa ngamakhompyutha, futhi lolu hlobo lopopayi lusetshenziswa ngokwandayo kuthelevishini nakumafilimu.

translation.en: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
translation.zu: Umculo kaningi urekhodwa kusetshenziswa amakhompyutha ayinkimbinkimbi ukusebenzisa kanye nokuhlanganisa imisindo ndawonye.

translation.en: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.
translation.zu: Isikhathi eside phakathi namakhulu eminyaka eshumi nesishiyagalolunye kanye namashumi amabili, bekukholelwa ukuthi abahlali bokuqala baseNyuzilandi abantu baseMaori, ababezingela izinyoni ezinkulu ezibizwa ngama-moa.

translation.en: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.
translation.zu: Umcabango wakha umbono wokuthi abantu bama-Maori basuke ePholinesiya ngeMikhumbi Eminingi futhi bathathela ama-Mariori iNyuzilandi, bamisa umphakathi wokulima.

translation.en: However, new evidence suggests that the Moriori were a group of mainland Maori who migrated from New Zealand to the Chatham Islands, developing their own distinctive, peaceful culture.
translation.zu: Nokho, ubufakazi obusha busikisela ukuthi ama-Moriori bekuyiqembu labantu basezwekazini laseMaori abathuthe besuka eNyuzilandi beya eZiqhingini zaseChatham, bezenzela isiko labo elihlukile, elinokuthula.

translation.en: There was also another tribe on the Chatham islands these were Maori who migrated away from New Zealand.
translation.zu: Bekunesinye futhi isizwe eziqhingini zase-Chatham laba bekungama-Maori abathuthe besuka eNyuzilandi.

translation.en: They called themselves the Moriori there were a few skirmishes and in the end, the Moriori were wiped out
translation.zu: Babezibiza ama-Moriori bekunabantu abathanda ukulwa abambalwa futhi ekugcineni, ama-Moriori abhujiswa.

translation.en: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures.
translation.zu: Abantu ngabanye abahilelekile amakhulu eminyaka amaningana basisize sazise amakhono ethu nesikuthandayo kuyilapho sihlola bobuqotho ubunzima ngisho nokwehluleka.

translation.en: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.
translation.zu: Ngenkathi silalele abantu ngabanye besitshela izindaba zabo, zomndeni, kanye nezenhlangano, sithole ukuqonda okubalulekile kwesikhathi esidlule kanye nabanye babantu abathonye isiko lenhlangano ngendlela enhle noma embi.

translation.en: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.
translation.zu: Nakuba ukuzwisisa umlando womuntu kungasho ukuzwisisa isiko lomuntu, okungenani kusiza abantu babe nomuzwa wokuthi bawela kuphi emlandweni wenhlangano.

translation.en: While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization.
translation.zu: Uma bebhekisisa impumelelo futhi uqaphela ukuhluleka, abantu ngabanye kanye nabo bonke abantu ababambe iqhaza bathola ngokujulileizinkolelo, imigomo, kanye nezinto ezishukumisa le nhlangano.

translation.en: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.
translation.zu: Kulesi simo, ukukhumbula izimo ezidlule zokuziphatha kwezamabhizinisi kanye nempumelelo ebakhona kwasiza abantu bamukele izinguquko kanye nendlela entsha yesonto lendawo.

translation.en: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.
translation.zu: Izindaba ezinjalo zempumelelo zanciphisa ukwesaba ushintsho, zibe zenza ukuthambekela okuhle oshintshweni lwesikhathi esizayo.

translation.en: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.
translation.zu: Izindlela zokucabanga ezihlelwe kahle ziyisisxazululo sezinkinga esihlanganisa imibono ehlukahlukene noma izindawo ukuze zithole isixazululo.

translation.en: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.
translation.zu: Ukugxila kwalomcabango isivinini, ingqondo kanye nokunemba, futhi nokuphawulwa kwamaqinisio, ukusebenzisa kabusha izindlela ezikhona, ukuqongelela ukwaziswa.

translation.en: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.
translation.zu: Isici esibaluleke kakhulu salomcabango ukuthi: kunempendulo eyodwa kuphela enembile. Ucabanga ngezimpendulo ezimbili kuphela, okungukuthi enembile nenganembile.

translation.en: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.
translation.zu: Lolu hlobo lokucabanga lihlotshaniswa nohlobo oluthile lwesayensi noma izindlela ezithile ezisezingeni.

translation.en: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
translation.zu: Abantu abanalolu hlobo lokucabanga bacabanga ngendlela enengqondo, bayakwazi ukubamba izifanekiso ngekhanda, ukuxazulula izinkinga nokwenza izivivinyo zesayensi.

translation.en: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.
translation.zu: Abantu izidalwa ezinekhono elidlula elezinye lokufunda izingqondo zabanye.

translation.en: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.
translation.zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi siyakwazi ukubikezela ngokuphumelelayo lokho abanye abantu abakubonayo, abakuhlelayo, abakukholelwayo, abakwaziyo kanye nabakufisayo.

translation.en: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.
translation.zu: Phakathi kwalawa makhono, ukuqonda inhloso yabanye kubalulekile. Kusivumela ukuxazilula izindida ezingaba khona zezenzo ezingokoqobo.

translation.en: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo, uma ubona umuntu ephula iwindi lemoto, ngokuvamile ungacabanga ukuthi ubefuna ukweba imoto yomuntu ongamazi.

translation.en: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
translation.zu: Wayezodinga ukwahlulelwa ngokuhlukile uma ngabe wayelahle izikhiye zemoto yakhe futhi bekuyimoto yakhe ayezama ukuyigqekeza.

translation.en: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).
translation.zu: I-MRI isuselwa esenzakalweni sesayensi esibizwa nge-nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), eyatholwa ngawo-1930 ngu-Felix Bloch (owayesebenza eNyuvesi yase-Stanford) kanye no-Edward Purcell (waseNyuvesi yase-Havard).

translation.en: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.
translation.zu: Kulommemo, amandla kazibuthe kanye namava omsakazo abangela ama-athomu ukukhipha izimpawu zemisebe ezincane.

translation.en: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.
translation.zu: Ngonyaka ka-1970, uRaymond Damadian, udokotela wezokwelapha kanye nososayensi wocwaningo, uthole isisekelo sokusebenzisa izithombe zommemo kazibuthe njengethuluzi lokucilonga kwezokwelapha.

translation.en: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.
translation.zu: Iminyaka emine kamuva incwadi yemvume yanikezwa, okwakuyincwadi yemvume yokuqala emhlabeni enikezwe enkundleni yeMRI.

translation.en: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
translation.zu: Ngo-1977, uDkt. Damadian waqeda ukwakha iskena se-MRI "somzimba ophelele", asibiza ngokuthi “Esingenakunqotshwa”.

translation.en: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.
translation.zu: Ukukhulumisana okungenzeki ngasikhathi sinye kukhuthaza isikhathi sokucabangisisa kanye nokusabela kwabanye.

translation.en: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.
translation.zu: Kunika abafundi ikhono lokusebenza ngejubane labo futhi balawule ijubane lokwaziswa kokufundisa.

translation.en: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, kunokukhawulelwa kwesikhathi okumbalwa ngethuba lamahora okusebenza avumelana nezimo. (Bremer, 1998)

translation.en: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.
translation.zu: Ukusetshenziswa kwe-inthanethi neWebhu Yomhlaba Jikelele kuvumela abafundi ukuthi bakwazi ukuthola ukwaziswa abakudingayo ngaso sonke isikhathi.

translation.en: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
translation.zu: Abafunda bangabuye bakwazi ukuthumela imibuzo kubafundisi nganoma isiphi isikhathi sosuku futhi balindele ukusabela cishe okusheshayo, kunokulinda umhlangano wobuso nobuso olandelayo.

translation.en: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.
translation.zu: Indlela yesimanje yokufunda inikeza inkululeko ezintweni ezingenamkhawulo. Ayikho indlela eyodwa kuphela yokufunda.

translation.en: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.
translation.zu: Eqinisweni, akuyona eyodwa into umuntu okumele ayifunde. Ukufunda kudinga ulwazi phakathi komfundi nalolo lwazi olusuke lunikezwa.

translation.en: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.
translation.zu: Ulwazi lethu esinalo lokuzenzela izinto nokukhuluma ngokwaziswa, izinhlelo zethelevishini ezisekelwe ekufundeni ziveza leli phuzu.

translation.en: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.
translation.zu: Iningi lethu sizithola sibukele izinhlelo zethelevishini ezisitshela ngenqubo noma into eyenzekayo esingeke sihlanganyele kuyo noma sisebenzise lolo lwazi.

translation.en: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
translation.zu: Angeke silungise imoto, sakhe umthombo emuva kwegceke, sithathe uhambo oluya ePheru ukuyohlola amanxiwa akudala, noma silungise indlu kamakhelwane wethu.

translation.en: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokuxhumana kwekhebuli enemicu yokudlulisa ukukhaya ehamba ngaphansi kolwandle nesiphuphutheki sokuxhumanisa, i-Greenland uxhumene kahle nabantu abangu-93% abanoxhumano lwe-inthanethi.

translation.en: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.
translation.zu: Ihhotela lakho noma umbungazi (uma uhlala endlini yezivakashi noma ikhaya lomuntu) cishe uzoba ne-wifi noma ikhompyutha exhunywe kuyi-inthanethi, futhi zonke izindawo zinezitolo ze-inthanethi noma izindawo ze-wifi zomphakathi.

translation.en: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.
translation.zu: Njengoba kushiwo ngenhla, nakuba igama elithi "Eskimo" lihlala lamukelekile eMelika, lithathwa njengokweyisa abantu abaningi abangahlali eMelika base-Arctic, ikakhulukazi eCanada.

translation.en: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.
translation.zu: Nakuba ungezwa leli gama lisetshenziswa abantu Bendabuko baseZweni Eliluhlaza, kumelwe ligwenywe abantu bakwamanye amazwe.

translation.en: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.
translation.zu: Abahlali bendabuko baseGreenland bazibiza ngokuthi Inuit eCanada nokuthi Kalaalleq (ubuningi Kalaallit), umuntu waseGreenland, eGreenland.

translation.en: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."
translation.zu: Ubugebengu kanye nokuphatha kabi abakwamanye amazwe ngokujwayelekile, kuyinto engaziwa e-Greenland. Kanti nasemadolobheni, azikho “izindawo ezinodlame.”

translation.en: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.
translation.zu: Isimo sezulu esibandayo cishe yiyo kuphela ingozi engokoqobo abangazilungiselele abazohlangabezana nayo.

translation.en: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.
translation.zu: Uma uvakashela iZwe Eliluhlaza ngenkathi ebandayo (ngokubona ukuthi uma uya enyakatho nakakhulu, kuya kubanda), kubalulekile ukuphatha okokugqoka okufudumele ngokwanele.

translation.en: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.
translation.zu: Izinsuku ezinde kakhulu ehlobo zingaholela ezinkingeni zokulala ngokwanele futhi zihlotshaniswa nezinkinga zempilo.

translation.en: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.
translation.zu: Phakathi nehlobo, qaphela omiyane base-Nordic. Nakuba bengadlulisi noma iziphi izifo, bangacasula.

translation.en: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.
translation.zu: Noma umnotho wase-San Francisco uxhumane nawo njengendawo ethandwa yizivakashi emhlabeni wonke, umnotho wayo uyingxubevange.

translation.en: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.
translation.zu: Umkhakha womsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu izinkonzo zobuchwepheshe, uhulumeni, ezemali, ezokwehweba, kanye nezokuvakasha.

translation.en: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.
translation.zu: Ukubukiswa kwalo njalo emculweni, kumafilimu, ezincwadini kanye nasemasikweni athandwayo kwenze idolobha kanye nezici ezibonwa ngalo izwe zaziwe emhlabeni wonke.

translation.en: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.
translation.zu: I-San Francisco izungezwe izakhiwo ezinkulu zezivakashi ezinamahhotela amaningi, izitolo zokudlela, kanye nezakhiwo zemihlangano ezisezingeni eliphezulu.

translation.en: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
translation.zu: eSan Francisco nayo ingenye yezindawo ezinhle kunazo zonke esizweni sokupheka ezinye izinto zase-Eshiya: iKorea, iThai, iNdiya, neJapan

translation.en: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.
translation.zu: Ukuvakashela e-Walt Disney World kumelela uhambo olukhulu lokuya endaweni engcwele emindenini eminingi yaseMelika.

translation.en: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.
translation.zu: Ukuvakasha “okuvamile” kuhlanganisa ukundiza uye eSikhumulweni seziNdiza seZizwe Zonke sase-Orlando, ukuthatha ibhasi eliya ehhotela elise-Disney, ukuchitha isikhathi esingangesonto ngaphandle kokuphuma endaweni yase-Disney, kanye nokubuyela ekhaya.

translation.en: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".
translation.zu: Ziningi Izinto ongakhetha kuzona, kodwa lokhu kuhlala kuyilokho abantu abakushoyo uma bekhuluma "ngokuya e-Disney World."

translation.en: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.
translation.zu: Amathikithi amaningi adayiswa nge-inthanethi ngezingosi zezindali njenge-eBay noma i-Craigslist asatshenziswa njengamathikithi okuya emapaki amaningi ngezinsuku eziningi.

translation.en: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
translation.zu: Nakuba kuwumsebenzi ovamile kakhulu, wenqatshelwe yi-Disney: amathikithi awadluliselwa.

translation.en: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit.
translation.zu: Noma ikuphi ukukanisa onqenqemeni lweGrand Canyon kufuna imvume yasezintabeni.

translation.en: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.
translation.zu: Izimvume zinginganiselwe ukuze kuvikelwe izindonga ezinkulu ezenziwa umfula, futhi zitholakala ngokusuku lokuqala lwenyanga, izinyanga ezine ngaphambi kokuqala kwenyanga.

translation.en: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan.
translation.zu: Ngakho-ke, imvume yasezintabeni yanoma iluphi usuku lokuqalisa ngoMeyi itholakala ngo-1 Jan.

translation.en: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.
translation.zu: Indawo ezindaweni ezijwayeleke kakhulu, njenge-Bright Angel Campground eseduze kwe-Phantom Ranch, ngokuvamile egwaliswa izicelo ezitholakale ngosuku lokuqala kuvuliwe.

translation.en: There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
translation.zu: Kunenani elilinganiselwe lezimvume ezibekelwe izicelo zabafika kungahleliwe ezitholakala kulabo abafike kuqala.

translation.en: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.
translation.zu: Ukungena e-Afrika eseNingizimu kuyindlela amangalisayo yokubona ubuhle bendawo kanye nokuya ezindaweni ezingekho emzileni wezivakashi ovamile.

translation.en: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.
translation.zu: Lokhu kungenzeka emotweni ejwayelekile uma uhlela ngokucophelela kodwa i-4x4 iyona okutuswa ukuthi uyisebenzise kakhulu futhi ungakwazi ukufinyelela ezindaweni eziningi nge-4x4 enamasondo aphakeme kuphela.

translation.en: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.
translation.zu: Ukukhumbula njengoba uhlela ukuthi nakuba i-Afrika eseNingizimu igxilile akuwona wonke amazwe angomakhelwane anjalo.

translation.en: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.
translation.zu: Izimfuneko ze-visa nezindleko kuyahluka emazweni ngamazwe futhi kuthonywa yizwe ovela kulo.

translation.en: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
translation.zu: Izwe ngalinye libuye libe nemithetho ehlukile edinga okumelwe kube yizinto zesimo esiphuthumayo okumelwe zibe semotweni.

translation.en: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.
translation.zu: IMpophoma iVictoria idolobha elisengxenyeni esentshonalanga yaseZimbabwe, ngaphesheya komkhawulo kusuka eTsheni Eliphilayo, eZambia futhi eduze naseBotswana.

translation.en: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.
translation.zu: Idolobha lakheke eduze kwezimpophoma, futhi ziheha kakhulu, futhi lendawo ethandwayo yezivakashi inikeza kokubili abathandi benjabulo kaye nabathandi bendalo ithuba lokuhlala isikhathi eside.

translation.en: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi semvula (Novemba ukuya kuMashi), izinga lamanzi lizobaphezulu futhi iZimpophoma zizoba namandla kakhulu.

translation.en: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.
translation.zu: Uyaqinisekiswa ukuthi uzoba manzi uma uwela ibhuloho noma uhamba emizileni eseduze neMpophoma.

translation.en: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
translation.zu: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, kungenxa nje yokuthi amanzi akhona maningi kangangokuba ukubona iMpophoma ngokwayo kuzositheka—yiwo wonke amanzi!

translation.en: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.
translation.zu: Ithuna likaTutankhamun (KV62). I-KV63 kungaba yithuna elidume kakhulu eSigodini, indawo yomvubukulo ka-Howard Carter wango-1992 wethuna cishe elisahlangene lasebukhosini lenkosi esencane.

translation.en: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.
translation.zu: Uma liqhathaniswa namanye amathuna wasebukhonsini, ithuna likaTutankhamun, kepha, cishe akubalulekanga ukulivakashela, njengoba lilincane kakhudlwana futhi linemihlobiso elinganiselwe.

translation.en: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.
translation.zu: Noma ubani onesithakazelo sokubona ubufakazi bomonakalo owenzeke esidumbwini esomiswe ngemithi ngenkathi kuzanywa ukusisusa ebhokisini lomngcwabo uzodumala njengoba kubonakala ikhanda namahlombe kuphela.

translation.en: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
translation.zu: Ingcebo emangalisayo yethuna ayisekho kulo, kodwa iyiswe eMnyuziyamu yaseGibhithe e-Khayiro.

translation.en: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
translation.zu: Izivakashi ezinesikhathi esilinganiselwe zingenza kahle ukuchitha isikhathi sazo kwenye indawo.

translation.en: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.
translation.zu: I-Phnom Krom, engu-12 km eningizimu ntshonalanga yeSiem Reap. Leli thempeli eliphezu kwegquma lakhiwa ekugcineni kwekhulu lama-9 leminyaka, phakathi nokubusa kweNkosi uYasovarman.

translation.en: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.
translation.zu: Isimo sokungabi nathemba sethempeli kanye nokubona indawo ngaphezu kwechibi leTonle Sap kwenza ukugibela igqube kufanelwe umzamo.

translation.en: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.
translation.zu: Ukuvakashela indawo kungahlanganiswa ngokufanelekile nohambo lwesikebhe lokuya echibini.

translation.en: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
translation.zu: Indawo Yokudlula yase-Angkor iyadingeka ukuze ungene ethempelini ngakho ungakhohlwa ukuza nephasiphothi yakho uma uya eTonle Sap.

translation.en: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.
translation.zu: IJerusalema inhlokodolobha futhi idolobha elikhulu kunawo wonke lakwa-Israyeli, nakuba amanye amazwe amaningi neZizwe Ezihlangene zingayiqapheli njengenhlokodolobha yakwa-Israyeli.

translation.en: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.
translation.zu: Idolobha lamandulo eMagqumeni aseJudiya linomlando othakazelisayo oneminyaka eyizinkulungwane.

translation.en: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.
translation.zu: Idolobha lingcwele ezinkolweni ezintathu ezikholelwa kuNkulunkulu oyedwa – ubuJuda, ubuKhristu kanye nobuSulumani, futhi liyisikhungo esingokomoya, esingokwenkolo, kanye nesingokwesiko.

translation.en: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokubaluleka okungokwenkolo kwedolobha, futhi ngokukhethekile izindawo eziningi zendawo yeDolobha Lakudala, iJerusalema ingenye yezindawo eziyinhloko izivakashi eziya kuyo kwa-Israyeli.

translation.en: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
translation.zu: IJerusalema linezindawo eziningi zomlando, zemivubukulo kanye nezamasiko kuhlanganise nezindawo zokuthenga ezinhle neziphithizelayo, amakhefi kanye nezindawo zokudlela.

translation.en: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.
translation.zu: I-Ecuador ilindele ukuthi izakhamuzi zase-Cuba zithole incwadi yesimemo ngaphambi kokungena e-Ecuadore ngezikhululo zezindiza zakwamanye amazwe noma izindawo zokungena ezisephethelweni.

translation.en: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.
translation.zu: Lencwadi kumelwe yenziwe ibe semthethweni yi-Ecuadore Ministry of Foreign Affairs, futhi yenze ngokuvumelana nezicelo ezidingekayo.

translation.en: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.
translation.zu: Lezi zidingo zakhelwe ukunikeza indlela ehlelekile yokuthutha phakathi kwamazwe womabili.

translation.en: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.
translation.zu: Izakhamuzi zaseCuba ezinemvume yokuhlala nokusebenza eMelika kumelwe zivakashele Inxusa lase-Ecuadore ukuze zithole ukukhululwa kulemfuneko.

translation.en: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
translation.zu: Iphasiphoti yakho kumelwe ibe semthethweni okungenani izinyana ezingu-6 ngaphezu kwezinsuku zakho zohambo. Ithikithi lokuya nokubuya liyadingeka ukufakazela ubude besikhathi ozosihlala.

translation.en: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.
translation.zu: Ukuvakasha kushibhile emaqenjini amakhulu, ngakho uma uzimele noma unomngane oyedwa, zama ukuhlangana nabanye abantu ukuze nakhe iqembu labantu abane noma abasithupha ukuze nithole amanani aphansi omuntu oyedwa.

translation.en: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.
translation.zu: Nokho, lokhu akumelwe kukukhathaze, ngoba kaningi izivakashi ziyiswa ngapha nangapha ukugcwalisa izimoto.

translation.en: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
translation.zu: Kubonakala empeleni kuyindlela yokuyengela abantu ekucabangeni ukuthi kumelwe bakhokhele okwengeziwe.

translation.en: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.
translation.zu: Ime ngaphezu kwengxenye esenyakatho yeMachu Picchu yilentaba ewummango, kaningi okuyindawo evelayo ngemuva ezithombeni zamanxiwa.

translation.en: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.
translation.zu: Kubukeka kusabisa kancane kusuka ngaphansi, futhi yindawo eyehlelayo nokunzima ukukhuphuka kuyo, kodwa abantu abakulungele ngokwanele kufanele bakwazi ukukwenza cishe ngemizuzu engama-45.

translation.en: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.
translation.zu: Izitebhisizamatshe zibekwa eceleni kwendlela, futhi ezingxenyeni ezinomqansa izintambo zensimbi ziba uthango lokubambelelisa izandla .

translation.en: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.
translation.zu: Nokho, lindela ukuphelelwa umoya, futhi uziqaphele ezingxenyeni ezehlelayo, ikakhulukazi lapho kumanzi, njengoba kungaba yingozi ngokushesha.

translation.en: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
translation.zu: Kunomhume omncane eduze nesiqongo okumelwe kudlulwe kuwo, usezansi kakhulu futhi uminyene.

translation.en: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.
translation.zu: Ukubona izindawo kanye nezilwane zasendle zamaGalapago kwenzeka kahle kakhulu ngesikebhe, njengoba nje uCharles Darwin enza ngo-1835.

translation.en: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.
translation.zu: Imikhumbi yokuvakasha engaphezu kuka-60 igwedla emanzini wamaGalapago - ihluka ngobukhulu kusukela kwegibeza abantu abangu-8 kuya ku-100.

translation.en: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).
translation.zu: Abantu abaningi babhukha indawo yabo kusenesikhathi (njengoba izikebhe ziyaye zisheshe ukugcwala ngezikhathi ezimatasa zonyaka).

translation.en: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.
translation.zu: Qinisekisa ukuthi umuntu okubhukelayo unguchwepheshe wamaGalapago onalwazi oluhle lwezinhlobonhlobo eziningi zemikhumbi.

translation.en: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi onesithakazelo kukho ngokukhethekile kanye/noma okukucindezelayo kuhambisana nomkhumbi okufanele kakhulu.

translation.en: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.
translation.zu: Ngaphambi kokuba kufike abantu baseSpeyini ngekhulu lama-16 leminyaka, iChile esenyakatho beyingaphansi kokubusa kwama-Inca kuyilapho ama-Araucania wendabuko (Mapuche) ayehlala eChile ephakathi neseningizimu.

translation.en: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.
translation.zu: Ama-Mapuche bekungamanye wamaqembu omdabu azimele wokugcina waseMelika, ababengangenanga ngokugcwele emthethweni wokukhuluma isiPanishi ngemva kokuzimela kwe-Chile.

translation.en: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
translation.zu: Nakuba i-Chile yamemezela ukuzimela ngo-1810 (phakathi kwezimpi zikaNapholiyoni ezashiya iSpeyini ngaphandle kohulumeni omkhulu iminyaka embalwa), ukunqoba abantu baseSpeyini okungumnqamulajuqu akwenzekanga kwaze kwaba ngu-1818.

translation.en: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti
translation.zu: i-Dominican Republic (iSpanish: República Dominicana) iyisizwe sase-Caribbean esisengxenyeni esempumalanga yesiqhingi sase-Hispaniola, eyabelana ne-Haiti

translation.en: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
translation.zu: Ngaphandle kwezihlabathi ezimhlophe zolwandle kanye nezindawo ezinezintaba, lelizwe liyikhaya ledolobha elidala kunawo wonke laseYurophu kuma-Americas, manje okuyingxenye yeSanto Domingo.

translation.en: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
translation.zu: Esiqhingini ekuqaleni bekuhlala ama-Taíno namaCaribe. AmaCaribe bekungabantu abakhuluma isi-Arawaka abafike ngawo-10,000 BCE.

translation.en: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
translation.zu: Phakathi neminyaka embalwa ngemva kokufika kwezinhloli zaseYurophu, inani labantu baseTainos lehliswe ngokuphawulekayo abanqobi baseSpeyini

translation.en: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
translation.zu: Ngokusekelwe kuFray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) phakathi kuka-1492 no-1498 abanqobi baseSpeyini babulala ama-Taíno acishe abe ngu-100,000.

translation.en: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
translation.zu: I-Jardín de la Unión. Lesi sikhala sakhiwa njengegceke lesonto ngekhulu le-17, lapho i-Templo de San Diego eyisakhiwo esasindayo kuphela.

translation.en: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
translation.zu: Manje isebenza njengesigcawu esiyinhloko edolobheni, futhi ihlala inezinto eziningi ezenzekayo, emini nasebusuku.

translation.en: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
translation.zu: Kunezitolo zokudlela eziningana ezizungeze ingadi, futhi emini nasentambama lapho amakhonsati wamahhala avame ukunikezwa kusuka etendeni eliyinhloko.

translation.en: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
translation.zu: I-Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Ovulanda ababili abahlukaniswe amasentimitha angu-69 kuphela ikhaya lenganekwana yakudala yothando.

translation.en: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
translation.zu: Ngemadlana ezinye izingane zizokuzekela indaba.

translation.en: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
translation.zu: ISiqhingi sase-Bowen uhambo losuku oluthandwayo noma uhambo lokungcebeleka lwempelasonto oluhlanganisa izikebhe ezigwedlwayo, ukuqwala izintaba, izitolo, izindawo zokudlela, kanye nokunye.

translation.en: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
translation.zu: Lo mphakathi wangempela use-Howe Sound ekuceleni nje kwe-Vancouver, futhi ungaya kuso kalula ngetikisi yasemanzini ehleliwe esuka esiQhingini saseGrandville phakathi edolobheni lase-Vancouver.

translation.en: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
translation.zu: Kulabo abajabulela imisebenzi yangaphandle, umzila oya emhubheni weSea to Sky ubalulekile.

translation.en: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
translation.zu: IWhistler (uhambo lwamahora angu-1.5 uma ushayela kusuka eVancouver) iyabiza kodwa iyaziwa kakhulu ngenxa yama-Olimpiki aseBusika ango-2010.

translation.en: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
translation.zu: Uma kusebusika, ungathokokozela ukushushuluza eqhweni eNyakatho Melika, futhi uma kusehlobo ungazama ukuzijabulisa ngokuqombola izintaba ngamabhayisikili kwangempela.

translation.en: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
translation.zu: Izimvume kumelwe zitholwe kusengaphambili. Kumelwe ube nemvume yokuhlala ubusuku bonke eSirena.

translation.en: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
translation.zu: ISirena yiso kuphela isiteshi sabanakekeli bamahlathi esinezindawo zokulala zamakamelo alala abantu abaningi nokudla okushisayo ngaphezu kokukanisa. ILa Leona, iSan Pedrillo, kanye neLos Patos zihlinzeka ngokukanisa kuphela ngaphandle kwezinkonzo zokudla.

translation.en: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
translation.zu: Kuyenzeka ukuthola izimvume zepaki ngokuqondile Esiteshi Somphathi Wendawo ePuerto Jiménez, kodwa abemukeli wonke amakhadi wokuthenga ngesikweletu

translation.en: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
translation.zu: I-The Park Service (MINAE) ayihlinzeki ngezimvume zokupaka uma kusasele isikhathi esingaphezu kwenyanga eyodwa ngaphambi kosuku ozofika ngalo.

translation.en: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
translation.zu: i-CafeNet El Sol inikezela ngamasevisi okubhuka ngemali engu- US$30, noma u- $10 ngokudlula kosuku olulodwa; imininingwane isekhasini labo le-Corcovado.

translation.en: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
translation.zu: Iziqhingi zoMpheki isiqhingi esiyizwe elizihlanganise ngokuzithandela neNyuzilandi, ezisePholinesiya, phakathi Nolwandlekazi iNingizimu Phasifiki.

translation.en: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
translation.zu: Yidlanzana leziqhingi elineziqhingi ezingu-15 ezisabalele endaweni eyizigidi ezingu-2.2 km2 zolwandle.

translation.en: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi sendawo esifana nesaseHawaii, iziqhingi ngezinye izikhathi zithathwa "njengeziseHawaii".

translation.en: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.
translation.zu: Noma iyincane, ikhumbuza izivakashi ezikhulile i-Hawaii ngaphambi kokumiswa njengombuso ngaphandle kwamahhotela amakhulu wezivakashi kanye nezinye izakhiwo.

translation.en: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
translation.zu: IziQhingi zaseCook azinawo noma imaphi amadolobha kodwa zenziwe yiziqhingi ezingu-15 ezihlukahlukene. Eziyinhloko iRarotong kanye ne-Aitutaki.

translation.en: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.
translation.zu: Emazweni aphucukile namuhla, ahlinzeka ngezindawo zokulala nokudla kwasekuseni kwenziwa kwaba indlela ethile yobuciko

translation.en: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.
translation.zu: Ezingeni eliphezulu, amaB&B ngokusobala ancintisana ngezinto ezimbili eziyinhloko: indawo yokulala nokudla kwasekuseni.

translation.en: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.
translation.zu: Ngakho-ke, ezindaweni ezihle kakhulu umuntu kufanele athole izinto zokulala zikanokusho, mhlawumbe ingube yokwendlala eyenziwe ngezandla noma umbhede wasendulo.

translation.en: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.
translation.zu: Ukudla kwasekuseni kungahlanganisa ukudla okumnandi kwasendaweni kwenkathi ethile yonyaka noma isidlo esikhethekile sombungazi.

translation.en: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
translation.zu: Indawo ingaba esakhiweni sakudala esingokomlando esinempahla yamandulo, izingadi ezilungiswe kahle kanye nechibi lokubhukuda.

translation.en: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
translation.zu: Ukungena emotweni yakho bese uya ohambweni olude kunokuthandeka okungokoqobo kanye nokuba lula kwakho.

translation.en: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
translation.zu: Ngokungafani nezimoto ezinkulu ngokuqinisekile usujwayelene nokushayela imoto yakho futhi uyakwazi ukulinganisela kwayo.

translation.en: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
translation.zu: Ukumisa itende endaweni enomnikazi noma edolobheni lanoma ibuphi ubukhulu kungabanga ukunakwa okungafunwa.

translation.en: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
translation.zu: Kafuphi, ukusebenzisa imoto yakho indlela ekahle kakhulu yokuthatha uhambo olude kodwa akuvamanga ukuthi kube yindlela “yokukanisa”.

translation.en: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
translation.zu: Ukukanisa emotweni kungenzeka lapho uneveni encane, i-SUV, iSedan noma iStation Wagon esinezihlalo ezikwazi ukulala.

translation.en: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
translation.zu: Amanye amahhotela anefa elisuka enkathini yokuchuma yezitimela nemikhumbi ehamba ngamalahle; ngaphambi kweMpi Yomhlaba Yesibili, ngekhulu lama-19 noma ekuqaleni kwelama-20 leminyaka.

translation.en: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
translation.zu: Lawa mahhotela bekuyilapho abacebile nabadumile bangaleyo nkathi ababehlala khona, futhi kaningi ayenokuhla okuphambili nezenzakalo zasebusuku.

translation.en: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
translation.zu: Izindlela zakudala zokugqoka, kanye nokwentuleka kwezakamuva futhi nendlela ethokozisayo abakhula ngayo iveza ububona.

translation.en: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
translation.zu: Nakuba zinabanikazi ngokuvamile, kwesinye isikhathi zihlalisa iziphathimandla nezinye izikhulu.

translation.en: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
translation.zu: Umhambi onemali eningi angacabangela uhambo lwendiza oluzungeza umhlaba wonke, olunqunywe ngokuhlala kwamaningi wamahotela lawa.

translation.en: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
translation.zu: I-hospitality exchange network inhlangano ehlanganisa izihambi nabantu bendawo emadolobheni eziyowavakashela.

translation.en: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
translation.zu: Ukujoyina inethiweki enjalo ngokuvamile kudinga nje ukugcwalisa ifomu eku-inthanethi; nakuba amanye amanethiweki anikeza noma adinga ukudinisekiswa.

translation.en: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
translation.zu: Uhlu lwababungazi abatholakalayolinikezwa ngokushicilelwa kanye/noma ku-inthanethi, kwesinye isikhathi nezinkomba kanye nokubuyekezwa kwabanye abahambi.

translation.en: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
translation.zu: I-couchsurfing yasungulwa ngoJanuwari 2004 ngemva kokuba umlobi wezinhlelo zokusebenza zekhompyutha uCasey Fenton athole indiza engabizi yokuya e-Iceland kodwa engenayo indawo yokuhlala.

translation.en: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
translation.zu: Wathumela abafundi benyuvesi yendawo ama-imeyili futhi wathola inani elimangalisayo labantu ababefuna ukumnika indawo yokuhlala mahhala.

translation.en: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
translation.zu: Amahostela ahlalisa abantu abasha ngokuyinhloko – isivakashi esivamile siseminyakeni yamashumi amabili – kodwa ungathola nezihambi ezindala kaningi.

translation.en: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
translation.zu: Imindeni enabantwana ayijwayelekile, kodwa amanye amahostela ayayivumela emakamelweni wangasese.

translation.en: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
translation.zu: Idolabha laseBeijing eShayina lizokwengamela Imidlalo yama-Olimpikhi Asebusika ngo-2022, nokuzoyenza idolabha lokuqala lokubungaza yomibili imidlalo yama-Olimpikhi yasebusika nasehlobo.

translation.en: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
translation.zu: I-Beijing izobungaza imicimbi yokuvula neyokuvala kanye nemidlalo yeqhwa yangaphakathi.

translation.en: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
translation.zu: Ezinye izehlakalo zokushushuluza eqhweni zizoba sendaweni yase-Taizicheng yokushushuluza eqhweni e-Zhangjiakou, cishe ama-220 km (140 amamayela) kusuka eBeijing.

translation.en: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
translation.zu: Iningi lamathempeli linawo umkhosi Waminyaka Yonke oqala ekupheleni kukaNovemba kuya Phakathi kukaMeyi, okuhluka kuya ngekhalenda laminyaka yonke lethempeli ngalinye.

translation.en: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
translation.zu: Iningi lemikhosi yethempeli ligujwa njengengxenye yesikhumbuzo sethempeli noma ukugujwa kosuku lokuzalwa likankulunkulu ophethe.

translation.en: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
translation.zu: Imikhosi yasethempelini laseKerala iyathakazelisa kakhulu ukuyibona, kanye nokumasha kwezindlovu ezihlotshisiwe, iqembu le-orchestra lethempeli neminye imikhosi.

translation.en: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
translation.zu: IWorld's Fair (ngokuvamile ebizwa World Exposition, noma kalula i-Expo) umkhosi omkhulu kunayo yonke wamazwe onke wobuciko nesayensi.

translation.en: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
translation.zu: Amazwe athathe ingxenye abemele amaciko kanye nemfundo ebonakaliswa ezindaweni zikazwelonke ukubonisa izinkinga zomhlaba wonke noma isiko lezwe labo kanye nomlando.

translation.en: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
translation.zu: Ama-International Horticultural Exposition ezenzakalo ezikhethekile ezikhangisa ngezimbali, izingadi zezimbali kanye nanoma yini ehlangene nezitshalo.

translation.en: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
translation.zu: Nakuba ngokubonwa ngokucabanga zingenzeka njalo ngonyaka (uma nje zisemazweni ahlukile), ngokoqobo akunjalo.

translation.en: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
translation.zu: Lezi zenzakalo ngokuvamile zithatha esikhathi esiphakathi kwezinyanga ezintathu kanye neziyisithupha, futhi zibanjelwa ezindaweni okungenani ezingamahektare angu-50

translation.en: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
translation.zu: Kunezinhlobo eziningi zamafilimu ebezisentshenziswa kule minyaka edlule. Evamile ifilimu ingu-35 mm (36 uphindaphiwe ka-24 mm) iwona abevamile.

translation.en: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile kugcwaliseka futhi kalula kakhulu uma uphelelwa, futhi inikeza okubukeka okulinganiselwa kulokho okukhona kwe-DSLR.

translation.en: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
translation.zu: Amanye amakhamera wamafilimi wohlobo oluphakathi asebenzisa ifomethi ye-6 ngo-6, ngokunembile kakhudlwana inegethivu ka-56 ngo-56 mm.

translation.en: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
translation.zu: Lokhu kunikeza ukubonakala cishe okuyizikhathi ezine kunenegethivu ka-35 mm (3136mm2 kuqhathaniswa ne-864) .

translation.en: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
translation.zu: Izilwane zasendle umhlobiso wezithombe olukhuni kakhulu kwabathatha izithombe, futhi udinga inhlanganisela yenhlanhla, isineke, ulwazi kanye namathuluzi akahle.

translation.en: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
translation.zu: Ukuthatha izithombe kwezilwane zasendle kaningi kuthathwa kalula, kodwa njengokuthatha izithombe okuvamile, isithombe sisho okuningi kakhulu.

translation.en: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
translation.zu: Ukuthatha amafotho wasendle ngokuvamile kudinga ilensi yamafotho ende, nakuba izinto ezinjengomhlambi wezinyoni noma izidalwa ezincane zidinga amanye amalensi.

translation.en: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
translation.zu: Izilwane eziningi ezingavamile kunzima ukuzithola, futhi amapaki ngezinye izikhathi anemithetho emayelana nokuthatha izithombe ngenjongo yokuhweba ngazo.

translation.en: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
translation.zu: Izilwane zasendle zingaba namahloni noma zibe nolaka. Indawo ingabanda, ishise, noma ibe yimbi ngenye indlela.

translation.en: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
translation.zu: Umhlaba unezilimi ezihlukene ezingaphezu kuka-5,000, kuhlanganise nezingaphezu kwamashumi amabili ezinezikhulumi eziyizigidi ezingu-50 noma ngaphezulu.

translation.en: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
translation.zu: Kaningi kulula ukuqonda amazwi abhaliwe kunakhulunywayo, futhi. Lokhu kuyiqiniso ngokukhethekile ngamakheli, lawo kaningi okunzima ukuwaphimisela kahle.

translation.en: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
translation.zu: Izizwe eziningi eziphelele zisikhuluma kahle isiNgisi, futhi nakwezinye ezengeziwe ungalindela ulwazi olulinganiselwe - ikakhulukazi phakathi kwabantu abasha.

translation.en: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
translation.zu: Cabanga, uma ungakwazi, umuntu wase-Muncunia, e-Boston, e-Jamaica kanye nowase-Sydney behlezi etafuleni bedla idina esitolo sokudlela sase-Toronto.

translation.en: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
translation.zu: Bebezixoxela bebodwa ngezindaba ezivela emadolobheni akubo, baxoxelwa ngolimi lwesigodi sakubo kanye nangendlela yokukhuluma yangakubo.

translation.en: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
translation.zu: Ukuthenga ukudla ezitolo ezinkulu ngokuvamile kuyindlela engabizi kunazo zonke yokondleka. Ngaphandle kwamathuba okupheka, ongakukhetha nokho kulinganiselwe ekudleni okulungele udliwa.

translation.en: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
translation.zu: Izitolo ezinkulu ngokwandayo zithola ingxenye ehlukahlukene kakhulu yokudla okulungele ukudliwa. Ezinye zinikeza ngisho nangohhavini we-microwave noma enye indlela yokufudumeza ukudla.

translation.en: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
translation.zu: Kwamanye amazwe noma izinhlobo zezitolo kunendawo yokudlela eyodwa, ngokuvamile engekho emthethweni enamanani akahle.

translation.en: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
translation.zu: Enza futhi uphathe amakhophi epholisi yakho kanye neminingwane yenkampani yakho yomshwalensi.

translation.en: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
translation.zu: Badinga ukuveza ikheli le-imeyili lomuntu onikeza ngomshwalense kanye nezinombolo zocingo zakwamanye amazwe zesiluleko/ukunikeza imvume nokufaka izicelo.

translation.en: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
translation.zu: Gcina enye ikhophi emthwalweni wakho naku-inthanethi (zithumelele yona ku-imeyili, noma uligcinwe ku-"cloud").

translation.en: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
translation.zu: Uma usohambweni uhamba ne-laptop noma uthebhulethi, faka ikhophi yayo kuyo noma kuyidiski (iyatholakala ngisho noma ungenayo i-inthanethi).

translation.en: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
translation.zu: Futhi nikeza amakhophi epolisi/isivumelwano kohambisana nabo kanye nezihlobo noma abangane emuva ekhaya abafuna ukusiza.

translation.en: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
translation.zu: Izinyamazane ezinkulu zaseMelika (ngezinye izikhathi ezibizwa ngama-elk) azithandi udlame, kodwa zizozivikela lapho zibona ingozi.

translation.en: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
translation.zu: Uma abantu bangaboni inyamazane enkulu yaseMelika njengeyingozi, bangasondela kakhulu futhi bazifake engozini.

translation.en: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
translation.zu: Phuza iziphuzo ezidakayo ngokulinganisela. Iziphuzo ezidakayo zithinta wonke umuntu ngokuhlukile, futhi ukwazi umkhawulo wakho kubaluleke kakhulu.

translation.en: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
translation.zu: Izinto ezithinta impilo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngenxa yokuphuza ngokweqisa zingahlanganisa ukulimala kwesibindi kanye nobumpumputhe nokufa. Ingozi engaba khona iyakhula lapho umuntu ephuza utshwala obungenziwanga ngokomthetho.

translation.en: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
translation.zu: Izipiliti ezingekho emthethweni zinezinto ezingacwengekanga ezihlukahlukene ezihlanganisa i-methanol, engabangela ubumpumputhe noma ukufa ngisho noma kuthathwe encane.

translation.en: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
translation.zu: Izibuko zamehlo zingabiza kancane kwelinye izwe, ikakhulukazi emazweni aholela imali encane lapho izindleko zokusebenza ziphansi.

translation.en: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
translation.zu: Cabangela ukuhlola amehlo ekhaya, ikakhulukazi uma umshwalense ukhokhelela izindleko, kanye noletha amaphepha aloba imithi ukuba agcinwe kwenye indawo.

translation.en: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
translation.zu: Amafulemu aseqophelweni eliphezulu wamagama abizayo atholakala kulezi zindawo angaba nezinkinga ezimbili; amanye kungaba omgunyathi, futhi angempela avela kwamanye amazwe angabiza kakhulu kunasekhaya.

translation.en: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
translation.zu: Ikhofi lingomunye wemikhiqizo yomhlaba okuhwetshwa ngawo kakhulu, futhi cishe ungathola izinhlobo eziningi endaweni yangakini.

translation.en: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
translation.zu: Nokho, ziningi izindlela ezihlukile zokuphuza ikofi emhlabeni jikelele okufanele zizanywe.

translation.en: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
translation.zu: I-canyoning (noma: canyoneering) kumayelana nokuya ezansi kwezigodi ezijulile, okungezeka ukuthi zomile noma zigcwele amanzi.

translation.en: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
translation.zu: Ukuhamba ezindongeni ezinkulu ezibangelwe umfula kuhlanganisa izici zokubhukuda, ukugibela kanye nokweqa-- kodwa kudinga ukuziqeqesha okuncane kakhulu noma isimo somziba ukuze uqale (uma kuqhathaniswa nokugibela amadwala amakhulu, i-scuba diving noma i-alpine skiing, ngokwesibonelo).

translation.en: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
translation.zu: Ukuhamba ezintabeni umsebenzi wangaphandle ohlanganisa ukuhamba ezindaweni ezingokwemvelo, kaningi emizileni yokuhamba.

translation.en: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
translation.zu: Ukuhamba emini kuhlanganisa amabanga angaphansi kwemayela kuze kube semabangeni angahlanganiswa ngosuku olulodwa.

translation.en: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
translation.zu: Ukuhamba emini emzileni olula kudinga ukuzilungiselela okuncane, futhi noma imuphi umuntu ophile kahle ngokomzimba angakujabulela.

translation.en: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
translation.zu: Imindeni enezingane ezincane ingadinga ukulingiselela okwengeziwe, kodwa usuku ngaphandle lungenzeka kalula ngisho nangabantwana abancane kanye nezingane ezingakayi esikoleni.

translation.en: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
translation.zu: Emazweni wonke, kunezinhlangano zokuvakasha ezisebenzayo ezicishe zibe ngu-200. Eziningi zazo zizimele.

translation.en: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
translation.zu: I-Go Running Tours eyalandela i-Global Running Tours iqondisa izinkampani zezingosi emazwekazini amane.

translation.en: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
translation.zu: Nemvelaphi yayo Ohambweni Lokugijima lwase-Barcelona Ukugijima kwase-Barcelona ne-Copenhagen, yajoyinwa ngokushesha uHambo Lokugijima lwase-Prague olunesikhungo e-Prague kanye nezinye.

translation.en: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
translation.zu: Kunezinto eziningi okumelwe uzicabangele ngaphambi nalapho uthatha uhambo oluya kwenye indawo.
