translation.en: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
translation.zu: Uma uthatha uhambo, lindela izinto ukuba zingafani “nasekhaya”. Imikhuba, imithetho, ukudla, ukuminyana kwezimoto, izimiso, ulimi njalonjalo kuzohluka ngandlelathile nalapho uhlala khona.

translation.en: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
translation.zu: Lokhu okuthile okumelwe uhlale ukukhumbula, ukugwema ukudumazeka ngisho nokungathandi izindlela zendawo zokwenza izinto.

translation.en: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
translation.zu: Izinhlangano zokuhamba bezilokhu zikhona kusukela ngekhulu le-19. Umenzeli wokuhamba ngokuvamile ukhetho oluhle lohambo oludlulela ngaphezu kolwazi lwesihambi lwangaphambili lwendalo, isiko, ulimi noma amazwe aholela imali ephansi.

translation.en: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
translation.zu: Nakuba ezinye izinkampani zizimisele ukwenza ukubhukha okuningi okuvamile, izinkampani eziningi zingochwepheshe ohlotshweni oluthize lohambo, ubukhulu bamanani noma izindawo.

translation.en: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
translation.zu: Kungaba lula ukusebenzisa ummeli ovame ukubhukha uhambo olufana nolwakho.

translation.en: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
translation.zu: Buka ukuthi inkampani ikhangisa ngaluphi uhambo, kungaba kuyiwebhusayithi noma efasiteleni lesitolo.

translation.en: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
translation.zu: Uma ufuna ukubona umhlaba ngendlela engabizi, ngoba kunesidingo, indlela yokuphila noma inselele, kunezinye izindlela zokwenza lokho.

translation.en: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
translation.zu: Ngokuyisisekelo, baye bawela ezigabeni ezimbili: okungenzeka ukusebenza phakathi nohambo noma ukuzama ukulinganisela izindleko zakho. Lesi sihloko sigxile kulokho okwenzeka ekugcineni.

translation.en: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
translation.zu: Kulabo abazimisele ukudela ukunethezeka, isikhathi kanye nokubikezeleka ukunciphisaizindleko baze bacishe bengakhokhi lutho babona izindawo ezikhokhelwa imali encane.

translation.en: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
translation.zu: Iseluleko sicabangela ukuthi izihambi azebi, azingeni ezindaweni ngaphandle kwemvume, azihwebi ngokungemthetho, azincengi, noma ziqole abantu ngenye indlela ukuze zizizuzise.

translation.en: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
translation.zu: Indawo yokuhlola abavela kwamanye amazwe ngokuvamile iyindawo yokuma yokuqala lapho wehla endizeni, emkhumbini, noma kwenye inqola.

translation.en: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izitimela eziya emazweni angomakhelwane ukuhlolwa kwenziwa esitimeleni esihambayo futhi kumelwe uphathe nomazisi ongokomthetho uma ugibela esinye salezo zitimela.

translation.en: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
translation.zu: Kulezi zitimela okulalwa kuzo, iphasiphothi ingathathwa ukhondakta ukwenzela ukuthi ungaphazamiseki uma sewulele.

translation.en: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
translation.zu: Ukubhalisa imfuneko eyengeziwe enqubweni ye-visa. Kwamanye amazwe, kumelwe ubhalise ukuba khona kwakho nekheli lalapho uhlala khona neziphathimandla zendawo.

translation.en: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
translation.zu: Lokhu kungadinga ukugcwalisa ifomu namaphoyisa endawo noma ukuvakashela ihhovisi labaphuma kwamanye amazwe.

translation.en: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
translation.zu: Emazweni amaningi anomthetho onjalo, amahhotela wasendaweni yiwona azobhalisa (qinisekisa ukuthi uyabuza).

translation.en: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izimo, yilabo kuphela abahlala ngaphandle kwezindlu zezivakashi okudingeka ukuthi babhalise. Kodwa-ke, lokhu kwenza umthetho uthi ukuqina, ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi usheshe wazi.

translation.en: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
translation.zu: Ezokwakha zigxile ekuklameni nasekwakheni izakhiwo. Ukuklanywa nokwakheka kwendawo ngokuvamile kudonsa izivakashi ngokwakho.

translation.en: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translation.zu: Izakhiwo eziningi zinhle kakhulu ukuzibuka futhi nokubuka indawo usesakhiweni eside noma efasiteleni elibekwe ngobuhlakani kungaba into enhle ukuyibuka.

translation.en: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translation.zu: Ukwakhiwa kwezindlu buhlangana kakhudlwana nezinye izinkundla kuhlanganise nokuhlelwa kwamadolobha, ubunjiniyela bokuklama izakhiwo zomphakathi, ubuciko bokuhlobisa, ukuhlobisa ingaphakathi lezindlu kanye nokuhlobisa amagceke.

translation.en: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translation.zu: Ngendlela imizi yomdabu yaseMelika ikude ngayo, angeke ukwazi ukuthola okwenzekayo ebusuku ngaphandle kokuya e-Albuquerque noma eSanta Fe.

translation.en: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, cishe zonke izindawo zokugembula ezibhalwe phezulu zidayisa iziphuzo, kanti eziningana kuzo zihlinzeka ezokuzijabulisa zohlobo oluthile (ngokuvamile ezinkulu kuzo ezakhelene ne-Albuquerque kanye ne-Santa Fe).

translation.en: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translation.zu: Qaphela: izindawo zokuthiba ukoma zedolobha ezincanezalapha azihlali ziyizindawo ezilungele zivakashi ezivela ngaphandle kwesifundazwe ukuthi zingazipholela kuzo.

translation.en: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translation.zu: Esinye isizathu ukuthi, i-New Mexico esenyakatho inezinkinga ezinkulu ngabashayeli abadakiwe, futhi iningi labashayeli abadakiwe litholakala eduze nezinkantini zamadolobhana.

translation.en: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translation.zu: Imifanekiso noma imibhalo engafuneki ibizwa nge-graffiti.

translation.en: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translation.zu: Nakuba kungesona isimangaliso sanamuhla, abantu abaningi cishe bakuhlobanisa nentsha ecekela phansi izakhiwo zomphakathi nezabantu ngopende ofuthwayo.

translation.en: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translation.zu: Nokho, kulezi zinsuku kunezingcweti ze-graffiti ezizimele, izenzakalo ze-graffiti kanye nezindonga "ezingokomthetho". Imidwebo ye-graffiti kulomongo kaningi ifana nomsebenzi wobuciko kunemidwebo engekho emthethweni.

translation.en: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translation.zu: Ukuphonsa i-boomerang ikhono elithandwayo lelo izivakashi eziningi ezifuna ukuba nalo.

translation.en: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translation.zu: Uma ufuna ukufunda ukuphonsa ibhumerangi ebuyela esandleni sakho, qinisekisa ukuthi unebhumerangi efanelekela ukubuya.

translation.en: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translation.zu: Ama-boomerang amaningi atholakala e-Australia empeleni akuwona abuyayo. Kungcono kwabasaqala ukuthi bangazami ukuphonsa emoyeni

translation.en: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translation.zu: ISidlo seHangi siphekelwa emgodini oshisayo.

translation.en: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translation.zu: Umgodi ushiswa ngamatshe ashisayo avela emlilweni, noma kwezinye izindawo ukushisa okuvela ngaphansi komhlaba kwenze izingxenye zenhlabathi zishise ngokwemvelo.

translation.en: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translation.zu: I-hangi kaningi isetshenziselwa ukupheka ukudla kwakusihla okuthosiwe okungokwesiko.

translation.en: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translation.zu: Izindawo ezimbalwa e-Rotorua zinikela ngokudla okuphekwe ngokushisa komhlaba, kanti okunye ukudla okunjalo kuyenziwa e-Christchurch, e-Wellington nakwezinye izindawo.

translation.en: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translation.zu: IMetroRail inezigaba ezimbili zezitimela zabagibeli eKapa kanye nasezindaweni ezizungezile: iMetroPlus (ebuye ibizwe ngokuthi Isigaba Esiphezulu) kanye neMetro (ebizwa ngeSigaba Sesithathu).

translation.en: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translation.zu: IMetroPlus inethezeke kakhudlwana futhi ayigcwali abantu kodwa ibiza kakhudlwana, nakuba ishibhe kunamathikithi esitimela avamile eYurophu.

translation.en: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translation.zu: Zonke izitimela ziba nakho kokubili i-MetroPlus kanye nezinqola ze-Metro; izinqola ze-MetroPlus zihlale njalo zisekugcineni kwesitimela eduze kweDolobha lase-Kappa.

translation.en: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translation.zu: Ukunakekela abanye – Ungalokothi ususe amehlo ezikhwameni zakho, ikakhulukazi lapho weqa imingcwele yamanye amazwe.

translation.en: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translation.zu: Ungazithola usetshenziswa njengomuntu othwala izidakamizwa ngaphandle kolwazi lwakho, okuzokufaka enkingeni enkulu.

translation.en: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukuma eheleni, njengoba izinja ezithungatha izidakamizwa zingasetshenziswa nganoma isiphi isikhathi ngaphandle kwesaziso.

translation.en: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translation.zu: Amanye amazwe anezindlela zokujezisa ezinonya kakhulu ngisho nakubantu abaqalayo ukuphula umthetho; lezi zingahlanganisa izigwebo zasejele zeminyaka engaphezu kuka-10 noma ukufa.

translation.en: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translation.zu: Izikhwama ezinganakwanga zitshontshwa kalula futhi zingadonsa ukunaka kweziphathimandla eziqaphele ukusongelwa ngamabhomu.

translation.en: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translation.zu: Ekhaya, ngenxa yalokhu kuvezwa njalo kwamagciwane endawo, amathuba asephezulu kakhulu okuthi kungenzeka nawe usugomekile kuwo.

translation.en: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translation.zu: Kodwa kwezinye izingxenye zomhlaba, lapho amagciwane e-fauna emasha kuwe, maningi amathuba okuthi ube nenkinga.

translation.en: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translation.zu: Futhi, ezindaweni ezifudumele amabhakithiliya kokubili akhula ngokushesha kakhudwlana futhi aphila isikhathi eside kakhudlwana ngaphandle komzimba.

translation.en: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translation.zu: Ngakho izishayo zaseDelhi Belly, i-Pharaoh's Curse, iMontezuma's Revenge, kanye nabangane babo abaningi.

translation.en: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translation.zu: Njengezinkinga zokuphefumula ezindaweni ezinesimo sezulu ezibandayo, izinkinga zesisu ezindaweni ezinesimo sezulu esishisayo zivamile futhi ezimweni eziningi ziyacika ngokukhethekile kodwa aziyona ingozi empeleni.

translation.en: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translation.zu: Uma uthatha uhambo oluya ezweni elisathuthuka okokuqala – noma engxenyeni entsha yomhlaba – ungadeleli ukushaqeka ngenxa yesiko okungaba khona.

translation.en: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translation.zu: Izihambi eziningi ezizinzile, ezinamandla zikhungathekiswe ubusha bohambo lomhlabo oluthuthukayo, lapho ukushintsha okuncane okuningi kwesiko kungahlangana ngokushesha.

translation.en: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translation.zu: Ikakhulukazi ezinsukwini zakho zokuqala, cabangela ikuchitha imali eningi ezindleleni zaseNtshonalanga zokwenza izinto kanye namahhotela ezinga eliphezulu, ukudla, kanye nezinkonzo ukukusiza ujwayele.

translation.en: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translation.zu: Ungalali kumatilasi noma endwangwini entofontofo phansi ezindaweni ongazi kuzo izilwane zendawo.

translation.en: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translation.zu: Uma uzoya ukuyokhempa ngaphandle, woza ne-camp cot noma ne-hammock ukuze uzivikele ezinyokeni, ofezela nokunye okucishe kufane.

translation.en: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translation.zu: Gcwalisa ikhaya lakho ngekhofi elinothile ekuseni kanye netiye le-chamomile elenza uphumule ebusuku.

translation.en: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translation.zu: Uma uthatha iholide usekhaya lakho, unesikhathi sokuzijabulisa nesokuthatha imizuzu embalwa yokwenza okuthile okubalulekile.

translation.en: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translation.zu: Uma uzizwa ufisa ukwenza izigigaba, thatha ithuba lokwenza ijusi noma uhlanganise izithelo ezihlukahlukene ukuze kube yisiphuzo:

translation.en: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translation.zu: mhlawumbe uzothola isiphuzo esilula ongasenza sokudla kwasekuseni uma ubuyela esimisweni sakho sansuku zonke.

translation.en: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translation.zu: Uma uhlala edolobheni elinesiko lokuphuza elihlukile, yana ezinkantinini noma izindlini zokuphuzela emiphakathini ongavamisanga ukuya kuyo.

translation.en: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translation.zu: Kulabo abangajwayele amagama asetshenziswa kwezokwelapha, amagama athi ukuthelelana kanye nokuthathelana anezinzazelo ezikhukile.

translation.en: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translation.zu: Isifo esithelelanayo sibangelwa amabhakithiliya adala izifo, njengegciwane, ibhakithiliya, isikhunta noma ezinye izilwane eziphila ngezinye.

translation.en: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translation.zu: Isifo esithathelanwayo isifo esidluliseka kalula ngokuba seduze nomuntu onalesosifo.

translation.en: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translation.zu: Ohulumeni abaningi bafuna izivakashi ezingenayo, noma abahlali abahambayo, emazweni abo ukuba bagonyelwe izinhlobonhlobo zezifo.

translation.en: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translation.zu: Lezimfuneko kaningi zingaxhomeka emazweni isihambi esiwavakashele noma esihlele ukuwavakashela.

translation.en: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translation.zu: Enye yezindawo ezinamandla zeCharlotte, eNyakatho Carolina, ukuthi inezinto eziningi ezisezingeni eliphezulu imindeni engakhetha kuzo.

translation.en: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translation.zu: Abahlali abavela kwezinye izindawo bavame ukukhuluma ngezinto ezifanele umndeni njengesizathu esiyinhloko sokuthuthela lapho, futhi izivakashi kaningi zithola kulula ukujabulela idolobha nezingane.

translation.en: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translation.zu: Eminyakeni engu-20 edlule, inani lezinto eziphephile ezinganeni Phakathi Edolobheni lase-Charlotte lande kakhulu.

translation.en: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translation.zu: Amatekisi awavamisanga ukusetshenziswa imindeni eCharlotte, ngisho noma engaba usizo kwezinye izimo.

translation.en: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translation.zu: Kunenhlawuliso engaphezulu yokuba nabagibeli abangaphezu kuka-2, ngakho lokhu ongakukhetha kungaba okubiza kakhulu kunalokho okudingekayo.

translation.en: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translation.zu: I-Antarctica indawo ebanda kunazo zonke eMhlabeni, futhi izungeze iSouth Pole.

translation.en: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translation.zu: Ukuvakasha kwezivakashi kuyabiza, kudinga ukuphila kahle ngokomzimba, kungenzeka kuphela ngehlobo ngoNovemba kuya kuFebhruwari, futhi kulinganiselwe kakhulu ngokomthetho eNhlonhlweni, Eziqhingini kanye nasoLwandle iRoss.

translation.en: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translation.zu: Izinkulungwane ezimbalwa zezisebenzi zihlala lapha ehlobo ezikhungweni ezingaba amadazini amane kaningi kulezo zindawo; inani elincane lihlala ebusika.

translation.en: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translation.zu: Phakathi nezwe le-Antarctica inkangala engahlali muntu embozwe u-2-3 km weqhwa.

translation.en: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izikhathi ukuvakasha kwasemoyeni kochwephesha kuya phakathi nezwe, ukugibela izintaba noma ukufinyelela kuyiPole, enesiqu esikhulu.

translation.en: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translation.zu: ISouth Pole Traverse (noma iHighway) umzila ongama-1600 kma kusuka eMcMurdo Station oLwandle lweRosa kuyiPole.

translation.en: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translation.zu: Kuyiqhwa elihlangene eligcwele imisele ebekiswe ngamafulegi. Ungahamba kulo kuphela ngogandaganda abakhandelwe lokho, izinqola zokuhamba eqhweni ezinamafutha kanye nezinye izinto ezisetshenziswayo.

translation.en: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translation.zu: Lezi azilula kakhulu ngakho umzila kumelwe uphambukele kude uzungeze iziNtaba zeTransantarctic ukungena enkangaleni.

translation.en: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translation.zu: Into eyimbangela evamile yezingozi ebusika imigwaqo eshelelayo, imigwaqo egandayiwe (izindawo zokuhamba) futhi ikakhulukazi izitebhisi.

translation.en: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translation.zu: Ngokwesilinganiso, udinga izicathulo ezinesithende ezifanelekile. Izicathulo zasehlobo ngokuvamile ziyashelela eqhweni kanye nasesithwathweni, ngisho nezinye izicathulo zasebusika azifaneleki.

translation.en: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translation.zu: Isifanekiso kumelwe sijule ngokwanele, u-5 mm (1/5 yintshi) noma ngaphezulu, futhi indwangu kumelwe ithambe ngokwanele emazingeni okushisa abandayo.

translation.en: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translation.zu: Amanye amabhuzu anezinto ezicijile futhi kezinto ezicijile ezifakwayo zezimo ezishelelayo, ezifaneleke izicathulo namabhuzu, ezezithende noma izithende namasoli.

translation.en: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translation.zu: Izithende kumelwe zibe ezansi futhi zibe banzi. Isihlabathi, inhlabathi enamatshana noma usawoti (i-calcium chloride) kuvame ukusakazeka ezindleleni noma emizileni ukuthuthukisa amandla okubamba.

translation.en: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translation.zu: Izikhukhula zeqhwa aziyona into engavamile; izindawo ezehlelayo zingabamba iqhwa elanele nje, futhi elengeziwe lizokwehla njengesikhukhula seqhwa.

translation.en: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translation.zu: Inkinga ukuthi iqhwa liyanamathela, ngakho-ke lidinga ukuthi ukuthintithwa ukuze lehle, kanti neqhwa elithile elehlayo lingabangela ukuthi lonke elinye lehle.

translation.en: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izikhathi isenzakalo sangempela esishukumisayo ilanga elifudumeza iqhwa, kwesinye isikhathi ukuwa kweqhwa elengeziwe, kwesinye isikhathi ezinye izenzakalo ezingokwemvelo, kaningi umuntu.

translation.en: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translation.zu: Isivunguvungu insika yokucindezela komoya okungenamandla, emunyela umoya oseduze phakathi kanye naphezulu.

translation.en: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translation.zu: Zingenza imimoya ephakeme (ngokuvamile amamayeli angu-100-200/ihora) futhi zingaphakamisa izinto ezisindayo emoyeni, zizithwale njengoba isivunguvungu sihamba.

translation.en: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translation.zu: Ziqala njengamafanela ayehlayo emafwini wesiphepho, bese ziba “izivunguvungu” lapho zifika phansi.

translation.en: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translation.zu: Izinkampani ze-VPN Yomuntu Siqu (inethiweki yomuntu siqu ebonakala ingokoqobo) ziyindlela ekahle kakhulu yokugwema ukuhlola okungokwepolotiki kanye zihlungi zendawo ze-IP.

translation.en: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translation.zu: Baphambili kuma proxies eweb ngenxa yezizathu eziningana: Benza umzila wonke wokuthengisa i-Inthanethi, hhayi i-http kuphela.

translation.en: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translation.zu: Bajwayele ukunikeza izinga eliphezulu bobungakho bokudlulisa futhi nezinga eliphezulu losizo. Bafihle ukwaziswa ngakho kunzima ukwazi ukuthi baphezu kwani.

translation.en: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translation.zu: Izinkampani zezezindaba kaningi ziqamba amanga ngenjongo yalokhu, zithi kungenxa "yokuvimbela ukuba imfihlo".

translation.en: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translation.zu: Empeleni, amakhodi wendawo awasebenzi nakancane ekukopeni okungekho emthethweni; ukukopa kwe-bit nge-bit kwediski kuzoyenza idlale kahle kunoma iyiphi idivayisi lapho idiski yangempela ingadlala khona.

translation.en: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translation.zu: Injongo yangempela ukwenza lezo zinkampani zilawule kakhudlwana izimakethe zazo; konke kumayelana nokwenza inzuzo.

translation.en: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokuthi izingcingo zixhunywa nge-Inthanethi, akumelwe usebenzise ifoni yenkampani esendaweni ohlala kuyo noma oyivakashele.

translation.en: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translation.zu: Futhi azikho izimfuneko ozitholayo ngenani emphakathini ohlala kuwo; ungathola ukuxhuma ngesethelithi ku-inthanethi eziNkukhwini zasendle, e-Alska bese ukhetha inani elibonisa ukuthi usekushiseni e-Arizona.

translation.en: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translation.zu: Kaningi, kufanele uthenge inombolo esebenza emhlabeni jikelele ngokuhlukile evumela amafoni we-PSTN ukuba akushayele. Lapho inombolo isuka khona kwenza umehluko kubantu abakushayelayo.

translation.en: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translation.zu: Ama-app wokuhumusha we-Real-time – izinhlelo ezikwazi ukuhumusha ngokuzenzakalelayo zonke izingxenye zombhalo kusuka olimini olulodwa kuya kolunye.

translation.en: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translation.zu: Ezinye izinhlelo kulengxenye zingaphinde zihumushe imibhalo ezilimini ezihlukahlukene kanye nakolwezandla noma ezinye izinto emhlabeni wangempela lapho oyisebenzisayo ekhomba umakhalekhukhwini wesimanje kulezo zinto.

translation.en: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translation.zu: Izinhlelo zekhompyutha zokuhumusha zithuthuke kakhulu, futhi manje zinikeza ukuhumusha okucishe kunembe (futhi okungavamisile ukuba ubhedo ongachazeki), kodwa kudingeka ukunaka okuthile, njengoba zingenza okunganembile ngokuphelele.

translation.en: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translation.zu: Olunye lwezinhlelo zokusebenza ezihamba phambili kulesi sigaba yi-Guguli Humusha, evumela ukuhumusha ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi ngemva kokudawuniloda idatha yolimi olufunwayo.

translation.en: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translation.zu: Ukusebenzisa ama-app wokuqondisa we-GPS kuyi-smartphone sakho kungaba yindlela elula kakhulu newusizo kakhulu yokuthungatha indlela lapho ungekho ezweni lakini.

translation.en: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translation.zu: Ingonga imali kunokuthenga amabalazwe we-GPS amasha, noma i-GPS ezimele noma ukuqasha enye enkampanini yokuqashisa izimoto.

translation.en: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translation.zu: Uma ungenalo uxhumano lwedatha kuyifoni yakho, noma uma ingasebenzi endaweni okuyo, ukusebenza kwazo kungalinganiselwa noma kungabi khona.

translation.en: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translation.zu: Noma iziphi izitolo ezincane zigcwele ngezinhlobonhlobo ezididayo zamakhadi wefoni akhokhelwa kusengaphambili lawo angasetshenziswa ezingcingweni zomphakathi noma ocingweni oluvamile.

translation.en: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translation.zu: Yize amanye amakhadi ekulungele ukufonela noma ikuphi, kodwa amanye enzelwe ukunikeza amanani aphansi wokufona emaqenjini athile wamazwe.

translation.en: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translation.zu: Ukufinyelela kulamasevisikuvame ukutholakala ezinombolweni zocingo zamahhalaezingafonelwa ezingcingweni eziningi ngaphandle koku khokhela.

translation.en: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translation.zu: Imithetho esebenza ekuthwebuleni isithombe esivamile iyasebenza nesekuqopheni ividiyo, cishe nangokwengeziwe.

translation.en: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translation.zu: Uma ukuthatha ifotho yokuthile nje kungavunyelwe, akufanele ucabange ngisho nangokurekhoda ividiyo yakho.

translation.en: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translation.zu: Uma wenza umsindo obeleselayo, hlola kusengaphambili ukuthi ikuphi ovunyelwe ukukuthwebula nokuthi yiziphi izimvume noma amalayisensi engeziwe edingekayo.

translation.en: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translation.zu: Ukundizisa izindiza eziqondiswa nge-remote eduze kwesikhumulo sezindiza noma phakathi kwabantu abaningi akuwona umqondo omuhle, ngisho noma kungekho emthwethweni lokho endaweni yangakini.

translation.en: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translation.zu: Esikhathini samanje ukuhamba ngendiza akuvile ukubhukhiwa ngokuqondile nenkampani yezindiza ngaphandle kokusesha nokuqhathanisa amanani.

translation.en: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translation.zu: Kwesinye isikhathi indiza efanayo ingaba namanani ahluke kakhulu ezintweni ezihlukile ezihlanganisayo futhi kuyazuzisa ukuqhathanisa imiphumela yokusesha kanye nokubuka iwebhusayithi yenkampani yezindiza ngokwayo ngaphambi kokubhukha.

translation.en: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translation.zu: Nakuba ungena kudinga i-visa ukuthatha uhambo olufishane lokuya emazweni athile njengesivakashi noma ngenxa yebhizinisi, ukuya lapho njengomfundi wakwelinye izwekudingeka uhlale isikhathi eside kunomuntu nje ovakashe isikhashana.

translation.en: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile, ukuhlala kwelinye izwe isikhathi eside kuzodinga ukuthi uthole ivisa kusengaphambili.

translation.en: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translation.zu: Amavisa wabafundi afuna izinto ezihlukahlukene nezindlela zokufaka isicelo ezivakashini ezivamile noma amavisa webhizinisi.

translation.en: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translation.zu: Emazweni amaningi, uzodinga incwadi yalokho enivumelene ngakho engxoxweni yenu nesikhungweni ofisa ukufunda kuso, kanye nobufakazi bemali yokuziphilisa okungenani unyaka wokuqala wesifundo sakho.

translation.en: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translation.zu: Hlola nesikhungo, kanye nomnyango wabafuduki wezwe ongathanda ukufundela kulo ukuze uthole imininingwane eminingi.

translation.en: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translation.zu: Ngaphandle kokuba ungusomaqhinga wezindaba zamazwe, ukusebenza phesheya ngokuvamile kusho ukuthi kuzodingeka ukhokhe intela ezweni okulona.

translation.en: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translation.zu: Intela yomholo ihlelwe ngendlela ehlukile emazweni ahlukene, futhi namanani nezingxenye ezehlukile zentelaziyehlukahlukakusuka kwelinye izwe kuya kwelinye.

translation.en: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translation.zu: Kwamanye amazwe kahulumeni, afana neMelika ne-Canada, kuqoqwa intela kokubili ezingeni likahulumeni nasezingeni lendawo, ngakho amanani namabhulekethi kungahluka endaweni ngendawo.

translation.en: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translation.zu: Nakuba ukuhlolwa kwabantu abathuthela kwelinye izwe kungenziwa uma ufika ezweni lakho, ukudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona izincwadi kusenzima.

translation.en: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translation.zu: Qinisekisa ukuthi uyazi ukuthi yini ongeza nayo nongenakuza nayo futhi ubike noma yini kwabomthetho.

translation.en: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translation.zu: Indlela elula kakhulu yokuqalisa ebhizinisini lokubhala ngohambo ukuthuthukisa amakhono wakho kuyibhulogi yewebhusayithi yokuhamba emisiwe.

translation.en: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translation.zu: Uma ukhululeka ngokususa nokwenezela izinto kuyiwebhu, kamuva, ungenza eyakho iwebhusayithi.

translation.en: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translation.zu: Ukuvolontiya njengoba uthatha uhambo indlela ekahle yokwenza umehluko kodwa akuphathelananga nokunikela nje.

translation.en: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translation.zu: Ukuhlala nokuvolontiya kwelinye izwe indlela ekahle yokwazi isiko elihlukile, ukuhlangana nabantu abasha, ukufunda ngawe, ukuthola eminye imibono ngisho nokuthola amakhono amasha.

translation.en: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translation.zu: Kungabuye kube indlela ekahle yokusebenzisa kahle imali ukukuvumela ukuba uhlale isikhathi eside kakhudlwana kwenye indawo njengoba imisebenzi eminingi yokuvolontiya ihlinzeka indawo yokuhlala nokudla futhi embalwa iholela iholo.

translation.en: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translation.zu: Ama-viking asebenzisa imisele yaseRashiya ukuya oLwandle Olumnyama noLwandle i-Caspian. Ezinye zalezi zindlela zisengasetshenziswa. Hlola uma kudingeka izimvume ezikhethekile, okungaba nzima ukuzithola.

translation.en: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translation.zu: Ulwandle oluMhlophe–Umsele i-Baltic luhlanganisa uLwandlekazi i-Arctic noLwandle i-Baltic, ngendlela yeChibi i-Onega, iChibi i-Ladoga kanye ne-Saint Petersburg, kakhulu ngemifula namachibi.

translation.en: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translation.zu: IChibi i-Onega libuye laxhumana ne-Volga, ngakho ukuza usuka oLwandle lwase-Caspian udlula eRashiya kusenzeka.

translation.en: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translation.zu: Qiniseka ukuthi lapho nje ufika ezikhumulweni zemikhumbi yonke into izoba sobala kakhulu. Uzohlangana nabanye abacela ukugitsheliswa emikhumbini futhi bazokwabelana nawe ngolwazi lwabo.

translation.en: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translation.zu: Ngokuyisisekelo uzobe ufaka izaziso zosizo olunikezayo, wehla wenyuka ezikhumulweni zemikhumbi, ulanda bantu abahlanza izikebhe zawoseyili, uzama ukuxhumana namatilosi ezinkantini, njalo njalo.

translation.en: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translation.zu: Zama ukukhuluma nabantu abaningi ngangokunokwenzeka. Ngemva kwesikhashana wonke umuntu uzokwazi futhi uzokunika amacebiso okuthi isiphi isikebhe esifuna umuntu.

translation.en: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translation.zu: Kufanele ukhethe inkampani yakho yezindiza ye-Fuest Flyer kumfelandawonye ngokucophelela.

translation.en: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translation.zu: Noma ungahle ucabange ukuthi ungazikhethela ukujoyina umzila wezindiza owusebenzisa kakhulu, kumelwe uqaphele ukuthi amalungelo anikezwayo ayashintshashintsha kanti namaphuzu angase abonelele kwezinye izindlela zokundiza ngemali efanayo.

translation.en: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translation.zu: Izinkampani zezindiza ezifana ne-Emirates, i-Etihad Airways, i-Qatar Airways kanye ne-Turkish Airlines zandise izinkonzo zazo kakhulu e-Afrika, futhi zixhumanisa namanye amadolobha amakhulu wase-Afrika ngamanani aphansi kunezinye izinkampani zezindiza zaseYurophu.

translation.en: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translation.zu: Inkampani Yezindiza yaseTheki inezindiza eziya ezindaweni ezingu-39 emazweni angu-30 wase-Afrika kusukela ngo-2014.

translation.en: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translation.zu: Uma unesikhathi esengeziwe sohambo, hlola ukuthi lithini inani lokuya e-Afrika uma liqhathaniswa nelokuzungeza umhlaba.

translation.en: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translation.zu: Ungakhohlwa ukufaka izindleko ezengeziwe zamanye ama-visa, izintela zokuhamba, izinto zokuthutha, njll. kuzo zonke lezo zindawo ngaphandle kwase-Afrika.

translation.en: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translation.zu: Uma ufuna ukundiza emhlabeni wonke ngokuphelele eNyakatho Nenkabazwe, ungakhetha izindiza nendawo ofuna ukuya kuyo kuye ngokulinganiselwa kokuntuleka kwemizila yasolwandle.

translation.en: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translation.zu: Ayikho inhlangano yezindiza ehlanganisa zonke izindlela ezintathu zokuya ngaphesheya kwezilwandle ezinkulu eNingizimu neNkabazwe (futhi IqembuIsibhakabhaka alihlanganisi lezi zindlela).

translation.en: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translation.zu: Nokho, Inhlangano yeNkanyezi ihlanganisa yonke into ngaphandle kweNingizimu Phasifiki esempumalanga kusuka eSantiago de Chile kuya eTahiti, okuyindawo yokubalekela Yezwe elilodwa leLATAM.

translation.en: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translation.zu: Indiza ayikhona nje ukuphela kwento ongayikhetha uma ufuna ukudabula izilwandle zaseNingizimu Pacific kanye nogu olusentshonalanga yeNingizimu Melika. (bheka ngezansi)

translation.en: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translation.zu: Ngo-1994, uhlanga lwama-Amernian Nagorno-Karabakh esifundeni sase-Azerbaijan yahloma impi ngokumelene no-Azeris.

translation.en: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translation.zu: Isekelwa i-Armenia, iriphabhuliki entsha yenziwa. Nokho, alikho izwe elizimele - hhayi ngisho ne-Armenia - eliyiqaphele ngokomthetho.

translation.en: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translation.zu: Izimpikiswano zezifundiswa phakathi kwesifunda ziyaqhubeka zilimaza ubudlelwane phakathi kwe-Armenia kanye ne-Azerbaijan.

translation.en: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translation.zu: ICanal District (ngesiDashi: Grachtengordel) isigodi esidumile sangekhulu lama-17 leminyaka esizungeze iBinnestad yase-Amsterdam.

translation.en: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translation.zu: Indawo yonke imiswe njengeNdawo Yefa Lomhlaba ye-UNESCO ngenxa yesiko layo elihlukile negugu elingokomlando, futhi amanani wezindlu aphakathi kwamanye aphezulu ezweni.

translation.en: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translation.zu: ICinque Terre, okusho ukuthi Amazwe Amahlanu, ihlanganisa imizi emincane emihlanu engasogwini yeRiomaggiore, iManarola, iCorniglia, iVernazza kanye neMoterosso esendaweni yaseNtaliyane yaseLiguria.

translation.en: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translation.zu: Bafakiwe Ohlwini lwe-UNESCO Lefa Lomhlaba.

translation.en: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translation.zu: Ngemva kwamakhulu eminyaka, abantu bebakha ngokucophelela izindawo zokuphola ezindaweni ezingaqondile, izindaweni ezehlelayo emaweni abheke olwandle.

translation.en: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translation.zu: Ingxenye yobuhle bayo ukungabonakali kwezakhiwo ezakhiwayo. Izindlela, izitimela kanye nezikebhe kuxhumanisa amadolobhana, futhi izimoto azikwazi ukuwafinyelela kusuka ngaphandle.

translation.en: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translation.zu: Ukuhluka kwesiFulentshi esikhulunywa eBheljiyamu nase-Switzerland kuhluka kancane nesiFulentshi esikhulunywa eFulansi, nakuba sifana ngokwanele ukuthi singazwisiseka kokubili.

translation.en: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translation.zu: Ikakhulukazi, uhlelo lokubala e-Belgium kanye nase-Switzerland ekhuluma isiFulentshi nokuhluka okuncane esiFulentshini esikhulunywa eFulansi, futhi ukuphinyiselwa kwamagama athile kuhlukile kancane.

translation.en: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translation.zu: Nakuba kunjalo, bonke abantu base-Belgium nase-Switzerland abakhuluma isiFulentshi bayobe befunde isiFulentshi esivamile esikoleni, ngakho bangaqonda okushoyo ngisho noma usebenzise indlela yokubala evamile yesiFulentshi.

translation.en: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translation.zu: Ezingxenyeni eziningi zomhlaba, ukuvayela ngesandla isenzo sobungane, esibonisa ukuthi "sawubona."

translation.en: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translation.zu: Nokho, eMalaysia, okungenani phakathi kwezindawo zasemaphandleni zaseMalay, kusho ukuthi "woza," ngokufanayo nonkomba ogotshelwe ngasemzimbeni, isenzo esisetshenziswa kwamanye amazwe aseNtshonalanga, futhi kumelwe sisetshenziselwe leyo njongo kuphela.

translation.en: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translation.zu: Ngokufanayo, isihambi saseBrithani eSpeyini singenza iphutha lokucabanga ukuthi ukuvayela okuhlanganisa intende yesandla ebheke umvayeli (kunomuntu ovayelwayo) isho ukuthi buya.

translation.en: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translation.zu: Izilimi zesikhashana izilimi ekungezona ezangempela noma ezakhiwe ngenhloso yokulungiselela ukukhulumisana phakathi kwabantu ababezoba nenkinga yokukhulumisana uma kwakungenjalo.

translation.en: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translation.zu: Zihlukile ezilimini eziyinhloko, okuyizilimi ezingokwemvelo noma eziphilayo ezaba eziyinhloko ngenxa yezizathu ezithile njengendlela yokukhulumisana phakathi kwezikhulumi zezinye izilimi.

translation.en: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translation.zu: Uma kuwusuku olushisayo, izihambi zingabona utalagu olubukeka njengamanzi (noma ezinye izinto).

translation.en: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translation.zu: Lezi zingaba ingozi uma isihambi silandela utalagu, simosha amandla ayigugu kanye namanzi asele.

translation.en: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translation.zu: Ngisho nezingwadule ezishisa kakhulu zibanda ngokwedlulele ebusuku.Ukwehla kwezinga lokushisa komzimba ingozi yangempela ngaphandle kwezimpahla ezifudumele.

translation.en: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translation.zu: Ehlobo, ikakhulukazi, kuzomelwe uqaphele omiyane uma unquma ukuhamba ehlathini lemvula.

translation.en: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translation.zu: Ngishoushayela ehlathini lemvula elinezihlahla ezinde, imizuzwana embalwa ngenkathi uvule izicabha zemoto ukuze ungene kuyona iyisikhathi esanele ukuthi omiyane bangene emotweni Kanye nawe.

translation.en: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translation.zu: Umkhuhlane wezinyoni, noma owaziwa ngokusemthethweni njengomkhuhlane we-Avian, ungatheleleka kokubili izinyoni nezilwane ezincelisayo.

translation.en: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translation.zu: Ukugula okungaphansi kwenkulungwane kubikiwe ebantwini, kodwa okunye kwakho bekubulala.

translation.en: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translation.zu: Abaningi bahlanganisa abantu abasebenza ngezinkukhu, kodwa zikhona nezingozi kubabheki bezinyoni.

translation.en: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translation.zu: Ngokujwayelekile eNorway ukungenela kolwandle okuphahlwe amawa kanye nezigodi ezivulela ithafa eliphakeme, cishe elilingene.

translation.en: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translation.zu: Lezi zinkangala zivamise ukubhekiselwa ngokuthi "vidde" okusho indawo ebanzi, evulekile engenamithi, indawo engenamikhawulo.

translation.en: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translation.zu: ERogaland nase-Agder zivame ukubizwa ngokuthi "hei" okusho inkangala engenamithi kaningi embozwe i-heather.

translation.en: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translation.zu: Amagilesiya awasimamanga, kodwa ehlela phansi kwentaba. Lokhu kuzobangela ukuqhekeka, imifantu, engafihlwa amabhuloho eqhwa.

translation.en: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translation.zu: Izindonga kanye nophahla lwemihume yeqhwa lungawa futhi imiklayeko ingavaleka.

translation.en: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translation.zu: Onqenqemeni lwamagilasiya izinguzungu ezinkulu ziyahlephuka, ziwele phansi noma mhlawumbe zigxume noma zigingqikele kude nongqengqema.

translation.en: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translation.zu: Inkathi yezivakashi ezindaweni zamagquma iyenyuka phakathi nehlobo laseNdiya.

translation.en: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translation.zu: Nokho, zinenhlobo ehlukile yobuhle nokukhanga phakathi nobusika, ngamagquma amanithi athola iqhwa elanele nanikeza okokuzijabulisa okunjengokushushuluza eqhweni noma ukuntweza ngoqembe eqhweni.

translation.en: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translation.zu: Izinkampani zezindiza ezimbalwa kuphela ezinika isaphulelo sabaya emngwabeni, esinciphisa kancane inani lohambo olungenxa yomngcwabo lomzuzu wokugcina.

translation.en: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translation.zu: Izinkampani zezindiza ezinikeza lokhu zihlanganisa i-Air Canada, i-Delta Air lines, neLufthansa yezindiza ezinze eMelika noma e-Canada, kanye ne-WestJet.

translation.en: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translation.zu: Kuzo zonke izimo, kumelwe ubhukhe ngefoni ngokuqondile nenkampani yezindiza.
